Had she not been so tall she wouldn’t even have reached it, but it was still no use, she couldn’t even bulge it.

“You can do better than that! What if I decided to digest you?” Blainey said. And Meghan screamed as she suddenly saw juices flowing heavily down the sides of the stomach, but the juiced disappeared as soon as they had appeared and never touched her.

“Sorry, I was just teasing you.” The professor said and soon an orange liquid joined Meghan in the professor’s stomach. After a few seconds the stomach forced Meghan back up Blainey’s throat and she landed with a wet sound on the floor of the professor’s office.

“You are right. You have a lot to learn, and I wouldn’t mind learning the throw up without potion trick, these aren’t the tastiest concoctions you know. I guess I’ll have to talk to your mother about that.” The professor smiled.

“Was there anything else you wondered?”

“No I guess not.” Meghan answered and got herself off the floor.

“Well I’ll see what I can do about starting another class, if I can it will hopefully start next week.”

“Thank you!” Meghan said and left the professor alone to deal with her work.

Having risen to the very top of Meghan’s to do list was finding a shower and getting into her extra set of clothes that she had brought with her today. Always keeping a spare set in the locker really did seem like a good idea. She’d have to thank the little TA from v101 for the advice.
111111.title: Meghan talks to Professor Blainey

1111111.content:
Sally felt really happy this morning as she gingerly crashed into her seat next to Tiffany.

She hadn’t seen Meghan yesterday, but the effects of what Meghan had done to her on the Monday afternoon had still lingered on Tuesday. So Sally had stuffed herself silly when she got home from school. The large melon she had shown Meghan had been no trouble at all, so she had sent another couple of melons down after it.

Then with a bumpy and bloated gut she had sat down to do some reading. Looking ahead at what the professor would cover. Sally had figured that she could probably start to swallow people, but it wouldn’t be very safe. The professor had mentioned swallowing down air to the person inside and keeping the digestion at bay and she didn’t know how to do those things.

The book did cover the issues she had though, but once again it was down to practice, as best she had tried to convert the theory of the book into practice she couldn’t tell if she actually managed anything. Hence she had realized that having the professor explaining how to do wouldn’t hurt, maybe she could share a few tricks with them?

Now as Sally sat in her seat she had this mischievous smile on her face whenever she looked at Tiffany. She knew she would have to practice keeping digestion at bay and swallowing air first, but she couldn’t help thinking “Next time Tiffany…next time…”

Tiffany hadn’t noticed Sally’s gaze and never did, for when the professor entered she got everyone’s attention and the class fell silent.

“I heard yesterday that someone has managed to swallow their first person.”

A low mumble spread across the room, but died out when the professor dropped her notes on her desk with a bang.

“This is the shortest time I can remember it has ever taken someone to learn to do so. Because of this I will jump ahead a little so we can cover the skills needed for someone to start practicing on people.”

Blainey plugged in her laptop computer and started a display program.

“So to start with today I will go through the basics of preventing digestion. This includes limiting the production of acids and enzymes as well as stopping the churning of the stomach. I will then go on to how to swallow large amounts of air and the process of keeping the air in your stomach somewhat fresh. Then I will go back to where we were, should we still have some time left before it is time to practice. It is no loss if we don’t, all of you will need to practice this sooner or later anyhow and you need to learn to do both before you can practice on people.”

“Well then.” She said and turned to the projected image above her. “As you can see…”

The professor seemed to talk without end and then she demonstrated different techniques, while the TA’s repeated what she did for those who had problem seeing the professor.

“Well maybe you should all practice getting air into your stomach now that it is fresh in your head.”

There was a short pause and then a choir of burping. It was fairly tricky. Swallowing down air wasn’t that hard, swallowing down lots of air proved a bit tougher. Neither was burping up the air hard, it was actually the normal reaction when air got into the stomach.

The professor let them keep it up for a while before she continued.

“You will soon learn to do this without sounding like you escaped from a Simpsons’ episode.”

She motioned towards the TA’s

“It is now time to continue practicing, and once again the TA’s have all sorts of fruits. And just as usual you can always come to me or them with questions.”
1111111.title: Wednesday's lesson

11111111.content:
Sally went to Stacey the redheaded TA and asked for the largest melon she had. The TA looked at her for a moment, then with some hesitation handed the little girl a large watermelon.

“Here you go.”

Stacey managed before she saw Sally swallow it on one go.

“Now give me a couple of apples and an orange. They are for my practicing partner.” Sally said at the staring TA, who had problems coping with someone being so good at swallowing already.

“Sure, you look like you are past practicing on those.” Stacey said as she handed Sally the requested fruits.

Sally got herself back to her seat, wobbling as she went. She then tossed the fruits into her own seat before sitting down in Tiffany’s lap, her bulging belly poking Tiffany square in the chest.

“I’m not so sure we should start with the fruits.” Sally said as she took of her watch and placed it in her purse.

“Meghan used her hands on me to widen my mouth and throat, so I’ll see what I can do. It seemed really tiresome so when I tire you can continue with the fruits ok?”

“Sure, I wouldn’t mind to get a taste of you.” Tiffany snickered.

Luckily Sally had a short top on leaving her arms free, so she didn’t have any sleeves to worry about.

“You have practiced at home I hope?” Sally asked before getting ready.

“Sure I have. Now get started already!”

Sally put both her hands into Tiffany’s mouth which made Tiffany’s jaw pop out of place.
11111111.title: What is Sally up to?

choices: Class is over so what now?
111111111.content:
Sally tries to remember what Meghan had done.

“Tiffany I think you should try to relax as much as possible and let me try to stretch you.”

Sally remembered that Meghan had kept on for a couple of hours before their little accident. Now they just had half an hour at best, and Sally wasn’t as sure about what she was doing as Meghan had been.

Still she did her best, and was getting results. Soon she could fit one of her hands into Tiffany’s throat.

But it was tiring, she just couldn’t imagine where Meghan had gotten her energy from. After fifteen or twenty minutes Sally was totally exhausted.

She picked up an apple and shoved it into Tiffany’s mouth and Tiffany swallowed it without problems.

“Woah! I couldn’t even get it into my throat yesterday!”

Tiffany opened wide an accepted the second apple. It went down just as easy as the first.

Then Sally picked up the orange and Tiffany looked at her with a sceptical expression on her face.

“Shouldn’t you peal it first?”

“Nah there is no need for that. I’ve eaten several melons whole and there have been no problems. Trust me it’s ok.”

“If you say so.” Tiffany said and opened her mouth wide once more.

The orange fit easily into Tiffany’s mouth, but her throat wouldn’t accept it. After a minute of pushing from Sally it slowly entered Tiffany’s throat. And as the bell rang five minutes later Sally had her whole forearm down Tiffany’s throat. A few more moments and Sally pushed the orange and her hand into Tiffany’s stomach.

“Well fun’s over, time to get out of here and to the next class.” Sally sighed as she withdrew her arm.
111111111.title: Sally has some progress.

1111111111.content:
Meghan found herself wandering through the hallway outside the room where v101 was just about to end. She didn’t really know why, maybe she just wanted to see if she could get something out of the class anyway, or maybe she was just drawn to the professor somehow and her knowledge.

Then the bell rang and she was startled by the loud noise and ended up standing there in the middle of the hallway as the rumbling of lots of feet drew ever closer.

“Hi Meghan. I’m sorry but I haven’t had the time to talk with your mother quite yet.” Blainey says as she comes to a halt in front of the young student.

The two of them walk over to the side so they can talk more privately and also not block the hallway as lots of students make their way past them.

“By the way, the result you got out of Sally was quite impressive. Stacey confirmed what you told me yesterday. She said Sally didn’t have any trouble at all to swallow even a very large melon. I wouldn’t have expected that from someone who initially had such troubles this early, perhaps by the end of next week, or possibly the one after that. You wouldn’t mind joining the class as a TA?”

“I don’t know, I mean that I haven’t really shown anybody before, with Sally I went down dirty, I didn’t show her much at all. And if you could manage to start a new class, I’d rather spend my time practicing new stuff, than teaching others.”

Blainey thought for a while, but then she got an idea.

“So how about this? You assist me in v101 until an eventual continuation class, and I’ll introduce you to the ladies in my research team. I can’t have anyone running about down at the labs on a regular basis, but I’ll give them permission to show you what we are working on. So if you manage to befriend some of them I’m sure they can teach you some nifty tricks, and I might let you come down there again.”

The professor smiles as she adds. “And after seeing you at work, I’m sure you could teach them a little too.”

Meghan was all exited after hearing the professor’s proposal. “Deal!”

“Great! Come down to the labs on Friday, let’s say four a clock. Use the back entrance and I’ll be in a room to the right, just a few doors down.”

“I’ll be there! Is there anything I have to practice before the next lesson?”

“Not really, we are going to continue practicing stretching mouth and throat, so if you have any idea of showing people what you did to Sally, then practice that. Otherwise I’d like to see you help some girls like you helped Sally, you might just have to start it and then their practice partner could take over.”

“Ok! I’ll see you Friday morning then!” Meghan said as she and the professor parted.
1111111111.title: Chance meeting.

11111111111.content:
As usual for this class the students were very early, so when Meghan arrived she was among the last ones even though there were a good five minutes left before the class started.

As she walked down the walkway the girls at the end of the lines seemed to want to shrink away so that Meghan wouldn’t notice them, because everyone remembered her from Monday’s lesson.

They all sighed in relief as Meghan didn’t take a seat next to any of them, but instead walked to the front of the class and exchanged a few words with the professor before taking a position along one of the walls next to the TA’s.

“Hi Meghan! Welcome to the club.” The three TAs say in unison.

“Hello…Eh I’m sorry ladies, but I never got your names.” Meghan excuses herself, but is at the same time glad that the girls seem to accept her.

“I’m Jessica.” Said the blond TA squeezed into a revealing outfit of black leather and shook Meghan’s hand.

“But you can call me Jess, many do and I don’t mind.” She added as her jiggling large breasts almost escaped her short tight vest.

“Stacy.” The redheaded TA said as they shook hands. She looked hungry somehow, fitting one might think seeing as this was a class about eating.

Meghan had to look down a bit when talking to the last TA, who had long lovely dark hair and stood five foot tall at most, definitely not taller than that.

“Julianne, somehow people actually say Julianne, I guess Jul just sound silly.”

“Well I’ll call you Julianne if that’s what you like.”

Meghan gave the little woman a warm smile, before she added somewhat perplexed.

“So how do you keep the students in line, if you don’t mind me asking? You look about half the size of Jess of Stacey.”

Julianne smirked. “I use that to my advantage, I was the best in last year’s class, so I think I’ll be able to handle any problematic student we have. At least until they get a whole lot better.”

Then Jessica cut in.
“I think we should be quiet now, the class should start any second, judging by the professor.”
11111111111.title: Next lesson. (Friday morning.)

111111111111.content:
“I hope most of you skipped breakfast, since we are going to continue with practicing swallowing fruits. Well I said most of you since I believe that there’s at least one person here that should practice on something tougher, but might not be ready yet to start practicing on their partner.”

“By not ready I mean that even though we have potions to stop the churning of the stomach and prevent nasty juices from forming, I’d rather have you capable of keeping them down on your own before you start. And let’s not forget that I want to be certain that anyone swallowing someone is able to exchange the air in their stomach efficiently.”

The professor went behind her desk and bent down to pick something up.

“That’s why I have brought these!”

She said and held up a big rubbery ball.

“I’m sure you’ve all seen these before, and wondered what the heck they are for, not to mention why they are called medicine balls and why they are so damn heavy.”

The professor set the ball down on the desk with a thud, before she continued.

“Well it’s obvious if you take vore into account isn’t it? They are called medicine balls because you are supposed to swallow them whole, just like medicine pills. They are large because they are meant to help someone widen their mouth and throat. The different sizes come in handy so that you can make progress. The weight is helpful to get it crammed down, so are the fact that they are somewhat soft and that once wet they get really slippery.”

The professor bent down and picked up another ball, this one noticeably larger than the first one and showed it to the class.

“When you swallow these, you have to throw them back up. They are made in an acid resistant material and we coat them from time to time in different chemicals so that they should remain unharmed.”

She put the new ball down next to the previous one.

“Once you think that you are ready for this step, then we will let you take one of these babies of an appropriate size home and give you some regurgitating potions so you can practice alone.”

Keeping a hand on each ball she added.

“If you want a ball, then come down here at the start of the practice session and I’ll have one ready for you.”
111111111111.title: Early morning lesson.

1111111111111.content:
Professor Blainey then went on elaborating on techniques that had been covered before, as well as the inner workings of the stomach.

Soon enough she announced that it was time for practicing.

“Now many of you probably remember Meghan. She will help us here today and next week. She will walk around and help some of you out, if you have questions, then naturally you can always turn to me or the regular TAs, but you can ask her as well.” Professor Blainey said, and motioned for Meghan, who waved a little and felt noticeably silly doing so.

Then the commotion started, some girls going for fruits and some just talking waiting for the worst rush to settle, not a few girls came down to the medicine balls, although it turned out that most just wanted a closer look at them, it wasn’t the case for everyone though.

A bit unsure of what to do Meghan decided to walk about in the classroom and see what the students were up to. She figured that she’d find someone to help eventually.

At first the girls looked nervous when she approached them, but after they realised that she was a normal person they kept at what they were doing and eventually didn’t care when she walked past.

The professor had allotted a whole hour to practicing, but it was at least twenty minutes before a girl asked for Meghan’s attention.
1111111111111.title: The practice session.

11111111111111.content:
Finally someone who she could help, hopefully, it was getting quite boring to do nothing and considering that this girl is the first to ask her for help Meghan realized that she might not need to hurry to help the next, because there might not be anyone else asking her for help.

Meghan made her way towards the girl that had asked for her attention. She looked down at the young lady in the seat to find that looking up at her was a rather tall girl, with long beautiful dark hair. The girl had looks to match it too, obviously taking good care of herself. As they locked eyes Meghan realized she was very pretty.

Something about the girl would tell you that she wasn’t the sort that would normally ask for help, but this Meghan didn’t notice as she was too excited about finally getting something to do.

“What can I help you with?”

“I overheard the TAs speaking, they said you had helped a girl get great results, so I wondered if you’d help me?”

“Sure, I dunno why no one seems to be asking me anything, but I’m glad you finally did.” Meghan said as she stepped in between the rows to stand in front of the girl.

“So what’s your name?”

“Samantha. You’re Meghan right?”

“Yepp! Now Samantha, I would like to ask you to try and relax as mush as possible and let me do my magic.” Meghan said as she gave Samantha a winning smile.

“Ok!” Was all Samantha said before she made herself comfortable and opened her mouth wide, unhinging her jaw in one go.

What Meghan didn’t know when she put both her hands in Samantha’s mouth, was that not only was Samantha not the nicest girl in town, honestly she was a real bitch, but also Samantha had been hell bent on getting good in this class, meaning that she had practiced almost as much as Sally and she had already read the book for this class from cover to cover.
11111111111111.title: Helping Samantha.

choices: Meghan thought someone else could use her help better and pulls back out.
Meghan goes down a bit further to be able to stretch a bit wider.
111111111111111.content:
“Oh I almost forgot, you must be Samantha’s practice partner!”

Meghan excused herself as she turned to face the curly brunette sitting next to Samantha. Not quite as beautiful as Samantha, but still quite a looker with similar build and statue as her practice partner.

“Yes I am. The name’s Victoria.” Came the friendly reply.

“Well then Victoria, would you come over here so that you can see what I’m doing?”

Victoria didn’t say anything, but stood up and placed herself so that she could see over Meghan’s shoulder and down into Samantha’s now wide stretched mouth.

“Now we’ll see how far we can stretch this mouth of yours.” Meghan said as she tried to pry as much of her forearms as possible into Samantha’s mouth.

“Victoria, would you please hold here?”

Victoria did as told, and that was all the assistance Meghan needed to fit both her forearms into Samantha’s mouth. She had her elbows on Samantha’s tongue and her hands in Samantha’s palate.

Wiggling and rhythmically rubbing Meghan spread her arms further and further apart, a little surprised that she didn’t get the resistance she had expected. But that wasn’t a bad sign was it? At least it showed that Samantha was making really good progress.

Meghan stopped when she had her arms a bit further apart than shoulder width, clearly Samantha was ready to take on medicine balls. But then again to do that she had to have a throat that would stretch as well, so Meghan moved on to make sure she had just that.

“Well it feels unnecessary to stretch your mouth further. You should start practicing on the medicine balls the professor showed before.” Meghan said as she withdrew her arms.

“Now Victoria could you get up in the seat and hold Samantha’s mouth open. I figured you’d get a good view that way and I am gonna show you how to stretch a throat, so look carefully.”

Victoria got up in the seat next to Samantha and stood on her knees holding the sides of Samantha’s mouth in her hands. And with one arm stretched out so that as she was leaning over Samantha she staring right down her throat.

“Wow, this looks kinda scary.” The brunette said as she had her face only inches from the wet cave that was Samantha’s mouth. Samantha replied by opening her throat so that Victoria got a good view down her gullet. Victoria yelped and pulled away before returning.

Meghan giggled a little before she put her hands back into Samantha’s mouth.

“Samantha you can relax now, I’ll do the stretching. And Victoria look closely now.”

Samantha’s throat closed and Meghan began pulling on its edges as well as massaging making it ease up. Meghan was a little bit less surprised to notice that Samantha’s throat stretched very well just as her mouth had done before.

“You see what I’m doing?”

“Yes.”

“Good, because Samantha’s throat stretches so well I feel it is kind of pointless to continue up here. Now this is a little trickier but hopefully you’ll get what I am doing, I’m not very good at explaining it so I hope you can see.”

With that Meghan shoved most of her arms down Samantha’s throat, bumping her head into Victoria’s as she did, not painfully though, just that she blocked Victoria’s view a little since her head was under brunette’s.

Then she started stretching Samantha’s throat trying several different things, and Victoria got an occasional glimpse of what she was doing as well as an occasional view right down and into Samantha’s wet stomach.

It would seem Samantha was quite stretchy even this far down her throat so:
111111111111111.title: Open wide Samantha!

choices: Sure, Victoria wants help. Does she get it?
1111111111111111.content:
Meghan stretches the tissue around her, but feels that Samantha is all ready quite stretchy, so she figures she should try finding someone that really needs her help Samantha clearly makes great progress as it is.

Seeing no point in lingering Meghan pulls out in one quick motion, something that proved good decision even though she didn’t notice what happened.

When she felt Meghan moving up her throat again Samantha forced Victoria away from her in an attempt to clamp down on Meghan and try to swallow. But when her mouth closed, Meghan was already outside, only a few hair strands lingered in her mouth, and Samantha was forced to accept that she didn’t get to swallow Meghan this time. Luckily for her it would seem Meghan was unaware of what she had just tried to do.

Victoria didn’t say anything either, she sure wouldn’t rat on her best friend. She did realize what she had been trying to do though and wondered if she could manage to pull it off. It wasn’t like she was any nicer than her friend.

Meghan looked around to see if there was anyone else that looked like they wanted some help.
1111111111111111.title: Pull out.

11111111111111111.content:
Meghan sees a blond girl looking her straight in the eyes and motioning for her to come over.

“Well ladies, there seems to be others who need my help.”

“Yes I’m sitting right here!” Victoria says with a pleading, yet hungry look in her eyes.

“Sorry Victoria, but I think you two can help each other and if you are as stretchy as Samantha, then you don’t need my help, but should start practicing on the medicine balls as well as keeping your digestion at bay, because you are basically ready to practice on each other.”

Meghan missed the teasing look Samantha gave Victoria, and that she licked her lips, neither did she notice the shudder running through Victoria or her forced swallow before she answered.

“Ok, medicine balls it is.” And stood up, eager to get her hands on a medicine ball it seemed to Meghan, but she was just trying to get away from Samantha before she got too carried away.

Meghan turned her attention back towards the blond girl, who now had gotten out of her seat and was walking over to Meghan instead of waiting any further. Meghan left Samantha behind and met up with the blond halfway.

Meghan smiled at the young lady as they closed in on each other. The girl in question was very slim, well she was downright skinny. Her hipbones didn’t poke out much or anything, she wasn’t that starved kind of skinny, she just didn’t have much meat on her bones, or that much hips. She wore a tight top that showed that she had at least some fat on her body because something made it poke outwards in chest height. Well not much, but there was something perky there. Had Meghan been able to see her back she would have noticed a tight little round bottom too.

But Meghan wasn’t checking her out so she might not had looked that far down, she was more occupied with the sweet pretty face of the girl and her tantalizing blue eyes.

“What can I help you with?” Meghan asked as she looked up at the pretty girl. Because she was so slim the girl looked really tall, so Meghan was surprised that she didn’t have to look up that far. She was only a little taller than Meghan, but Meghan had almost expected her to be a head taller or so.

“Well I’m interested in learning to hide meals, and the TAs said that you were the one to ask about that.”

“Oh, but isn’t that to jump ahead? Shouldn’t you practice swallowing stuff first?”

“Well yeah, but the girls are teasing me. You see how skinny I am, it shows even if I just swallow an apple. The girls laughed out loud when I swallowed a melon. They thought I looked really silly.”

Allison turned to Stacey who happened to be just a couple of meters away.

“Do you have a melon?”

“What kind?”

“Doesn’t matter, just please give me one would you?”

She gave Allison a watermelon. It probably weighed close to five kilos. With it Allison returned to Meghan as she dislocated her jaw. Then she slowly pushed it into her mouth and down her throat. Meghan watched as the fruit stretched the girl’s throat and then traveled down into her torso. As it settled in her stomach Meghan could see what Allison had been talking about. She could clearly make out the shape of the melon that made a tight and surprisingly large bulge in the blond girl’s stomach.

“Well that does look a bit silly.” Meghan giggled.

“So could you help me?”

“Well sure! Let’s sit down over here.” Meghan said and motioned for a few empty seats.

She showed Alison a few things and told her others and before the bell rang Alison had managed to make the bulge a little bit smaller. She was about to ask for an orange potion so that she didn’t have to walk around looking this silly, when Meghan stopped her.

“You need to digest meals while you try and hide them, that way your stomach learns to handle the task you give it. That is true for most techniques, so if you can digest the meal you should. And a melon sounds like something you could digest to me. Maybe you should bring some less revealing clothing if you feel uncomfortable with showing off your belly bulge.”

Meghan patted the lump in Allison’s tummy.

“Now if you practice this, you soon won’t have to worry about looking silly.”

“Thanks!” Allison said and to Meghan’s surprise gave her a kiss on her cheek before she went up to her old seat to collect her belongings.

Class is over and Meghan realized that it had gone rather smoothly. Even though she had just managed to help a couple of girls she figured that it was good enough.
11111111111111111.title: Allison.

choices: Meghan ignores her and watches TV or something.
Meghan asks her why she isn't at school.
111111111111111111.content:
After her math lecture Meghan has no more classes for the day and doesn’t feel like staying to study, so she decides to go home and find something to do until four o clock when she said she’d meet the professor.

She doesn’t live all that far away, but it is a decent walk anyway. Luckily most of the distance consists of crossing a park, so at least the scenery is good.

Being that close to school there’s quite a few people in the park, mostly students. Even so it almost seems empty being so large. Still there are lots of people around, mostly just relaxing in the sun and talking or reading.

She considers doing the same, but only for a fleeting moment, if she wants sun then they have a pretty decent back yard, even if the pond she walks by looks rather pretty as she catches an occasional glance of the waters through the thick lush growth surrounding it.

She stops for a moment to take in the scenery, moving over slightly to get a better view and then sees that there’s a cleared patch by the shore on the other side of the lake, A shaded spot with a bench overlooking the pond and surrounded by bushes, making it both the place with the best view and a bit secluded as well.

Someone’s sitting there reading, studying no doubt, but Meghan feels like taking a closer look and makes her way around the waters and finds the dirt path leading into the thicket.

Sitting on the bench is a young male student, he looks up as he hears someone coming and sees a very pretty blonde coming his way. He scoots over to make room for her on the bench and adjusts his glasses hoping to look his best and that she’ll take the seat next to him.

She doesn’t though, but she does come to a halt right in front of him, giving him a good excuse to look up from his book and take a good look at her before raising his gaze all the way up to her pretty face.

“Can I help you Miss?”

He doesn’t get an answer she just leans on closer, so close he thinks she’s about to kiss him, not that he’d mind, certainly not.

But then darkness and warmth covers his face like a soaking wet blanket and as he stiffen in surprise he feels a strong suction pulling him upwards and the weird sensation quickly spreads down his body until it covers all of him. Just then the pressure drops and he quickly moves forward and then plummet downwards.

Meghan felt the boy enter her stomach and thought to herself, not wanting so speak out loud in case someone would hear her. “Yes you can.” And let her stomach have at the poor guy, crushing and melting him at the same time.

“If you just move into my intestines you can help me with a nutritional need of mine.” She thought grinning to herself.

She looked around her and by the side if the bench found the guy’s bag, a quick glance revealed that it contained nothing interesting, so she tossed it down her throat to face the fate of its owner.

Patting her trim flat belly she enjoyed the feeling of him sating her hunger somewhat while she admired the view. It really was pretty here, she’d have to remember this place. Who knew perhaps it’d offer more meals as well?

Meghan didn’t linger there for too long, so when she finally gets home she is a little surprised to find that Haley is home too, even though it is in the middle of the day. Shouldn’t she be in school?
111111111111111111.title: Meghan walks home.

1111111111111111111.content:
Meghan figures that it is Haley’s problem if she skips school, and either way she does so much studying anyway that she probably doesn’t miss anything by not being is school. Is it maybe so that she already knows what they are covering in her classes? Meghan doesn’t find the concept unlikely.

Well time to relax, Meghan feels like doing nothing useful and what better way to do that then by watching some TV?

She starts by releasing the poor sod she ate at the park. She might be able to hide away her meals to the point that she isn’t bothered by them at all, but unfortunately they might be insignificant in her gut and even in her colon, but not on the way out, which is why she rarely eats more than a few people between bathroom visits.
Luckily they have special toilets at home that can handle larger loads so to speak. Using a normal toilet she’s found out, is either a very tiresome business with lots of flushing and waiting for the water container to fill, or a really messy ordeal.

Relieved of her burden Meghan throws herself on the couch and flips through the channels. They have cable so there are a few to look through. She goes through them a second time, and then a third. Who was she trying to kid, finding something worth looking at in the middle of a workday? No there’s not a chance regardless of how many channels you have, that kind of thing just doesn’t exist.

She looks outside she sun is still shining, maybe she should relax in the sun instead and better on her tan a little? Yeah, that sounded like a good idea. Maybe even take a dip in the pool.

Their mother had bought a fairly large house with a decent backyard with high enough fences so that none of the surrounding houses got a view of it. And right by the house they had a fairly large pool.

Meghan went upstairs to her room and changed into a white little thong bikini that accentuated her form nicely. She also picked up a pair of sunglasses, a book and a towel, before she headed for the patio.

Spreading the towel on a sun chair she sat, well almost laid down, on it and started reading her book.

Soon enough she felt like turning around to lay on her stomach instead, but instead of folding the chair down she decided to use her old air mattress and float around in the pool instead. She looked at the book, well it wasn’t that good, and it wouldn’t be catastrophic if it got a little wet.

So carefully as to not wet the book unnecessarily much she managed to get on her floating device and drift of into the calm waters of the pool.

She realized there was something unusual, the water didn’t smell like it used to. She put a finger into the pool and tasted the water. Yeah, Haley was probably to blame. She had filled the pool with fresh water before and not added the things she should. At least the water was still fresh.

“Heh, maybe this isn’t too bad.” Meghan thought. “This way I don’t have to go after something to drink. I can just sip some of the pool water.”

She then returned to the pages of her book.
1111111111111111111.title: Relaxing.

11111111111111111111.content:
Meghan got carried away by her book, maybe it wasn’t so bad after all. Time went and she flipped through the pages. She didn’t even notice when the water started to drain away.

But when the drainage started getting a little noisy it got her attention. She found that she was slowly traveling backwards. She turned around and saw that her sister had jumped into the pool too. She also saw the reason as to why the pool had been filled with freshwater. Haley was holding her mouth open letting the water flow down her throat.

Meghan threw the book onto the lawn and started paddling away from her sister. Haley realized that she had been found out and opened her mouth and throat wide. The torrent was tremendous and Meghan couldn’t possibly hope to out paddle it.

Luckily she realized that right away and got an idea. She rolled into the water and dove for the bottom and as she had hoped the deeper she got the less was the water flow.

It didn’t take long before she once more felt air around her as she lay with her belly pressed against the pool bottom. She got to her feet and faced Haley, who pouted her lips and feigned sadness.

The water was just up to her ankles now as she was in the more shallow end. But before she could say anything Haley spat her air mattress at her.

“Why’d you jump off? You’d gotten a nice warm waterslide into my tummy, where it would have been nice and warm.”

Haley said with a more mischievous look on her face and patted the bulge in her middle.

“You know why I don’t want to get in your tummy? Man I’ve never seen you let anything out undigested without mom telling you too!”

Haley raised an eyebrow. “Oh, I didn’t know it was that bad. I can play nice too you know.”

She grew silent and then looked around her.

“Well I guess I should go and put the water back on, no point having a pool if there’s no water in it is there?”

Haley still rubbed her tummy and Meghan saw how the bulge diminished as it went lower into Haley’s belly and got absorbed by her. With only a small lump in her belly and possibly a very full bladder Haley climbed out off the pool and turned the water on before probably heading off to the bathroom.

Since the new water wasn’t as warm as Meghan would have liked it to be she too got out of the pool.
11111111111111111111.title: Fun in the pool.

choices: She finds a spot right away.
111111111111111111111.content:
Meghan did some more reading before she got herself ready to meet up with the professor. Haley didn’t bother her again which she appreciated, but lay down by the pool as Meghan headed of to school.

Having squeezed herself into a tight set of pants and a for her normal revealing and matching tight top, Meghan looks out the window she sees her car, and her mind is made up. She doesn’t drive it much now that she lives so close to school, but she doesn’t know how long she’s supposed to stay at school and the research building lies on the far end of the university, so she might as well take it for a spin.

It is nothing fancy, it looks rather nice though. As far as Meghan is concerned it is a car, those a little more interested would say it is a dark blue Peugeot 406, but that’s pretty useless information for most. Needless to say it’s got a roof, two doors and a small backseat, so it looks a little sporty.

Meghan was glad she did take the car, because she hadn’t been on that side of the school and it wasn’t all that easy to find. But there were still a few minutes before the clock turned four as she drove into the parking lot at the back of the building she had been looking for.
111111111111111111111.title: Getting ready.

choices: Meghan goes first, she knows the professor will catch up with her.
Meghan waits for Blainey to take the lead.
1111111111111111111111.content:
To Meghan’s delight not many seemed to use the parking lot, but then again how many people here had a need to take the car. The parking lot looked big enough to have a slot for each and every one who worked here.

So she just pulled into a spot that was easy and left the car, soon walking up the stairs to the entrance the professor had told her to use.

The door looked like one of those that always lock and you need some means to open it, be that a card or key, neither of which Meghan had. So she was glad when the she found the door to be open.

Inside a corridor stretched out before her, and she could hear a gentle tapping on a keyboard.

Meghan walked down the hall as she had been told and saw that one of the doors was slightly ajar. It was from behind it the tapping noise came and it seemed to correspond to the door Blainey had referred to in her description. So Meghan knocked lightly on the door as she slowly pushed it open.

“Hello? Professor?”

Blainey looked up from her computer.

“Oh so you are here.”

She looked down on the screen again to save what she was doing and lock the workstation.

“We’re gonna go right down the hall and to the other side of the large metal door.” Blainey said while typing the last commands.

Meghan looked down the hall and saw that at the end of it there was a large fireproof safety door.
1111111111111111111111.title: Easy parking.

11111111111111111111111.content:
A bit eager Meghan does not wait for the professor, she figures that she’s on her way anyway. So when Meghan arrives at the large door Blainey is still just emerging from the room she was in. There is one of those card and code reader devices at the wall just next to the door. But the light shines green so Meghan tests to see if the door is open and finds that it is. So she opens up and step inside.

She comes into what looks like another hallway, only this is more like a large cross-section that is a room more or less with a few doors and halls going in all directions.

As soon as she enters and let the door pull shut behind her she sees an average sized pretty blonde woman who was just walking through. The woman stops and seems a little surprised as she sees Meghan. But it doesn’t last long, she breaks into a warm smile and walk over to Meghan.

“Hi there.”

Meghan returns the smile and extends her hand expecting a more formal greeting, but with lightning reflexes the woman takes hold of Meghan instead of her hand. Before Meghan manages to as much as yelp her arms are being pinned to her sides and her head forced down the woman’s throat.

She trash about helplessly, breaking loose from someone’s grip is one of the things Meghan knows very little about. As she travel further down and start to enter the stomach Meghan hopes Blainey will get here soon, because escaping from stomachs is another of those things she sucks at.

The blonde woman has her eyes closed and she savours Meghan, as the door opens once again and her throat returns to normal.

“Throw her up!”

Blainey yells at Tamara which is what the blonde is called.
11111111111111111111111.title: One step ahead.

111111111111111111111111.content:
Tamara startled by the professor shouting her almost in the ear, jumps back in chock before rummaging through her pockets.

She finds a bottle of orange liquid, from which she takes a large gulp, bends over as her stomach clamps down and start to force Meghan back up her throat again. Meghan arrives feet first and land a bit slimy on the cold floor.

“Sorry professor! I thought she was just someone barging in here. You’ve told us to take care of unwanted visitors, so I wasted no time.” Tamara said as she stood back up and looked over to the professor, who seemed to let out a sigh of relief rather than being angry with her.

“Yes I know, I just never thought someone would be that fast. I’m just glad you didn’t digest her, I would never have been able to explain that to Hawthorn.”

Tamara raised an eyebrow and looked at Meghan, whom she extended a hand to too help her get up.

“Hawthorn? What does she have to do with it?”

Blainey motioned for Meghan, who said nothing but let the professor speak.

“This is Meghan Hawthorn, the professor’s daughter.”

Tamara raised the other eyebrow too.

“Ohh, I see.”

Then she turned her eyes back to Blainey.

“But what is she doing here?”

“She wanted to learn more about vore, and I offered her to come down here and meet you girls. I figured if you got along you could teach each other some things. But before I let you exchange knowledge I have to get Hawthorn’s permission, seeing as it is her work Meghan has studied. But I figured none the less that I’d give her a tour of the lab and show her what some of you girls are up too.”

Tamara turned to Meghan whom she was still holding hands with, even though Meghan was standing up now.

“Ehh…Pleased to meet you Meghan, I’m Tamara.” Tamara said and shook hands with Meghan. She then whipped some of the slime off of her and added.

“Sorry about that. At least I didn’t have any acid in my stomach, so that’s just mucus and some other slime, nothing that’ll hurt you or ruin your clothes.”

Meghan brushed herself off and forced a slightly disgusted smile.

“Glad to her that, but how come you didn’t have juices in there?”

“You see I’m studying the small intestines, or more like ways of making them more effective. This has made me start to shove my meals directly into the intestines and not let the stomach do its work first. But that is no problem for my intestines they are capable of handling it.”

She made a pause and looked a bit awkwardly at Meghan.

“You should be glad that the professor got in when she did, because once in my intestines, I can’t throw anything back up and since I started here I have never hurried anything through, so I don’t know how you’d handle the trip.”

Meghan didn’t really know what to say to that, but felt she should say something.

“Well if you don’t mind I’ll pass any offer of finding out.”
111111111111111111111111.title: Back up

1111111111111111111111111.content:
“Well harmful or not, you look like you’d like to clean yourself off a bit. We have a large bathroom over here.” Blainey said and lead the way. Meghan and Tamara followed.

It was indeed a large bathroom. I guess if you study the digestive process the way they do, then there has to be room enough for an audience as well as test subjects.

In it was a shower in one corner, a weird looking toilet as well as two sinks, one normal and one big one, the kind that you often find in laundry rooms. There were also a shelf with fresh towels and different bottles. Meghan noticed that there seemed to be quite a supply of the orange ones she’d seen before.

The toilet though nothing new to Meghan, she had one at home just like it, but for anyone else the large gaping hole that was where the bowl usually was would look weird. For anyone capable of digesting large meals and who did so on a regular basis these specially constructed babies were wonderful. Because it was made to handle massive loads, so that the user wouldn’t have to worry about plugging up the plumbing, or have to spend a lot of time in there squeezing out a little at a time. At least not if the user were like the ladies here, who could more or less push out all the remains at once and have it over with.

Meghan washed her arms off and the slime from her hair, then Tamara helped her removing the worst of the rest using a towel. It wasn’t like Meghan had been soaked in yucky stuff, it was just that the stuff was indeed a bit yucky, so she wanted it gone.

“I was wondering if there were any of these toilets in school! You know what a pain it is to get a meal down a regular toilet.”

Meghan turned to Blainey. “Professor are there any like these up in the usual school buildings?”

“No not like these, but almost all the ones around school are of a custom sort we invested in a few years back. They look like normal toilets except possibly that they look a little wide directly under the bowl and if you look down inside it you’ll see a thin line, like a seam going round the inside of the bowl. “
“Well not like, it actually is a seam. You see, if enough pressure is exerted on the bottom of the bowl the seam will open and the bottom swing away allowing the contents to plummet into the sewer below before it closes again.”
“Since the meal lands first in the bowl before plummeting after a large meal one sometimes need to be a little careful and it does at times soil the bowl. You know how new toilets have two buttons for flushing, one big and one small? Well if you push both at the same time you get a real flush that should clean out the bowl.”

Blainey changed her pose, tone and subject.

“So are we done here?”

Meghan nodded and Blainey turned to Tamara.

“Well I took Meghan here so that she could get to meet you girls, so if you’d do me the favour of showing her around and introducing her to the girls, then there’s no need for me to tag along. It tends to get rather stiff when I’m around anyway, somehow I get ‘Yes professor!’ a lot.”

Tamara giggled and nodded. “I’ll do my best. Or should I say ‘Yes professor!’?”

“Thanks!” Blainey said and poked her tongue out at Tamara before she left the two girls alone.

“So where should we start?” Tamara mumbled as she thought for a while.

“How dumb of me. I have already started, well you know what I do I already told you and since you didn’t want a closer demonstration I guess we’ll move on.” Tamara said smiling and led the way.
1111111111111111111111111.title: Tamara the tourguide.

11111111111111111111111111.content:
Tamara starts walking down one of the hallways with Meghan in tow. There is quite some activity here. The buzzing of machines can be heard everywhere, doubtless mostly computers. There is also the tapping of keyboards, the clapping of walking feet and the occasional groan and moan. Even talking can be heard.

It would seem most doors here are open, or at least ajar and as Meghan walks past the doors she sees either an office or a laboratory.

Tamara and Meghan walk by several unoccupied rooms, well unoccupied in the sense that no one is there at the moment, there seemed to be something going on in most rooms and the light is on in every one.

Then Tamara stopped and knocked on a doorframe.

“Come in.”

Meghan saw a young woman turn around away from her computer to face them.

“Meghan this is Patricia…” Tamara paused for a moment and looked closer on Patricia’s stomach, which was left bare between a short dark skirt and a matching short top.

“and that is Evelyn.” Tamara added and pointed to Patricia’s stomach.

“Pleased to meet you Meghan” Patricia said and extended her hand, but before Meghan had a chance to shake it a voice spoke up from Patricia’s tummy.

“Patricia would you let me up so I can greet the lady?”

“Excuse me Meghan.” Patricia said before she took a deep breath and leaned over to one side. Her stomach started wiggling around and soon her throat started stretching wider and wider. Two hands emerged from between her lips and grabbed hold of the sides of her mouth.

Then in a few massive jolts a woman’s upper body emerged from between her lips. The new woman, placed her hands onto the floor did a handstand as the rest of her body slid out from between Patricia’s lips. She then gracefully placed her feet on the ground and stood up.

The slime covered woman than now stood before Meghan who was just dressed in a bikini, extended her hand and shook Meghan’s.

“Hi I’m Evelyn.”

Meghan crooked an eyebrow feeling the still warm slime wetting her hand.

“How delightful, I’m Meghan.”

Meghan then turned back to Patricia and shook her hand.

“I’d apologize for the slime, but since it’s yours I won’t.” Meghan said smiling and poked her tongue out.

“Well a little slime has never hurt anybody. When you work here you need to get used to handling much more disgusting things, and dangerous.”

“Excuse me ladies, I’m just gonna go wash this off, I’ll be back in a flash.” Evelyn said and disappeared around a corner and soon a shower could be heard.

“So who are you?” Patricia asked Meghan as soon as Evelyn had left.

I’m professor Hawthorn’s daughter. I guess that’s the main reason as to why Blainey let me come down here. Initially she offered to show me around and meet you all, but Tamara accepted the task.

Evelyn hadn’t been far away so she had heard them speaking and burst back into the room, she had got rid of the slime, but she was still wet and dripping water all over the place.

“Hey if you’re the daughter to a professor then you should know some vore!”

“Yeah I guess I do.”

Evelyn almost ran into Meghan, she didn’t though, but stopped just in front of her and poked her tummy.

“So can you hold of digestion?”

“Sure! Why do you ask?”

“Then do it.”

Was all the answer she got before Evelyn had pushed both her hands into her mouth and down her throat. Meghan got the idea and neutralized her stomach as she took hold of Evelyn’s hips. Meghan lifted Evelyn off the ground and slurped her up like a piece of spaghetti, that Evelyn helped just made the process even smother and faster. In no time Evelyn was gone, as Meghan’s stomach didn’t show any sign of Evelyn’s presence.

Tamara looked at Meghan’s stomach and so did Patricia.

“You’re good.”

Meghan looked confused. “Huh? What did you say.”

“It doesn’t even show that she’s in there.” Patricia said and pointed to Meghan’s stomach.

“Eh… what you mean? There’s just one girl in there.”

“Just one girl? Not all here can do that, and we are study vore as a full time job.”

Patricia pointed to Meghan’s stomach again. “She can’t do it. She looks pot bellied when she has someone in her stomach.”

“Well how many of you actually study hiding meals then? My guess would be not that many. Am I wrong?”

“No, but everyone practice it more or less with every meal.”

“That’s not the same thing and you know it.”

Meghan changed the subject.

“So what do you study? Tamara said she was into digestion in the small intestines, but since Evelyn was in your stomach I guess that’s not what you do, unless you two were just fooling around.”

Patricia smiled. “Nah I guess we were doing a bit of both working and fooling around. You see I study how to keep someone in your stomach.”

Patricia pointed once again at Meghan’s stomach.

“Evelyn studies how to get out of one, so we compliment each other.”

Patricia looked a bit confused. “I’m surprised that Evelyn hasn’t made her way out of your stomach yet. Do you know techniques of how to keep someone inside?”

Meghan giggled and patted her stomach, feeling how Evelyn squirmed around in there.

“Nope, I don’t know anything about that. I guess she’s just enjoying herself in there.”

Meghan looked down on her tummy.

“Well maybe it is time for her to get out of there?”

Meghan crouched down and brought Evelyn back up her throat. She leaned forward and let Evelyn slide out of her mouth and onto the floor.

Tamara addressed Evelyn “That was about time!”

And Patricia filled in. “We were getting worried you’d lost your touch.”

Evelyn had her eyes wide open in an almost chock-like expression as she pulled herself off the floor.

“I didn’t break out, she spat me out!”

“So you didn’t want to leave? Was it really that nice in there?” Tamara giggled.

“No! No! You don’t understand. I did try to get out of there, but it was like a big freaking banquet hall. Man her stomach has to bigger than the professor’s and Tracy’s put together! I just couldn’t get out of there.”

Evelyn turned to Meghan. “You have to let me practice getting out of there sometime!”

“Sure! Maybe you could instruct me on how to get out of yours too? I wouldn’t mind learning some of your escape techniques.”

Evelyn broke into a huge smile. “It’s a deal.” She said and grabbed hold of Meghan and opened her mouth wide.

She would have had Meghan halfway into her stomach before Meghan would have had an idea of what was happening. Tamara however had a feeling of what was about to come as well as fast reflexes. So she broke in before Evelyn got Meghan’s head into her mouth.

“Not now Evelyn! You can do that some other time! I’m supposed to show Meghan around.”

Evelyn released Meghan and pouted out her bottom lip as she patted her belly, bumpy by clearly defined abdominal muscles.

“And my stomach isn’t part of the tour?”

“No, not today it isn’t. She’s already been in mine and that’s enough spelunking for one day, I’m sure.”
11111111111111111111111111.title: Let me introduce...

choices: Meghan walks up to the woman.
111111111111111111111111111.content:
Tamara turned to Meghan.

“So shall we continue?”

Meghan waved to Patricia and Evelyn.

“Bye ladies, see you later.”

And she set of after Tamara who had already started walking down the hall towards the next stop. Meghan walked slowly by Tamara’s side looking about, when a voice called out from a room beside her.

“Oh Tamara, you are an angel!”

Meghan looked at the owner of the voice who happened to be a well curved and quite trim beautiful brunette, who stood just inside the doorway in just a bikini and she was all wet, looking like she just came out of a shower.

The gorgeous woman looked at Meghan and gave her an inviting look while pointing on the floor in front of her.

“Why don’t you come over here?”
111111111111111111111111111.title: The tour continues.

1111111111111111111111111111.content:
Meghan stops and looks questioningly at Tamara.

“Hello Nicole.” Tamara says and places her hand on Meghan’s shoulder.

“This is Meghan, professor Hawthorn’s daughter. Blainey asked me to show her around.”

Tamara gestured at the exotic woman. “Meghan this is Nicole.”

“Pleased to meet you.” Meghan said and extended her hand as she took a few steps towards Nicole. Who shook her hand and forced a smile on her face. Her stomach rumbled a little.

“Nice to meet you too. Although I thought Tamara had brought me a snack.”

“Oh you greedy guts, don’t you eat enough as it is?” Nicole’s stomach emitted a few noises to tell that it didn’t think she did.

“I guess not.” She said and patted her belly trying to calm it down a little.

“So what is it you study?” Meghan broke in.

“I study ways to avoid getting digested.”

“And how do you do that if I may ask?”

“Currently I’m trying to make my body secrete different things to keep stomach acids and enzymes and stuff from getting to me and also to neutralize them.”

She turned away from Meghan and made a motion towards a number of containers inside different laboratory fume hoods. Inside each container some slime was being attacked by different mixtures of acids and enzymes.

“The reason as to why I walk around here half naked is that when I need a new sample of goo, my body secretes the stuff all over. This way I can easily take a shower afterwards and wash it off.”

“So does it work this slime of yours?”

“It does in theory, the problem is that most who are experienced in vore start producing things that the stomach normally doesn’t, so it is hard to make a universal slime that protects you from everything.”

She made a pause and rubbed her tummy. “I haven’t tried it out yet so I don’t know how well it would work in reality. Besides, I don’t like being in other peoples’ stomachs, I prefer having them in mine. Well you have to excuse me ladies, because now I just have to get something to eat.”

She walked by Tamara and Meghan and disappeared down the hall, even though her body had dried off by now her hair was still dripping wet and she left a trail of droplets on the floor behind her.

Tamara spoke to Meghan as soon as she thought Nicole couldn’t hear her.

“Now she’s always ravenous. I think it is weird that someone who studies defensive measures eats so many people and is always on the attack. I’m quite sure no one here eats half the number of people she does. But then again she needs building materials for that slime of hers so maybe it isn’t so weird, just ironic.”

Meghan nodded her head. “I guess it is. But there’s one thing I don’t get. Is she going outside to hunt someone like that?”

“No she’s just going over to our storage. We always keep some snacks around and we often need test subjects. That was why she thought I was coming with a snack because they most often have no idea of what we are going to do to them and as she’s always hungry I’ve brought her some before.”
1111111111111111111111111111.title: Nicole.

11111111111111111111111111111.content:
The two of them start walking again and Tamara stops to open a closed door. The lights are out inside the room so she turns them on.

“I guess Daniela has gone home then. Too bad I would have liked you to meet her.”

Meghan looks inside the room and is surprised to see the things she sees in there.

“A car? And a boat?”

“Yeah, you never know what to find in here.” Tamara giggles.

“You see Daniela studies swallowing large objects. It is quite a sight to behold when she’s in action.”

“Yeah, I guess it adds to the fear factor when you see something huge go down one’s throat.”

Tamara turned off the lights and closed the door again.

“Well she’s not here to give us a demonstration, so I guess we could move on.”

The next stop was at a little fancier office. Tamara knocked on the doorframe.

“Excuse me Doctor.”

Inside sat a tall brunette bent over her keyboard, and she didn’t look up when she answered in a rather playful tone. “Drop the formalities Tamara, you know I don’t like it.”

“Sorry Tracey, it’s just that I’d like you to meet someone.”

Tracey looked up rather surprised.

“Meghan this is Doctor Tracey. Tracey this is Meghan.”

Tracey got up from her chair and greeted Meghan.

“So who might you be? You look a little young to be a post graduate student.”

“I’m professor Hawthorn’s daughter. Blainey offered me a tour of the place and Tamara agreed to show me around.”

Tracey giggled a little and got confused looks from both Meghan and Tamara.

“Well I just can’t imagine our professor with kids. So a professor with children just seems a bit weird to me. I can’t say I’m that interested in getting any myself. But I’m sure you’ve had an opportunity to learn vore like few have. Or haven’t your mother told you what she’s been working with until you were quite old?”

“No she showed us at a rather young age. I was about five the first time I swallowed Kimberly my older sister.”

“How old is she?”

“Twenty four. Why?”

“Ah, then it’s not the same Kimberly. She’s just twenty.”

“Same as who? And I’m twenty one, but thanks I guess.”

“Kimberly is the name of a girl who volunteered last semester to be test subject for a study we run along with some ladies over at the faculty of physics.”

A mischievous smile crept over her pretty face. A large lovely mouth and blue tingling eyes framed by long black hair made her look very sexy as it did.

”Well it’s more like I give them information they need and study their results and they do all the hard work.”

“Continue, tell her what you do.” Tamara ushered on as Tracey grew silent.

“Oh isn’t it little Miss nosy?” Tracey poked fun at Tamara.

“Well I guess it is harmless. Mostly just monitor the work going on around here and the project I told you about. Other than that I’m always looking for a vacant professorship to fill. I have been studying a few things, but now I don’t concentrate on anything particular, I pick up a subject as I feel like it, meaning that I have a few unfinished things lying around that I can work on when I have time to spare.”

“So what do you do Meghan?”

“Well currently I’m just studying math, biology and chemistry. Basically so that I can join a research team like mom’s or yours when I’m done. I don’t feel that v101 has anything new to teach me so I asked professor Blainey if she could start a more advanced course, and that was more or less the reason as to why she offered me to come down here.”

“Yeah I’ve heard about that, your mom and the professor spoke to me about it, they have been to the school council and are awaiting their decision. Or maybe they got word today, I don’t know. They just asked me if I would consider holding a few lectures for such a class and I told them I’d be delighted to.”

“That’s great! I didn’t know if Blainey took me seriously or not. Hopefully I’ll see you in class then.” Meghan said giddily as the stepped back outside since Tamara had motioned that they should continue.
11111111111111111111111111111.title: The good Doctor.

111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Tamara leads on and looks about, finally stopping at a door.

“Well there are more girls here, it just seems they’ve gone home for the day. With the exception of Aiko who hasn’t been here that much at all the last couple of weeks. I must say that I’m a bit interested in what she’ll come up with.”

“Aiko is a Japanese girl and she has looked into their history. She found that it would explain a lot if the real geishas knew vore. So now she is studying what she can find about the ways of the old Japanese traditions and reads just about everything she can find about geishas.”

“I don’t know when she is leaving, but the professor has already arranged for her to go to Japan and see if she can find something out.”

Tamara gets a dreamy look in her eyes.

“Just think if they do. I mean, you can say what you want about the Japanese, but they never do anything half assed. Look at their craftsmanship everything is body and soul a way of life that’s either done to perfection or not at all.”

“I can’t say, I honestly don’t know much about the Japanese.”

Meghan admitted and looked sort of confused as to why they stopped here if there wasn’t anyone here. Tamara noticed her expression.

“Well I guess the tour is over, because you’ve met everyone that’s here at the moment.”
111111111111111111111111111111.title: End of the tour.

choices: Meghan goes over to her mom’s lab.
1111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Tamara leads the way back to where they first met, and they both step through the large metal door.

“Thanks for showing me around.”

“No problem, I hope we meet again soon.”

“Well if that advanced course gets started we most likely will, there’s bound to be a need for talented TAs.”

“Then let’s hope so.”

“Tamara, there was one thing I wondered. Where’s my mom’s lab?”

Tamara pointed down a long corridor.

“If you go to the end of that corridor, you’ll be able to see a door like this if you look to your left. It’s behind it. But do you really think you should go over there?”
1111111111111111111111111111111.title: Out of the lab.

choices: The door remains shut, the light might signal something else…
11111111111111111111111111111111.content:
“Yeah, mom’s usually the last one to leave on Fridays. So since I’m already here, I might as well get a look at her lab. Besides I’m curious about whether she’s ok with me swapping knowledge with you. Blainey said she’d ask mom, but mom hasn’t brought it up.” Meghan say noticeably eager to get over there already.

“Bye then.” Tamara says signaling farewell. “Hope she approves.”

“Take care!” Meghan answers before she starts walking fast down the long corridor, leaving Tamara behind, who returns to her lab to finish whatever she was supposed to do earlier.

The corridor really was as long as it looked like and once the steel door closed behind Tamara, the only thing breaking the eerie silence is the tapping noise of Meghan’s shoes as she picks up the pace.

At the end of the corridor there is a door straight ahead and a short corridor to the right with only a single door to the right. And too the left another rather long corridor stretch out how long is hard to tell because only the closest lights are lit so the end of it lies unseen somewhere in the darkness ahead.

But that’s unimportant for now. More interesting is the familiar looking door that is just where Tamara said it would be. It looks just like the door leading to Professor Blainey’s lab down to the slightest detail, even the light on the lock shines green to signal it is unlocked.

Meghan sighed, she had feared that it might be locked, but it wasn’t sure yet, there just might be something wrong with the display. She grasped the handle, pushed it down and pulled…Oh goody!
11111111111111111111111111111111.title: Hawthorn's lab.

111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Meghan opens the door enough to get inside and let the door slide shut behind her. She looks around and sees a woman looking up from what she was doing, seemingly a little surprised. The woman stops what she was doing and comes over to greet Meghan, even a smile comes to her lips, but there is something business like about it. But then again there is something business like about the woman in general, who is a curly redhead with a full body, a bit thicker than average not plump or fat, but somehow there seems to be more of her than of the average woman. She’s dressed in a tight semi long sleeved top and a nice pair of cotton pants that gently hug her feminine curves.

“Hello there!”

Meghan puts on a smile in return and they shake hands.

“Hello I’m Meghan.”

“Alectra. What can I do for you?”

“Professor Blainey gave me a tour of her place and I thought I’d drop by to see what was happening over here.”

Meghan pauses and a very confused Alectra tries to make sense of her words, her face doesn’t show much though and Meghan continues before she comes up with anything to say.

“So what is it you do?”

The straight forwardness of Meghan catch Alectra off guard, but she knows she just can’t let anyone in here.

“Well most of us are working on the same project, though each one more or less on their own at the moment, because we explore different ways of getting similar result and then we are going to combine our different methods and experiences to achieve a better result.”

“I can’t tell you very much of the other ladies work, but mine is rather interesting. It would be easiest if I showed you though.”
111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Hawthorn's team.

1111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
“No please just tell me.” Meghan said.

“I’m not sure I can do that.”

“Why not? I’m Professor Hawthorn’s daughter, so you don’t need to worry about espionage if that’s what the problem is.”

“Oh you’re the professor’s daughter!? Why didn’t you say so at once? I almost turned you into a midday snack!”

“Well I thought you knew, I didn’t want to state the obvious. Like I said, Professor Blainey showed me the way down here so I thought I’d take a look in here and see if mom was around if nothing else.”

“If you really are Hawthorn’s daughter then I don’t see any harm in giving you a little tour.”

“I am, don’t worry.”

“Well then, we are all working on different ways to absorb more of a meal. In the end we will combine our techniques and experiences and hopefully get a great result.” Alectra said as she started walking down a hallway and Meghan could see people behind some of the doors, strangely enough most doors seemed to be left open.

“The whole idea is that if you can absorb more of the meal then you can go for longer periods of time without eating and also decrease your number of meals. As an added bonus there is less waste to get rid of when the meal has passed through your body, something that I believe most would appreciate. At least us experienced girls who tend to digest our meals in one go and not over a period of time. What I mean is that normal toilets usually can’t handle the kind of strain we often put on them. When we are done with this we hopefully won’t have to worry about finding a custom made toilet for our needs.”

As they had walked a bit Meghan understood why the doors were open, the people here used them too much for there to be any meaning in closing them again. Women seemed to pop out of every opening only to disappear into another, often carrying something with them.

“Won’t you just grow fat, if you absorbed more of the meal?” Meghan said as she came to the conclusion that even though there was a laboratory behind almost every door, the equipment in them had to differ, thus all the running about.

“Well you could if you didn’t get your body to handle the meal properly. Again it is a matter of knowledge techniques and hard work. This obstacle we have managed to get past though, so our bodies handle it much like it hides meals, meaning that you don’t look any different if you are good enough at it or unless you eat more than you can handle.”
1111111111111111111111111111111111.title: No, just tell me, please.

11111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
“Looks like your mom is still in her office.” Alectra says as they round a corner and see that the door to Professor Hawthorn’s office is open.

Another few steps and they both stop at the door opening and Meghan knocks on the door frame.

“Mom, are you busy?”

Professor Hawthorn drops the papers she’s holding and swings her office chair around to face the girls.

“Meghan! What are you doing here?!” She shouts almost upset, which startles Meghan a bit and she stutters.

“Eh…I…Blainey has given me a tour of her lab and when I knew you were still here I thought…”

“What if someone wouldn’t have recognised you when you stepped in here? Did you ever think of that? The work we do here is quite secret, especially since the public can be let to know anything of it.”

The professor pauses for a second or two to catch her breath.

“You…You could have been eaten! Meghan the girls here are told to eat intruders! And I’m not so sure you’d been able to stop them!”

A bit baffled Meghan lets her words sink in for a moment.

“I didn’t think of that, sorry! I actually thought you had shown your researchers who your daughters were so they wouldn’t try to eat us.”

“Well I never saw a reason, you were never at risk before and Kimberly haven’t ever been close to my team and they have all met Haley so they know to stay away from her.”

“Mom I’m attending the same school as your team is on, I really would appreciate if you told them to keep away from trying to eat me…And why is it they know Haley?”

“I’ve brought Haley to the lab on several occasions, she’s even been here since we moved. Now you wonder why I always do things with Haley instead of like I did when you were younger and use all of you girls.”

“It is because you and your older sister have had a whole lot more to do with your studies than Haley has, so she’s been free to help me. On top of that she is still growing, which has proven to be a big bonus and she has a talent to learn new things. Sorry to say it but she’s always been much better at learning new things than both you and Kimberly.”

Meghan can’t really argue with her mom.

“Well at least you are honest, but I’m not so busy I want to miss out on learning new cool things.”

“I guess you are right, maybe I should let you in on Haley’s and my little discussions at home, but please don’t come down here before I tell you it’s safe.”

Meghan nodded. “You know I’ve asked Professor Blainey to start a new class.”

“Yes, I actually thought it was a good idea, that way we get better trained researchers from the beginning. And seeing how popular v101 is, I don’t think there’s going to be a hard time finding students for it.”

“So what’s the status of it? Will there be one this semester?”

“It looks like it’s going to be, the school board said that we should make ourselves ready to start and that they would come with final terms on Monday. Sounds to me like a yes if ever I heard one, but it seemed they really had some issues they wanted to discuss amongst themselves first.”

The good news seemed to tear the tension in the room away and Meghan was almost giddy as she hugged her mother and turned back to the door.

“Great! I’ll see you at home then.”

“Alectra would you please make sure that Meghan gets out alright?” The professor said and Alectra nodded before she escorted Meghan to the door.
11111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Hi mom!

111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
As they move down the hallways Alectra can’t keep quiet any more, her curiosity doesn’t shine through though, she’s well in control of her emotions and the business like image isn’t broken.

“So you’re the one behind this new class idea? Why? If I may ask?”

“Well I recently realized that I have quite a bit still left to learn about vore.”

“Oh? With a professor in it as a mother I would have thought you’d have learned quite a bit and then some. Actually I would have thought that you wouldn’t want an advanced class since it’d take away your advantage over the other hungry girls around.”

“Hmm…didn’t think of it like that. It’s just that mom’s research has always been pretty specialized and Blainey’s seems to be more general so she’s covered topics mom never has, so I figured with an advanced class I could get some of Blainey’s tricks as well.”

“That explains a lot and yes, I guess you are right. Know of anything nifty you know she can teach?”

“Well yes, Blainey made the insides of her stomach glow, that was pretty cool, but mostly I’m just interested in more useful things, like escaping from a stomach and such.”

“That could come in handy I suppose, there are after all quite a few girls around here with an appetite.”

“I suppose there has to be, unlike home where I’m guessing we might have been the only ones. Never did run into anything that put up a fight anyway.”

“Almost sounds boring, then again I suppose a fight is only fun if not too much is at stake, or if you’re winning.” Arectra smirks.

“Never tried it much, only really had Kimberly to fool with.”

“Kimberly? Don’t you mean Haley?”

“Oh, no, Kimberly is our older sister. The two of us never really did much together with Haley.”

“Why not, if I may be so bold?”

Meghan looks around before answering.

“Well at first she was just too young to play with, I mean she’s almost seven years younger than me. And when she grew older, she started to simply creep Kimberly and me out, so we never really got that sister bonding with her.”

“Oh, sorry to hear that, she’s good you know. So what’s so bad with just having sparred with Kimberly? If I got it right you’ve been practicing for quite some time by now, it shouldn’t matter much that it’s just been the two of you.”

“One would think so, but we usually just let each other swallow the other, so there wasn’t ever much fighting practice. The only such I ever really got was when finding someone to eat, but you know how easy normal people are to eat.”

“Yeah, it’s almost silly. Can’t help but wonder, was I really that helpless once?”

Meghan giggle as she opens the steel door that she’d come through earlier.

“Yeah, you probably were.”

Alectra raise an eyebrow and steps outside after Meghan.

“So have anyone jumped on you here yet?”

“No, not yet, well Tamara did, she certainly took me by surprise, but Professor Blainey intervened.”

“I see. Would you like to try your skills against me?” Alectra says as the door shuts behind them.
111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Curious.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
“Some other time, Alectra.”

Meghan bid farewell to Alectra and returns to the room where she had met professor Blainey earlier. It is closed now and Blainey is obviously not there, so she figures it is time to go home.

Meghan realizes that she doesn’t have any idea off how long she’s been here, with no clock and with no windows she’ll only have a vague idea when she comes back outside.

As she opens the door Meghan is surprised to find that it is still bright outside, the sun probably won’t set for another few hours.

The clock in her car reveals that her visit only took a little under three hours, meaning that she might still be able to make plans for tonight. But then what to do, what to do?

Arriving home she’s determined that whatever she’s supposed to do, she’s got to take another shower and get some new clothes. She brushes of some of Tamara’s mucus, that’s formed a dry crust at places before she goes into the house.

She wanders about idly for a while, should she call someone? Sally maybe? Should she stay home and maybe go out and get someone to eat?

Her steps takes her to the backyard, where she finds the poolside empty apparently Haley is done with whatever she was up to and a glance at the pool tells that it is without water again and that it is not refilling, that makes a little fun by the pool out of the question.

Meghan continues to walk around, figuring that it is better to make plans before getting ready, so that one knows what to get ready for.

The TV room is empty. No damn it not TV on a Friday night, at least not alone.

Kitchen, also empty. Meghan looks at her tummy, yeah she should probably eat something, but in that case she’s more interested in eating someone. Going outside to get someone to eat isn’t exactly something that takes the whole evening so even though she should probably do that, what should she do after that?

By now it’s clear that Haley is probably upstairs studying something, maybe something interesting.

Meghan figures that it is probably a good time to come to better terms with her little sister. “Haley did say she could play nice too, didn’t she?” Meghan thought to herself as she continued to ponder what to do.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: The night is still young.

11111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Meghan figured that it wouldn’t hurt to look into what Haley was up to before deciding how to occupy herself for the evening.
