Soon enough she knocked on Haley’s door.

“Come in!” she heard from inside.

Meghan opened the door and was faced with a rather surprised Haley sitting by her desk in what wouldn’t pass for the average teenage room. Sure there was a large cosy bed, maybe unusually large since it was square and so big that Haley could lie in either direction and she was a bit taller than most.

There was also a desk with a computer, so far so normal. But then there were two more desks both covered in books and papers. On both sides of both these desks stood bookshelves packed with every sort of book normal teenagers would stay away from, as far as Meghan could remember she’d never seen Haley with your average novel in her hand.

At one of these book laden desks was where Haley was seated, still wearing the bikini from before, but she had also put on a pair of tight low cut jean shorts.

“Hi Haley, what are you up too?”

Haley lifted an eyebrow. “Isn’t that obvious?”

Meghan rolled her eyes as if to say “Duh!”

“So you are studying, but what are you studying, there are quite a few things one could look into in the world.”

“I figure it has to do with vore one way or the other though.” Meghan added and stepped into the room.

“Yeah, but why are you interested in what I’m studying? You’ve never shown any particular interest in it before.”

“Well they teach vore at school here you know and I realised that there were aspects of vore that I have never really given much thought and some I never heard of.” Meghan said as she walked up to where Haley was sitting.

Then she added: “Today for example I visited mom’s lab and Alectra told me how they studied ways of absorbing more of a meal, that way there would be less waste to get rid of too. You do realise how convenient that would be? No more need to find special bathrooms.”

Haley looked even more surprised than before. “Funny you say that. It is Alectra’s and a few other of mom’s researchers most resent reports that I am studying.”

“Most resent? So you know her techniques?”

“Well, I wouldn’t go that far. They’ve been at this absorption task for a while now, but all I get is reports to read. It’s not like they are any good step by step manual. Luckily I’m familiar with the terminology, but it is still rather frustrating. I do visit the lab every now and then and talking to them gives much more than any report does. But yes I’ve made progress from what I’ve been told and read.”

“So, you know all the girls takes on developing absorption techniques?”

“Yes.”

“So how does it work?”

“Jump in and I’ll show you!” Haley said and opened her mouth impossibly wide.

Meghan who stood just next to her felt like she would fall into the gaping hole which was large enough to take her on standing upright and instinctively she found herself jumping a good meter backwards.

“No thanks Haley, I think I’ll pass.”

Haley closed her mouth and gave Meghan a mischievous smile. “I was just kidding. Though come to think of it I am a bit hungry.”

At the mentioning of the ‘Hungry’ word Meghan’s stomach rumbled signalling that she was getting a bit hungry as well.

“I guess I am too.” Meghan said and rubbed her stomach lightly as if to hush it.

“Would you please bring something back for me when you go out?” Haley said and fluttered her eyes in a pleading fashion, trying her best to overdo the cuteness.

“Oh, when you said you were hungry I hoped you’d come with me.”
11111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Haley.

choices: Meghan upchucks one of the boys.
111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
“I don’t feel like it Meghan. Could you just get something for me too this time? Please!?”

“Well alright, don’t expect too much, I’ll probably just take the first ones I see.”

Haley didn’t seem too happy to hear that, but mumbled in agreement as Meghan turned to leave. “Well I guess beggars can’t be choosers.”

“Okay, I’ll be right back then.” Meghan said and soon she walked out the front door.

There wasn’t that many people out so after having walked down the street Meghan was happy to see that shaded by a couple of big trees was a bus stop and at it stood the only two people she could see except for herself. This was just too easy.

The two boys at the bus stop noticed her too, in fact they were eyeing her quite thoroughly.

Meghan when she got closer saw that the two people were in fact two boys, rather average built for highschool seniors such as they were.

It was at the other end of the beach though that she should meet up with the girls, so she headed that way. But then she notice that above Meghan are four feet treading water, then in a flash they are treading water no more as the slender blonde beneath them opens her mouth incredibly wide and suck down a tremendous amount of water and along with it not only the feet, but the whole of the owners of those feet as well!

Meghan tenses her gut and in doing so squeezes most of the water from her stomach, the force of the current pulls the apparently too loosely tied bikini-top from one of the meals and the skimpy pink garment flutters out of her mouth, but a second later she slurps it back up and swallows it down, not very keen on leaving behind evidence.

A glance at her pursuer tells her that the blond following her hadn’t expected that at all, the smaller curvier blonde had literally dropped her jaw. So to rub it in Meghan turned sideways and gently stroked her belly to show that there was not even a bulge.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Away!

choices: Meghan stays to have a look.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Meghan looked at the curvy blonde that had pursued her and brought a hand to her stomach as she felt the two she had just sent into it steal some of her attention as they launched a few harder, but still futile kicks to her stomach walls.

She had got what she set out to get hadn’t she? And she did outswim the girl before too, didn’t she?

Another look at the girl convinced Meghan that the girl probably weren’t even that eager to continue following her, so Meghan angled her head towards the bottom and started kicking away, picking up speed as she headed back towards the shore.

When she had gotten in over the shallows and put a hundred meters or so behind her she ventured a look behind her and found no pursuer, so she went up for air.

The racket behind her caught her attention and she turned around to find herself looking at the platform she had just visited and found that all its occupants were crowded in the middle of it, all standing close together and looking into the water. She thought she made out the word shark, but the water got in her ears all the time as the waves rolled by.

Yes, they definitely were shouting something about a shark. Getting an involuntary scare she pulled in her legs under herself and plunged her head under water to frantic look around.

Then her stomach’s occupants got her attention again. “Oh, I’m the shark” She thought. “Right…real smooth of me to grab a snack so discreetly…”

Putting a hand on her stomach as if to use it to feel what happened to her meal as they gave their final futile struggle against the suddenly very unfriendly stomach that closed in on them, Meghan kicked her way back to the surface and started swimming in towards the shore like normal people.

Not too far ahead she could see a cascade of water approaching and as it abruptly ended she saw a blonde girl in a bright red bikini dive and disappear below the surface. It took Meghan a second to realise that the girl was heading towards the platform with the frightened people. Lifeguard? Meghan wondered and continued her swim towards land.

It didn’t take her long before she reached the place where the lifeguard had dove into the water and Meghan stood up, figuring that then she could probably walk on in from here and realised that the water came up to her waist.

“She ran all the way here?!” Meghan’s mind reeled, both as it explained why there had been such a cascade of water and by the feat it was to run through that deep water, clearly this lifeguard girl had to know how to eat people and probably be quite good at it, it'd be no pushover that could run in water this deep.

A shiver of fear trailed down her spine as she looked back towards the platform as she realised that the blonde girl that had pursued her might not have been as much of a threat as Meghan had made her out to be, but she felt pretty sure of the outcome of a fight against this lifeguard girl, she guessed it’d end with her ready to come out of a red bikini covered bottom.

She picked up her pace more eager than ever to get back on land and felt much more at ease when she finally got there. She took in the view of the diverse lot of people scattered over the place, the shouts of shark didn’t seem to have caused much of a stir in here, in fact it looked like no one had cared, or perhaps they hadn’t heard over the swell of the waves, looking back she could tell the platform was quite far out.

That was a relief she thought, glad she hadn’t caused something that’d go into the newspaper.

Another issue troubled her, but the sight of the buildings up ahead calmed her some there appeared to be toilets behind the dressing rooms.

The smell assaulted her senses as she entered the building with stall doors lined up in a long row opening one she found herself surprised, in a positive way, it explained why the smell was so potent, but at the same time made it worth to put up with. She had expected a water closet, but instead found the sort of toilet they often have at music festivals, a bench like box built into the walls of the booth with a hole in it covered by a typical toilet seat, the hole leading to a large open container that’d be emptied regularly rather than the sewer system.

Unknown to Meghan there had actually been normal toilets there before, but due to a problem of them clogging up all the time and people leaving real messes that baffled the ones who had to take care of them, the management had decided to go back to this cruder set-up and it had strangely enough solved their problems.

It solved Meghan’s problems too, she had feared she’d be spending some serious time in there struggling to get her meal down the drain, especially since circumstances ended up granting her two. As it were now she could just unload them and with a disturbing barricade of wet noises they emptied into the container below, leaving Meghan ready to clean up in moments, not that she seem to need it, but she felt dirty.

In fact as she got out of there she headed back to the water to wash off. A quick dip later she felt much better and glanced out over the water, chance drawing her to the platform she had been at earlier and its occupants still looked nervous, it was a bit hard to tell over the distance, though It made her recall the girl that had headed out there.

She was a bit uneasy, she’d only ever really feared her little sister and even that fear was not the same, her sister wasn’t evil, she was sure, she’d only really eat her by mistake, but considering her appetite it was only healthy to have enough fear of the young girl to be cautious enough around her that such mistakes didn’t happen.

This was totally different, this girl Meghan was sure would be like the blonde that had followed her, quite willing to send her on a one way trip through her digestive tract, possibly even eager to hunt her down to get the opportunity of doing so.

She realized she was deep enough in the water to not really have a good view of the bottom around her and headed back into the wet sand part where the waves rolled in only to recede again and leave only soaked sand.

This she felt was fear like she never had felt it, what her mind told her, if she’d stayed out there? And she fussily remembered the instant when the cascade of water had turned into a glimpse of a woman in a red bikini.

She came to an unsettling conclusion that once again ended with a red bikini-clad bottom.

She didn’t get much of an image though, just another shiver of fear running through her and pumping some adrenaline into her flight ready system. She’d never needed to flee before though. It was a strangely thrilling sensation. Not looking upon another woman and wondering what she’d taste like, but instead being the one that should avoid notice so not be turned into a snack.

Her mind lingered on the girl that so occupied her mind, but she had never really gotten a look at her, she was both curious to how this girl looked that’d put such a scare in her just for the sake of curiosity, but realized it might be good to know what she looked like in the future, this might not be the last time she has to avoid getting eaten by the girl. A rationalization that led to a train of thought once again ending with that bikini-clad butt, what did it look like? Oh, did I just think that? She caught herself.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Back to the shore.

choices: Gets eye contact with the girl she’s been eying. (Jamie)
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Looking around her Meghan figured the girl might have already returned. At first she scanned aimlessly as if she was lost, then she mentally slapped her forehead and turned towards the closer one of two outlook towers as she was quite certain that the girl hadn’t come from the other one, finding it to be too far down the beach for that.

No, it looked empty so she turned her eyes back towards the water and did spot a blonde head poking out of the water, bobbing up and down with the waves. At first she couldn’t tell if the girl was swimming or walking and merely jumping up at times not to be washed over by the waves. A little while later she could tell it was the latter as more and more of the girl emerged from the waves. She didn’t seem to be in much of a hurry.

Realizing she was staring Meghan abruptly turned towards the shore again and made her way up to the beach store where things were a bit more crowded.

Making her way amongst the people here although avoiding the queues to the different parts she worked her way towards the outlook tower, or rather behind it. Occasionally casting a glance towards the water to determine how far the girl had gotten.

Eventually she stopped in the shade of one of the buildings waiting for the girl to return to her tower, whereas she had been quick on the way out she didn’t seem in much of a hurry now, in fact she only lazily climbed the steps of the wooden stair leading up to the outlook.

Meghan waited for her to turn her gaze back towards the sea before she casually started her own lazy stroll towards the tower, keeping far enough out from is so that the floor of the outlook wouldn’t block her view of the girl, well to some point it was inevitable. It meant that she had to walk up pretty close to the tower to be close enough to get a good view of the girl though.

The first she could make out was that the girl had fairly broad shoulders and a strong back, moving further out from under the tower she saw the well developed back curve into a waist that then buckled out where a pair of muscular thighs were complemented by a fairly large and firm set of glutes.

Moving forward a bit Meghan keeps to the side as she edges in front of the tower to see what the rest of the girl looked like and she finds a set of six-packs leaving bumps over an otherwise flat belly that’s crowned by a rather modest set of breasts. To her surprise the girl is really cute, somehow she hadn’t expected a round young face with big eyes and blonde playful curls going down to just beneath her shoulders, the wet strands clinging to her face and glistering in the sunlight.

She almost feel like going up and introduce herself, but then the sullen look on the cute girl’s face gets to her, clearly she didn’t get anything out by the platform and Meghan knows only too well what being tricked of a meal feels like and her eyes goes to the lifeguard’s strong looking abdomen. No, introducing oneself at this moment is definitely a bad idea Meghan decides and…
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Sneak a peek!

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Meghan slips into the shadow of the tower until she’s far enough in that she can’t see the girl and figures that that way she can’t be seen either and takes the same route she came, making her way up through the more crowded area around the store and rent building, before heading back north to the rocks again.

She finds Madeleine lying on her belly half snoozing in the sun where most of them had dropped their belongings. It looks quite nice, which makes her realize that she’s forgot to bring sunscreen.

“Um…Maddie, can I borrow some sunscreen?”

“Sure it’s over there in the big black handbag.” Madeleine mumbles and gestures lazily to some place behind her.

“Thanks!” Meghan says as she scavenges the area and then said bag for the item in question and begins applying the lotion.

The front is easy enough, but as she starts in on the back, places are a bit harder to reach.

“I’ll help you with that!” She hears someone call out behind her and see Annette hurrying up to their little ‘camp’. “Just lie down and I’ll fix it.” The girl smiles as she snatches up her towel and dries of quickly not really doing a very good job, she seems to be in too much of a hurry.

“Okay, thanks!” Meghan says as she lies down on her beach towel and hands Annette the bottle as she feels the girl straddle her back placing her wet thighs along her sides.

Annette begins by Meghan’s neck, she’s a little careful at first, but then she gets going, giving Meghan a bit of a massage at the same time as she’s rubbing in the lotion.

“Mmm… that feels nice…” Meghan coos as she relaxes and lets her head sink down on her arms, closing her eyes in the process.

Annette just smiles and continues down Meghan’s back, making sure not to miss a spot. Then she gets up and starts from her subject’s feet and moves up her legs, the massage turning more into fondling as she gains altitude. Then she’s just got Meghan’s behind left, she adjusts the fabric of Meghan’s green bikini bottom and then pulls at the top, like a gentle wedgie, causing the garment to form a string that digs itself in between her cheeks.

Applying plenty of lotion Annette sets about the task of rubbing it in, she’s quite meticulous about it, doing a very thorough job.

“Um…what are you doing Annette?” Meghan wonders after Annette has put lotion on but still continues to caress her behind.

“Just…just putting on sunscreen.” Annette blushes, but continues.

“You need to grope me for that?”

“Heh.” Annette chuckles and squeezes Meghan’s cheeks before giving one a bit of a slap. “There all done.” She says as she stands up and admires her handiwork, or perhaps just Meghan in general.

“Thanks.” Meghan mumbles.

“Anytime.” Annette assures her before sitting down on her own towel and fumbling about inside her bag for something to drink.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Take cover!

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Annette hardly has time to take a few sips before Sally joins them.

“I see you’re not much fun.” She teases the girls trying to relax.

Meghan looks up and sees that Robert followed close behind Sally.

“Hey, you said you’d be coming back.” He complains to Meghan who doesn’t have time to answer as Madeleine raises her head and butts in.

“Oh hi Robert! Looking good enough to eat, as usual, I see.”

Robert is stunned by the weird greeting. “Um, thanks Maddie…I guess.” He manages as he looks the big girl over, not quite expecting an invitation like that, she’d never flirted with him before that he could remember. He’d never looked at her much either, she did look somewhat fat with clothes on, but in a bikini he could tell it wasn’t quite true, she was quite curvy and true she was big, but clearly there was some muscles under there that kept most of the softness in decent shape, still she could loose a bit of that padding he concluded and turned his attention back to Meghan.

The reaction didn’t take long, Meghan was clearly more his type. Blushing a bit he turned around and walked slowly back towards the rocks while looking over his shoulder. “I’ll be down by the middle rock, come down later ok?!” He said as he left, fining it quite embarrassing to remain amongst the girls with a raging hard-on deforming his shorts.

“Sure.” Meghan mumbled, not quite loud enough for her to know if he heard her or not.

While Robert was sneaking glances of Meghan, Madeleine had sat herself up and were in turn eyeing him as he left. Sally and Annette soon left as well, leaving only the two sunbathers.

When they had gotten out of hearing range Madeleine’s stomach groaned unhappily and she started idly fondling it. The boy she was watching has gotten too far away to interest her anymore, so she turns her eyes to the peaceful girl a couple of paces away.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Disturbed.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
“Meghan? Do you really, you know?” Madeleine asks the tantalizing blonde next to her.

“Do what?” Meghan mumbles.

“You know, I think I really meant what I said to Robert.” Madeleine said sounding somewhat embarrassed.

“Oh about eating him?” Meghan smiled “Yeah, he does look rather tasty, doesn’t he?”

“So you do, then?” Madeleine paused not sure if she should continue but finally did anyway. “Eat people, that is.”

“Yes…” Meghan opened her eyes and looked at the girl she was talking to, she too was uncertain how to continue, this wasn’t exactly a conversation she’s had with anyone before, it’s just been natural to her to eat people, but she did realise that to most others it was not and these girls were learning to become the ones eating instead of being the food.

Madeleine looked at the girl, hoping that she would continue, but as she didn’t, she found herself searching for something to say and after a few moments of eye contact she at least found a question.

“Often?”

Meghan didn’t quite know what se should say. “I don’t know, I guess it’s about one a day or so. Is that often?”

Madeleine didn’t quite think her ears heard her right, she hadn’t been paying much attention at the breakfast table that morning, but Meghan had said something similar back then hadn’t she. “One a day…ehh…” she once again was lost for words and settled for the truth. “…yeah…that’s a lot.”

“It is?” Meghan pondered. “That’s good to know…” she said letting her head and the issue drop.

Madeleine’s stomach didn’t though, with a grumble it at least let it be known that those couple of sandwiches it got at breakfast had been a tease. At least that was how Madeleine interpreted it and she had this longing for meat.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Question.

choices: No, seriously, not here not now.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
“Meghan?” Madeleine queries the girl resting nearby. “Can you help me…you know…” Her stomach interrupts her with a demanding growl. “Um…get someone to eat?”

A little surprised despite their previous conversation Meghan looks up, that stomach noise had somehow made Madeleine’s request seem all the more sincere. “Well, I probably would help you with that…if my own little hunt earlier hadn’t been such a disaster. I almost got caught in the act…” She said eyeing Madeleine up, intriguing, another girl that actually intended to digest someone and to think she was in that stomach not too long ago. “Sorry, you’re on your own this time.”

“Aww, well that’s… too bad…” Madeleine muttered, feeling quite certain that she’d most likely need Meghan’s help to get someone without causing an uproar.

“Besides…” Meghan added. “Do you think it’s so wise running around with a giant squirming bulge out here?”

“Hey! I actually think I pulled that hiding thing off quite well last night!”

“Oh? You did didn’t you? I had almost forgot.”

“Yeah thanks to you though, I have to admit, I don’t think I saw any of your techniques in the book.” She said and waived the piece of literature she’d been reading, which apparently was the v101-book.

Another really unhappy grumble form her gut brought her back to the issue at hand.

“Um…do you have any suggestions on how to fix this then?” Madeleine said poking her gut.

“Burgers?”

“Nah…I’d ruin myself if I’m half as hungry as I feel…” Madeleine said rubbing her groaning middle. “Unless the clerk would be so kind as to jump in between two slices of bread…”

“Yeah, that’d be my kind of burger.” Meghan said with genuine approval, her mouth salivating some despite the fact that she just ate.

The talk of food and eating really didn’t calm Madeleine’s stomach, she clutched it as with a growl the hunger pains started setting in.

“Meghan please, can’t you help me out this once?!”
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Help?

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Not really feeling like it at all Meghan reluctantly got to her feet, she sure as hell weren’t going back to the main beach and make another mess in that crowded area.

“Alright then, but I’m not going back down there.” Meghan pointed to the main area. “You’ll have to pick something out up here.”

“Oh, well that’s fine.” Madeleine assured. “I really wouldn’t mind Robert anyhow…” She said and licked her lips.

“No, not Robert…” Meghan said and got a confused look from the big girl. “Sally made me not eat him earlier, so I’m pretty sure she’ll be pissed if you eat him. Besides I thought you were friends?!”

“I see and no we’re not friends I hardly know him, said ‘hi’ a few times is all. I suppose Sally and Becky knows him though, I’ve seen the two of them talk with him a bit.” Madeleine said and she felt a little embarrassed “It was just that seeing him is what got me all worked up, that’s why I said I wanted him, honestly, I wouldn’t eat friends.” She defended herself.

“Alright…” Meghan said a bit sceptical. “But you’re the one who knows who the friends are, so you still need to come with me and pick one out.” The Meghan said and gave Madeleine a hand. It looked a little weird with the tall svelte blonde helping the brunette almost twice her size up, the odd part being that the slimmer girl almost picked the large girl up using only one hand.

“Hey watch it!” Madeleine yelped as she struggled to get a stable footing. “You don’t need to be so rough!”

“Sorry.” Meghan snickered, but instead of letting go she started dragging the big brunette along with her towards the water. Madeleine needed a few steps before she caught up and only then did Meghan let go.

The two of them quickly reached the water, there wasn’t much sand here as the waves crashed in, it was a much rougher passage from land to sea, with shallow cliffs and rocks either continuing out to the rocky peninsula Meghan had visited earlier or directly into a rough sea which clearly became quite deep straight away.

“You’re getting in here?” Madeleine said confused and looked at the waves that battered against the rocky shoreline.

“Well yeah, I was going to make a stealthy approach…” Meghan said and continued. “…not good to let anyone see you neither before nor after you grab a meal.” She said as she found a spot that she felt comfortable diving from.

Turning her gaze outwards she could make a couple of guys out on the tall rock, they were really the only ones she could see from where she stood. “Are those two friends?” She asked motioning towards the two boys.

Madeleine shielded her eyes from the sun, but they were really quite far away, she couldn’t really tell…

“Ahh forget it.” Meghan said as one of the boys made the jump. “They aren’t gonna be there when I get out there anyway.” She sighed and motioned for the large brunette to move. “Get on out there and be ready to nod or shake your head as I get out there.” Meghan said and dove into the water.

The currents were quite strong, luckily so was she and with a bit of effort she managed to get clear of the worst parts, diving a little deeper she managed to avoid the pull of the waves as well. She didn’t know her surroundings well enough though so when she came up to take a look she found that she was already pretty close to the high rock. She had to wait several minutes before Madeleine arrived on a nearby ledge, during which time she struggled to avoid getting detected, she thought she succeeded, if for no other reason than that the people jumping didn’t seem to look around much, mostly they just looked down and then at the spot where they were going to land.

Most of the jumpers seemed to be jumping in pairs or more, one urging the other in a competitive or dare-like manner, occasionally there were single jumpers though, if they didn’t want to wait up there being all wet and exposed to the wind or if they were eager to jump before their friends got up and beat them to it, or if they were indeed there on their own to enjoy the thrill of the jump. It didn’t matter in the end, the result was the same, they were jumping alone and that made them all the better target because no second pair of eyes would be looking for them right after their jump.

Seeing one such jumper Meghan got into position and looked for Madeleine’s signal. She was nodding, so Meghan dove and swam closer to where the jumpers usually impacted the water. She didn’t have to wait more than just a few seconds before the boom-like sound reached her ears and a pillar of bubbles formed right in front of her.
She didn’t waste a moment, instantly she thrust forward into the bubbles and as the jumper came to a halt and started back towards the surface she intercepted. The bubbles blocked most of her vision all she could see was movement in the waster and the creamy colour of bare skin, luckily it was all she needed, opening wide and sucking in quite a bit of water she got most of the person’s upper body in her mouth before she closed it around them and sucked the poor jumper into her throat, swallowing the person quickly and without much problem.

She turned around before more jumpers arrived and swam away as quickly as she could. Having gotten a fair distance she approached the surface and did her best to force the water out of her stomach in the process and succeeded well enough. It didn’t leave much air in her stomach either though so she quickly swallowed some down to her captive before heading back to the shore.

From the sea she could tell that she had chosen one of the lousiest parts to enter the water, not feeling like climbing slippery rocks with waves crashing in around her and currents pulling at her she swam further north were things turned more beach-like again although it was more rocky and the sand more like smooth gravel rather than sand, which explained the lack of people here.
The detour did make her journey quite a bit longer though, taking her long enough to get back on land and head back to their camp for Madeleine not only to get back but also tiring of waiting and going up the shore to meet Meghan halfway.

Meghan could hear Madeleine’s complaining gut even before she could hear her steps rustling in the gravel and figured the girl must be quite eager to get her meal into it, so Meghan started to bring the one she had caught back into her throat and edging the person slowly upwards, getting ready to feed Madeleine like some bird mother.

“Don’t forget to hide as much as you can.” Meghan said to Madeleine and grasped the girl by her shoulders stopping the girl from saying anything by placing her lips tight against the other girl’s lips and opening the brunette’s mouth with her tongue, turning the contact into a strange kiss as she started to bring the meal back up into her own mouth.

It struck her as a little odd, she hadn’t gotten a look at the meal at all, she didn’t even know if it was a boy or a girl. At least she figured she’d get the answer to the latter once they started sliding over her tongue.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Alright!

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
The head entered her mouth and she could tell the hair was cut fairly short, moving her tongue around a bit to feel and keeping the meal pinned she could tell the shoulders were fairly broad and as the chest started to slide across her tongue she could feel that there was no garment there and if it was a girl then she didn’t have any breasts. The narrow hips covered in shorts convinced her that it was a boy, not that it mattered, she was just mildly interested just because she didn’t get to see the meal first and as it was entering Madeleine’s mouth and disappearing down her throat as quickly as she brought it up she wouldn’t get to see it after she had brought it back up either.

Robert hadn’t jumped the big rock before Meghan challenged him earlier, but after he had the smaller one just seemed boring, he couldn’t get Sally to try it out though and as Meghan didn’t return he finally went there on his own. Standing on the high rock looking down over the sheer cliff it took him quite a while to gather the courage to jump, it had really helped when Meghan had just jumped and forced him to do the same without thinking. Now he didn’t have anyone to dare him or encourage him, so he stood there watching several guys make the jump before eventually doing so himself.

It was even more thrilling than the first time, the first time he had just jumped without thinking this time he really experienced the thrill, adrenalin pumped through him, it was quite a rush and he was shaking as he climbed back up the rope, waiting for a moment once back on dry land before deciding to climb to the top and make the jump again.

This time he didn’t hesitate, he just threw himself out over the edge almost as soon as he had climbed up there and felt the air rushing past him, chilling his wet body before the shock of the impact jolted his body and water rushed up all around him as he plunged several meters into the warm waters, finally coming to a halt and feeling the bubbles formed by the air that got carried down along with him tickle his skin as they stopped going downwards and floated back to the surface faster than he could.

Just then something dark came over him and he felt a strong pressure clamp down on him, he thought for sure a shark had attacked him, but he felt no teeth and just he started struggling the creature swallowed, to his surprise all of him. He quickly slid down its throat and entered what he knew must be its stomach. To his surprise there was ample room in there even air and he took a breath of it as his lungs were aching from holding his breath and struggling, that it was breathable surprised him a lot.

He couldn’t see anything, it was pitch black in there so he struggled at random while he sensed the creature swimming away. The initial panic eventually mixed with enough confusion so calm him down just a little bit. For one he realised he wasn’t hurt, he had been swallowed whole without getting as much as a scratch or bruise. Then there was the air in the stomach and the room, what creature is large enough to have that much room inside and keep air around? A whale? He realised that the air didn’t smell strange, he’d have expected a vomit like smell or something and came to the conclusion that the liquid he was sitting in wasn’t acids, but seawater.

Just then the stomach walls closed in on him and pinned him so he couldn’t move and he felt the air and water being pushed out, this was more what he had expected from a stomach, was this the end? He thought so and was surprised again as the stomach relaxed once more and filled back up with air, even fresher than before.

He manoeuvred himself in the dark, beating the walls clearly didn’t help him much and soon enough he found the entrance to the creature’s throat, it was shut, he couldn’t get the sphincter to budge, even though he several times felt it open slightly only to have air leave the stomach and then feel the wind of new air rushing in.

It was quite abruptly that he fell head over heals as the creature changed direction or posture, he fell away from the opening tumbling along the side of the stomach until he came to a halt with the opening somewhere in the darkness over his head and well out of reach. Then the stomach started swinging and regular jolts shook it. It confused him a lot and had he known that Meghan had stopped swimming, stood up and started walking instead it would have made so much more sense to him.

After a while of failing to climb the walls and fruitless punching and kicking at them the walls once more closed in on him, luckily they didn’t crush him and he didn’t feel himself being covered in any acid, instead they rhythmically brought him upwards towards the opening he had found earlier and forced him through it. He couldn’t believe what was happening, the creature was regurgitating him!

His arms were pinned to his sides, in fact all of him was tightly held in place by the strong muscles of the throat that was slowly bringing him back up, until he finally felt the angle and surroundings change, he felt the rough taste buds of a giant tongue against his face and squirming to get some air he managed to twist his head enough to have the rough slimy surface slide along his right ear instead and managed to exchange the contents of his lungs in the process.

As more of him was brought up he tried to struggle but it was no use, the more he did the stronger the creature clamped down on him and that was not only uncomfortable, it also left him with very little air. So he stopped struggling altogether and let himself be brought up feeling the tongue of the creature move him around, if he’d have to guess he’d have said it was tasting him. Then he saw up ahead that the creature’s mouth was open and a little bit of light sipped in breaking the total darkness he had been in. He couldn’t see much of the mouth he was in, but he saw that there was another one lined up outside it, illuminated by an eerie red light as the sides of it wasn’t thick enough to block out all of the light but colouring what sipped through to this red shade.

What surprised him the most was that it looked like a human mouth. That was as much as he had time to take in before his head entered the second mouth and he found that it wasn’t nearly as spacious as the first one, whereas his entire body had fit on the tongue of the first mouth his head alone filled the second mouth. A quick swallow forced his head into the throat at the back of the new mouth and he began struggling again. This caused the first mouth to clamp down on him again and he felt it push him out of it, effectively forcing him down the throat of this second creature. Once it started doing that the process didn’t take long, just a few seconds and he felt the new creature’s not so roomy stomach stretch as he was crammed into it while the lips closed around and then behind his toes before a couple of swallows forced his feet down the throat to join the rest of him inside the cramped and groaning stomach.

Now he was seriously scared, this stomach clearly contained acid and hardly had any air in it, it was also churning him rather painfully. When he thought that was bad enough it felt as if the churning was getting harder and like the puddle of juices he was resting in was getting deeper.

“Ohh thanks Meghan…” Madeleine moaned softly after their lips had parted and she had swallowed the last of the boy down, while she rubbed her bloated gut.

“Hide girl before someone sees you.” Meghan hissed between her teeth trying not to make to much sound while still emphasizing the urgency. She used her hands and body to try and cover as much as she could of the bloated girl pressing herself up against the girl’s front in a strange hug.

“I’m working on it! Don’t pressure me! I’m trying to get the techniques straight in my head…” Madeleine whispered back. To Meghan’s relief she felt the huge ball that she was holding and also happened to be Madeleine’s belly, shrink away under her touch. It felt really interesting and she tightened her embrace on the larger girl so that she could continue to feel her shrinking belly against her own until the girl she was hugging had no more of a bulge than that it could be passed for normal flab.

She took a step back and took in the view, she had never really watched a stranger eat someone before their harmless practice last night didn’t really count. That there was someone in Madeleine’s stomach helplessly trapped was strangely exciting. Madeleine’s pleased expression as she caressed her shrinking middle certainly didn’t change that.

She stopped and Meghan saw her look down at her stomach between her ample breasts and realised that Madeleine’s belly was down to a size that she didn’t believe even her friends would notice. Just then Madeleine stepped up to her and whispered in her ear.
“Would you teach me how to digest him quickly?”

Some desire in Madeleine’s voice and the concept made Meghan’s knees quiver, she felt herself get a little wet right there and then. The thought of the poor boy trapped in Madeleine’s big gut as it quickly turned very unfriendly and turned him into quick snack appealed to something sinister inside her. She couldn’t quite trust her voice so she just gave Madeleine a mischievous smile and nodded.

Leaning forward and whispering in her ear Meghan began to explain a few things, for one she was quite certain that most of the techniques would get a lot better as the girl’s stomach learned to produce acids and enzymes, as many of the techniques were based on making the stomach do what it could faster where as the others were teaching it to produce new things which took time and practice. Still she had a few hints to give and then she felt the stomach rumble and squirm as it churned its meal under her grasp and she realised that she was fondling Madeleine’s belly. She hadn’t done it on purpose, but it had just happened, Madeleine didn’t seem to mind the belly rub though and just smiled as Meghan stopped, looking a little surprised and embarrassed.

“This seems to take a while…” Madeleine said rubbing her belly. “Let’s head back before the girls wonder what we’re doing out here.” She smiled and Meghan nodded her consent.

Their camp was still empty, but that was probably just luck on their part so they hurried back and lay down again like nothing had ever happened. It was more pleasant this time though Madeleine liked the full feeling and Meghan found the quiet gurgling sound of the big girl’s stomach soothing and she fell asleep just minutes after having put her head down on her sand-padded beach towel.

While Meghan slept Madeline returned to her v101-book, it unfortunately didn’t cover much that involved speeding up the digestion, just a few techniques, together with the couple Meghan had described to her it’d have to do for now. Turning around so that she was lying on her back instead made reading harder, but it felt better and she couldn’t help but gently rub her belly as she felt the boy inside slowly liquefy and drain into her intestines. While still on her back she tried to read what the book had to say on the intestines, which wasn’t much. Or rather it was quite wordy in describing the reasons and workings but there were amongst all the pages of text only a couple of techniques. Clearly it was called 101 because it was basic. Frowning a little she put the book away and concentrated on enjoying the feeling of reducing the boy to mere nutrients, her body seemed to crave them and if she didn’t think eating a fully grown person was quite enough she’d have said that she’d want more, several more…

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Abby felt a lot better now that the work was done. She and several of her classmates had come to school today despite it being a Saturday to finish their reports, they only worked in pairs of two, but seeing as the assignment had been the same there was always strength in numbers and they had agreed to go downtown for some shopping afterwards. Six girls had showed up, none of the guys seemed that enthusiastic about going shopping, she suspected that was the reason to the no-show, they’d still had to finish their reports as everyone else though.

Still that was none of her problems anymore, she had just turned in the report and felt pretty confident that it would pass without much of a hassle, that was the big win in teaming up, other teams often saw when your thoughts had pulled you in the wrong direction and together one could weed out many if not most of the red marked pointers the report would otherwise contain when one got it back.

She shook the worries from her mind, it’d be fine, in fact she’d probably get an A. Now was not the time for school anyhow, now was the time for making up for having to come to school, she and the girls were going to have a great time she was sure. She gave a smile to her partner in crime who walked by her side as she thought about their upcoming shopping orgy and heard the two other girls giggling behind her as they left the school grounds and turned down the road leading through the residental blocks that separated them from the city center and all the fancy stores.

Trying to see the two girls who had ran ahead she shaded her eyes, but saw nothing. They had been in quite a hurry, both of them out of cigarettes and the only smokers around. She couldn’t help but giggle and at the same time be thankful she never started smoking.
Well she was certain they’d catch up with them later, probably finding them standing by the road further down choking on multiple smoke sticks to make up for the ones they didn’t get earlier.

A noise behind her made her look over her shoulder, but she didn’t see anything out of place, just a young black American woman following in their direction, so she kept on going before she realised she hadn’t seen the other team and put her hand on her friend’s shoulder while she stopped and turned around to look for where they went. As she did the woman behind her almost walked right into her, almost…

The woman’s smile was the only thing Abby saw before she was staring down her throat. She hadn’t stopped walking either, so Abby found herself shoved straight down into it and with a suck and swallow the woman sent her on her way down, without missing a step.

The strong muscles of the woman’s throat somehow surrounded all of her, it seemed impossible that all of her could fit inside just the woman’s throat, but then it seemed impossible to be swallowed by someone in the first place.
As she was squeezed downward, toward a place she didn’t want to think about, she found that she was held way too tight to even move. Her mind reeling from what was happening, she was finally shoved into a giant stomach, inflated it would seem as the walls didn’t hold onto her and instead she fell a short distance. That was all she managed to register before her friend crashed down on top of her.

Hands grasped her from all around and helped her get up. Or as much as that was possible as not only did the walls and floor move, but they shifted and the entire stomach rose and fell and swayed as the woman who owned it kept on walking.

Abby looked around and found that people were using their cellphones as flashlights.

“None of us seem to be able to get a signal…” a boy told her.

She scrambled for her own and so did her friend, but it was the same. “Neither do I.” They said in near unison.

Looking around in the dim light she could tell that the six of them hadn’t gone shopping, but gone to this black woman’s stomach instead, all six of them were in here as were nearly a dozen others. The only positive thing she noticed was that the air seemed fine although clammy and warm, but there was no indication of any acids.

Lorena rubbed her slight potbelly and felt the people inside it wiggle about. Just a few more and she would have done her share, a few more and she could just sit back and enjoy the feeling of them squirming in her belly for the rest of the day.

Catching people had been her task because she was good at it and she wasn’t half bad at hiding them either, which was pretty essential when you were catching many. She’d not been the only one getting this task luckily, though it seemed only girls from Hawthorn’s team had been given this task. Didn’t Blainey have any girls that could chase down a crowd? They’d know where to find one anyhow, which would have been useful, she on the other hand had just got to this city and not knowing where to look had tried the grab people off the street approach, which surprisingly had worked well enough. She only hoped the other girls were as successful.

She groaned as her stomach complained a little, hauling this many people around sure worked up an appetite and the thought crossed her mind of digesting them all herself right then and there, but then she’d have to start over and brushed the thought aside, concentrating instead on catching up to the couple that just stepped out of a house a few meters ahead of her, they seemed to be going for a car, but if she could help it she’d be the one giving them a ride instead.

--------

Despite being a Saturday the research ground was a pretty busy place, the buildings encircled a nice well trimmed lawn with just a couple of trees and the sun was shining. Things looked as good as they could hope for, with any luck they wouldn’t have to take the party indoors.

All around the yard girls from Blainey’s research team were busy doing something while several of the girls from Hawthorn’s team stood around looking fairly lost trying to help as well as they could, but not really knowing what to do or where to find what needed to be fixed, clearly it had been a smart move to leave the catching snacks to the Hawthorn team.

As it were tables and chairs and music and all the usual stuff were slowly coming to place as were a couple of other none typical party items such as makeshift showers, the girls had brought water out from a few windows to fuel them what they were for Lorena couldn’t tell as she stepped out the door of one of the buildings and slowly walked down the steps leading onto the lawn.

Things were starting to look pretty neat she admitted, lights were being brought up for later and she heard a click as someone just finished installing the sound system and a soft sweet beat filled her ears. No sooner did she hear half of the girls shout “Turn it up!” and the beat started pumping into her veins.

Looking around as confused as most of the other Hawthorn girls she saw several of the girls from Blainey’s team start to assemble something, she couldn’t really tell what it was, looked a little like a small stage with stuff on it. Were they plugging in a pipe to it? She thought she saw a girl walking towards it with what looked for all the world like a toilet, but she didn’t get to confirm that as someone grabbed her shoulder and swung her around.

“Nice, you’re back already!” She heard the busty blonde girl say as she felt a hand place itself on her swollen middle and stroke it. “Let’s get them ready for tonight shall we?” The girl smiled at her and with a firm grip on her arm led her away to a place where a number of garbage cans were lined up.

They stopped in front of the row and the girl turned to face her again, reaching behind the cans to a table the girl grabbed a bottle and shoved it into Lorena’s hand. “Be careful, just take small sips, we don’t want all of them to come up at once.” The girl said.

Lorena eyed the bottle with the yellow-orange contents sceptically. “What is it?”

“You don’t know?” The girl looked surprised. “Don’t you ever throw people you’ve swallowed back up?”

“Sure I do, but we don’t use some witches’ brew for that.” Lorena said and shoved the bottle back to the girl. “I’ll bring them up one at a time. You ready?” She asked and saw the girl scramble to put the bottle back on the table.

“Ok, I’m ready.” And as soon as she had said that Daniela saw the wet brown hair of a girl’s head start to emerge from Lorena’s ample lips, she gave the black girl a quick kiss as she sucked the head into her own mouth and stepped away so that part of the woman’s body was exposed between them. She started tearing the clothes from the girls body, with her mouth full she couldn’t say anything, but Lorena seemed to get the idea and soon the naked skin of the girl was sliding down Daniela’s throat as quickly as she emerged from Lorena’s, her clothes ending up on the ground in tatters during the transfer.

In this fashion they continued to transfer people from Lorena to Daniela, sometimes it was a boy and some came up feet first, but it didn’t make much difference they were all stripped naked and transferred without as much as a hitch. The only pauses came from the girls gathering up the clothes and stuff and tossing it into the trash bins.

After a while Daniela halted Lorena. “Damn! How many have you got in there?!” she asked forcing Lorena to swallow the girl she had in her throat back down in order to answer.

“Don’t know exactly, I had a bit over twenty to start with, I lost count…”

“Well I’ll just take one more, then we have to find someone else to take the rest.” Daniela groaned holding onto her swollen gut, she was sure that she could take all of them, but then she’d be so swollen that she’d waddle around like a pregnant woman. The ten people in her stomach made it bulge out as far from her skinny waist as her enormous breasts did from her chest and she was front heavy enough under normal circumstances. Admittedly she was impressed, this dark skinned lady hadn’t sported as big a belly as the one she had now, when she had fist come back from her hunting and according to the woman she hadn’t even transferred half of them yet. Daniela thought she was good at managing a crowd, that’s why she usually had to work as storage during these parties and it was also the reason that she’d been put in charge of the clean-up transfers, but clearly this ebon damsel was much better than her at this, she didn’t even need the vomit juice, that made things a whole lot easier too.

Daniela swallowed one last time and felt the girl settle in her stomach, before helping the girl if front of her gather up the scattered clothes and items at their feet and shoving it into a trash bin.
“Sorry…” She excused herself and extended a hand. “I guess I was so busy thinking about what had to be done to remember introducing myself. I’m Daniela.” She said and was rewarded with the other girl’s full lips spreading into a big smile as she took the hand.

“Don’t fret it. I’m Lorena.” She said and then looked down on the slight bulge in her smooth ebon belly. “So who should I give these to then?”

“Umm…” Daniela started as she looked around. “…There seems to be a few girls from your team that doesn’t have anything to do, if one of them is half as good as you they’d be able to hold the rest.” Turning back to Lorena she added. “So you tell me, you know them better than I. Come to think of it, would you mind helping me clean all the catches up? There are after all more girls out hunting.”

“Sure I’ll help!” Lorena smiled and looked around. Daniela was right there were several girls standing around doing nothing, she noticed Sophia was one of them and got the girl’s attention as she walked on over.

“I’m surprised.” Lorena stated with all sincerity. “Why weren’t you one of the hunters Sophia?”

The Latino beauty struck a pose for her and smiled. “Honestly I’m not that good at it, I tend to draw too much attention to be able to snatch anyone.”

It wasn’t bragging, Sophia was the type with a long slender face, hard eyebrows, piercing eyes, a slender uppity nose and pouty lips. But despite her striking and pretty face her body was more enticing.
Like many Latinos she has a thicker build despite not having any fat that didn’t look good on her, fairly broad shoulders curving into a slender waist make for a nice chest topped with ample enough breasts even if they wouldn’t pass for large. Then there’s the other side of her waist, wide hips endowed with a large firm butt that’s attached to thick shapely thighs making her a prime example of Latin curves and beauty. She does indeed draw the attention of many around her, which to her dismay means that she can’t eat anyone until those around her are limited to those going down and her friends.

“I see how that might be true.” Daniela admitted a little taken, but forced a smile on her lips, she shouldn’t be jealous, she couldn’t complain on her own looks and the whole idea of this was to make friends.

“Well, it’s a good thing you’re here, we kind of need your help getting the snacks naked. Come with us.” Lorena said and headed back to the trash bins with Sophia and Daniela in tow.

The three of them soon had the last people stripped naked and transferred to Sophia’s stomach and to Daniela’s dismay she realised that Sophia was at least as good as Lorena as the bulge she got wasn’t large enough to take any appeal away from her figure.

They also came to the conclusion that it was handier to have Sophia carry the snacks than Daniela seeing as she didn’t need purge juice to get them back up, making the transfer was a little tricky though as Daniela literally vomited them up instead of regurgitating them in the controlled fashion Lorena had done, she also got several up at a time instead of one after the other which also made things messier and more hectic.

Soon enough all twenty-four people that Lorena had initially caught were trapped inside Sophia’s bulging belly.
“I’ll go and sit down then.” Sophia said and looked for an out of the way place to sit. “See you girls later.” She smiled as Daniela and Lorena waved a girl over who had just returned from hunting.

Daniela felt a little intimidated by the girl, especially as she herself had Barbie like traits, but this girl pulled it off even better, she was taller, had a more athletic build and was at least as pretty, so it was with some satisfaction Daniela noticed that at least she had the larger breasts, not by overly much, but on her smaller frame the difference looked greater, hers looks huge while Lauren as the younger woman was called only looks like she has large ones because of her taller frame.

While they moved the catch from Lauren to Lorena and then when naked back to Lauren again the booze had finally started flowing, Blainey’s team had managed to acquire more alcohol than Lorena had ever seen and they were still bringing in various containers containing a clear liquid that she was certain was more pure alcohol. At one table they were mixing it with various sodas to make strong sweet drinks that left the table as quickly as they could make them.

“That’s a lot of alcohol…” Lorena said and motioned towards the booze tables.

“Yeah, we’ll need it. I take it you haven’t tried getting hammered after learning how to swallow people?” Daniela said.

“No, come to think of it, I’ve had quite a bit to drink, but it’s never really gotten me tipsy.”

“Well there you see. Then there’s the fact that one tends to sober up quite a bit when you digest a meal, it sort of cleans up your system somehow. Trust me, you’ll see some serious heavy drinking tonight, especially once we start digging in on the snacks.” A smile spread across the blonde’s lips, clearly she was looking forward to at least one of those things.

Katie was the next girl to come in with a catch, she sported as large a bulge as Lauren had and Daniela felt relieved when she had handed them over to Lorena, with her body back to normal, she could see that this girl was more human, an average smooth gentle build and a pretty face made this brunette quite attractive but not as intimidating as the other two she had just met from Hawthorn’s team even if she was just as tall as Lauren, at least she had just carried ten people and not over thirty like Lauren had, once stripped she got them back too, which meant that they were only waiting for one more girl to return with her catch.

Daniela and Lorena decided to get something to drink in the meantime and Lorena was surprised when she got her drink, they weren’t fooling around, by Daniela’s earlier tone she had expected fairly strong but sweet drinks and that it was, but she hadn’t expected to get it served in a bucket rather than a glass. Then Daniela bumped her bucket into hers in a cheers-like manner.
“Bottoms up!” The blonde challenged and tipped her head back as she emptied the bucket down her throat.

Lorena was a bit sceptical, but several girls started to cheer her on and she copied Daniela’s feat and handed the bucket back to one of the bartenders who took all of five seconds to refill it. A little daunted by a new bucket-load of alcohol she took her bucket and stepped away before she was coaxed into downing it again, fearing a bit how the first bucket would affect her once it kicked in.

It wasn’t long after that that Emily returned, another blonde Barbie-girl Daniela noted, much the same build as Lauren, though noticeably shorter, her long straight hair was really pale blonde too instead of Lauren’s auburn, just as pale as Daniela’s own long wavy blonde hair. Emily didn’t look like she had been very successful. She did sport a bulge, but nothing as big as any of the other girls, cleaned and counted they made for another sixteen, which by Daniela’s standard was actually pretty good, all in all they had at least twice as many snacks as she had counted on getting which she really couldn’t complain about, perhaps they wouldn’t need to raid the store rooms…heck who was she kidding, emptying out the store rooms was one of the best parts of a party…

The mingling had started quite a while ago, not long after the booze arrived actually, but once they were done with the snacks it was actually beginning to seem like a real party, dancing and chatting everywhere. Lorena went to see if Sophia needed a hand with the snacks seeing as she couldn’t really drink anything with them in there, but she found that they had already helped each other, by trading them back and forth, a rather intimate ordeal that loosened the girls up all the more. Lorena got a few “You go girl!”, “Whoohoo!”’s and “Use more tongue!” when she took the snacks from Emily so that she could get something to drink.

With the sun having set Lorena was decidedly having a good time and was getting decidedly tipsy. She had traded snacks all evening but only with her own team, she tried a couple of times with girls from the other team but they only gave her a kiss or only accepted one snack, it took her a while before it got through to her intoxicated brain what she had heard earlier, the word being spread around that holding the snacks was a task for those that didn’t need the vomit potion. It made sense enough even if her ability to determine what made sense had become seriously impaired, she hadn’t even reflected over the fact that some girls had actually accepted one of the snacks when they weren’t accepting all of them. As a result there were fewer and fewer snacks being passed around.

At one point Lorena noticed that girls had started gathering at one end, getting closer she could tell that many lights had been turned in one direction, illuminating a spot fairly effectively, people were standing in the light, but there was too much in the way for her to see so she went over and joined the crowd making a semi circle around the stage like structure she had seen being put together earlier.

Getting closer she could hear the crowd cheering someone on and when she got close enough to see she saw a girl walk down from the stage as she received a small applause. Still on the stage stood a smiling Sophia, idly caressing her middle, which didn’t look like it was bulging much anymore.
Then another girl bounced up on the stage and bowed to the spectators. While she did Sophia regurgitated a girl who protesting as much as she could, looked like she was so tired that if Sophia hadn’t held her upright in front of herself then the girl would collapse onto the stage floor.

Beating her foggy mind Lorena tried to remember the girl’s name, they had spoken earlier, she was a joyful energetic girl, that smile of hers quite contagious and Lorena couldn’t help but smirk as she watched the athletic girl bounce across the scene then up into the air and come down on the struggling woman in Sophia’s grip and with a graceful rotation in the air she twisted Sophia’s arms out of the way and got her feet back on the floor while sending the meal’s feet skywards, but a swallow sent them down her throat and removed the woman from sight.

Not quite Lorena corrected herself as she watched Evelyn, that was her name, looking quite pleased and rubbing her slightly bulging belly, the music drowned out the noises coming from it and had it not, then the spectators would have, but she could tell that the girl was busy digesting the snack and slowly the bulge move lower until it all but disappeared and Evelyn’s belly looked flat but trim once more between her halter top and low cut pants.

Well since we can’t binge out, this is sort of a way of making the most of the snacks we can get our hands on and at the same time provide…ehh…entertainment…and a friendly competition. Though most just try to better their own time. Evelyn for one, I doubt she’s trying to beat someone else’s time, she’s not that good, though I must say she probably puts on the best show. I just love the way her belly bulges and then shrinks away as she digests…”

Lorena looked but didn’t see anything at first then she saw a brunette at the back of the stage behind the toilet. The lights didn’t illuminate that area so she wasn’t easy to spot especially not when you’d been looking at the very bright part of the stage. “Um..yeah, now I do…”

“What? I thought you’d show me how it’s done so I don’t make a fool of myself up there.” Lorena challenged. “Just trying to get me up there? I thought you said this was fun.” She added, the booze making her bold.

“Alright!” Patricia blushed, she couldn’t be accused of being sober either, which probably had something to do with her actually heading up the stage, getting a little confused look from Evelyn, but it changed into a supportive smile pretty quickly.

In one of the dark corners of the courtyard the buildings made, a tall blonde girl had come out of a door. Her eyes had quickly fixated themselves on the nearby stage while she absentminded slowly let the door close behind her. What were they doing?

As her finger passed low enough to leave her bare midriff and slide across the front of her skirt more girls got the idea and when she slid her finger back up again in what could only be the outline of her ascending large intestine most had got the point and that’s when she stopped.

A pair of quick steps took her to the toilet, standing with her feet wide apart she pulled down her panties, stretching them to the limit, then leaning over so that her bum was over the bowl, lifting the back of the skirt she gave the girl back there a good view as she tensed and the tightly shut sphincter between her spread cheeks began to open and hard packed solid not even foot long turd emerged and dropped into the water below, leaving her butt as clean as ever and not even making a smear where it had impacted the porcelain.

She quickly pulled her panties back up and adjusted her skirt before turning to the baffled brunette behind her. “So what’s my time?”

“Um…” Tracy started, this was the first time someone had flashed her like that and had she really digested that quickly? “…rules say that you have to let all of her out.” And who was this white clad blonde anyway?

“That was all of her!” Haley said a little miffed.

“It’s just a small…well…” Tracey said and looked into the bowl. Seriously she couldn’t have reduced a girl to that little thing? “You’re sure that’s all of her?”

Haley took a look as well, “Well yeah, she wasn’t that big to begin with…”

Taking a look at her stop watch, Tracy realized she hadn’t even started it in the first place. “Sorry, I didn’t get your time.” She said with some reluctance as she looked the girl over, she was as trim as Evelyn, only she was a head taller than herself and she’d just not only beat their record time, that much she could tell without a stopwatch, but she hadn’t left the normal load, no just a small turd was all that remained…

Who the hell was this girl?

“Young woman, get your ass over here this instant!” A voice boomed, making itself heard over music and all the other noises, even into the most drunken brain.

Haley wasn’t the only one who turned towards the source, but she was the only one blushing and the only one looking straight into the piercing eyes of Professor Hawthorn.

“I thought I told you not to go out tonight!” The older woman said with her arms firmly crossed in front of her as she watched her daughter make her way over.

“We’re leaving now!” She said and motioned for Haley to step through the door through which they had both come, once the Amazonian blonde had entered the building the professors voice took on a wholly new character. “Sorry for the interruption girls, we won’t bother you anymore.” She said and left after her daughter.

Interruption, yeah that it was, most of the girls sobered up quite a bit after the commotion, many had the same questions as Daniela who grabbed hold of Lorena.
“Who, what?!” She said, looking stupefied into the depths of the brown girl’s eyes.

“The woman who yelled was our Professor Hawthorn…” Lorena started. “And the blonde is her daughter Haley… I haven’t seen her… um… put up such a display before though…”

After the pause almost all the girls went for another round of drinks…or two…after which the party started to get back on its feet again, after a while they even resumed their weird game although with a smaller audience, at one time or another most of the girls went up there though, if for no other reason than that they were pressured into at least trying it.

“Come on!” Patricia ushered and a few girls around her giving her the typical peer pressure ‘you have to do it’ kind of looks with many motioning with a jerk of their head for her to go to the stage.

Lorena still wasn’t sure about this, Patricia and Daniela had managed to get her quite tipsy, so she stumbled as she tried to shake her head, but luckily Patricia caught her and gave her a helpful push back to her feet, which strategically also brought her a few feet closer to the stage.

“Hey…” Patricia complained “you made me do it, now it’s your turn…” playing the guilt-card.

“Alright…” Lorena sighed and stumbled towards the stage as she was cheered on her decision applauded by the girls who’d been busy coaxing her into it.

The stairs brought her to a halt, but then she stumbled forward and didn’t get her feet back under herself until she came to a wobbly stop well onto the stage.
A hand grasped her arm and turned her around.

“So are you up for this?” A blurry girl asked. Lorena tried to focus on her and rubbed her eyes in the bright light, her stomach answered for her with a demanding growl. “Oh, I guess you are then.” The girl smiled and let go of Lorena as she stared bringing a snack up her throat for the ebon woman to dine upon.

Lorena had just had a snack early on to sate her initial hunger, but carrying lots of people around all day had made her burn off a lot more than that and when she had started being really reluctant to go up on stage Patricia had helped some in keeping the snacks away and the drinks coming…with the current result, with Lorena on the stage she had avoided and hungry enough to go through with what was supposed to happen on the stage.

Her eyes had adjusted somewhat to the light as the other girl on the stage, whom she realized was Lauren, thrust a limp boy at her, probably in his early twenties and barely even awake as he was totally spent, he managed to look more confused than afraid as he hung there from Lauren’s outstretched hands, ready for Lorena to take him.

“Ready?” Her tall colleague and friend wondered.

“Yeah…” Lorena smiled, her stomach letting out another grumble in confirmation and she reached out and took hold of the guy, lifting him carefully from Lauren’s hands and off the ground, the extra off-center weight he provided doing little good for her footing. A quick reaction from her friend brought a stabilizing hand to her shoulder, but not more as Lauren didn’t want to be in the way for anyone.

“Thanks…” Lorena managed as she shifted her gaze from her meal to her friend and back again. Then decided she should probably start…speed was it…

She hadn’t been fast anywhere on the stage and her condition was probably to blame, she was still determined though and shoved the guy’s head into her mouth, cramming him in quickly with the accuracy of your average drunken, spun around and blindfolded piñata-basher.

First she shoved his head into her windpipe…which caused her to cough him back up, but she quickly crammed him back in again in an arm over back, no control sort of way and managed to almost choke on him again and then possibly gag a reflex she shouldn’t have but which her drunken fortitude managed to overcome and with a few strained swallows she managed to push the guy in and back until he finally came into a workable position and started down her throat bottoms first.

That he wasn’t in the shape that he could bring his feet over his head just meant that despite his body’s reluctance to comply the ebon woman eating him was strong enough to force him into that position anyhow and he got the most uncomfortable stretching session ever out of the deal as her muscles rhythmically worked him down her throat until he finally entered her starved out and alcohol sterilized stomach.

Her stomach actually smelled quite nice when he arrived, the alcohol having washed out any unpleasantries while the fruit sodas had added a new sweet fruity smell to the place.
As her came to a halt from his drop and tumble down the side of her stomach walls, they started to press in on him, the air leaving quickly and the pleasant smells leaving with it, being replaced instead by a nauseating one and the cause of it he found out hurt a lot. Luckily not for long.

Lorena couldn’t help it, she burped, bringing a hand up to her mouth reflexively. “Sorry, must have been someone I ate…” She excused, causing a few giggles.

Her stomach felt great for once, she hadn’t realized how hungry she had really been and getting to wrap her stomach around him and squeeze the yumminess out of him felt great, but as she pushed his liquid form into her starved intestines she realized that sucking the goodies out of his dwindling form was even better and she closed her eyes to revel in the feeling of having him sate her hunger.

Her greedy guts being all too pleased to drain him both quickly and thoroughly like she wanted them to and she found out as he slowly ceased to give her any more nutrients that she really wouldn’t mind seconds and hurried him the rest of the way though her intestines who in vain tried to get something from him as he passed on by.

She found as she opened her eyes that Lauren had guided her to the toilet, already there she fumbled with her pants and sat down only there to find out what Daniela had said earlier, she was still tipsy, but the fuel from the buy had clearly helped her body to clear much of the poison out of her system and she felt refreshed as well which also aided her awareness.

Sitting there taking a crap she felt like having gone into one of those portable toilet and start her business only to look up and find that someone has taken the top off. That she looked around and saw at least a dozen faces smiling at her didn’t really help either. They weren’t laughing at her though, but rather cheering her on, which made the feeling all the more unreal.

Despite her sudden stage-fright she forced herself to finish, realising that she sooner she was done, the sooner she’d be out of there. So she pushed hard hurried to wipe and got up and flushed, in doing so finding herself eye to eye with a confident brunette who was giving her a supportive smile.

“Not bad,” the brunette who had been keeping a too close for comfort eye on what she had been up to said before she leaned forward and whispered a time in her ear. It took Lorena a moment before she remembered what she’d been told earlier and gave the brunette a nod, signalling that she had heard the message, before she hurried off the stage.

Daniela and Patricia caught her in a hug before she had the chance to get very far.

“You did great!” They both said, not helping with her embarrassment, Lorena felt like her face was red, but luckily because of her dark complexion she wasn’t.

A girl handed her a drink, which she emptied quickly, she cold beverage helping her to calm down some and accompanied by the other girls giggles they made their way further from the stage as other girls were being talked into going up on it.

“Now it wasn’t so bad, was it?” Daniela queried.

“Are you kidding? It was horrible, snack excluded though.” Lorena giggled. “I know why you prefer just to watch Pat.” She said to the other girl.

“Yeah, I’m not much of a spotlight person…”

“Oh, I just remembered I forgot to ask. What’s a good time?” Lorena said looking from girl to girl. “Yeah I remember you said you don’t make times public, but you have a record, right?”

“Um, I suppose someone’s got to have the best time, I could ask Tracey, not sure if that’s public either, though perhaps she could tell us the time, even if she keeps the name secret.” Patricia said and started towards the scene.

“Yeah you go ask her, now I’m curious too…” Daniela called as Patricia went.

She returned shortly.

“So what did she say?”

“Ehh…totally not the answer I was expecting.”

“What then?”

“She said she didn’t know.”

“Didn’t know? I thought she kept tract and was good at it.”

“Well I’m sure she is, but she said that that blonde girl earlier… Haley was it? …totally shattered the old record, but she didn’t get the time as she wasn’t prepared.”

“Oh…”

“Yeah, that was pretty fast wasn’t it?”

The party kept on going and most of the girls had a great time.
It was a little later that Lorena noticed that the stage wasn’t the only place with a bit of a gathering. Closer to the main music setup there was another crowd where disco lights hanging from the trees flashed on and off in many colours, it looked like they’ve made themselves a dance floor, as she was already groovin’ to the beat, she motioned for the girls to come with her, which they did.

“Huh? I thought Lauren was on the stage?” Daniela pointed as the three girls made it into the thick of the dancing.

“Oh, yeah, from behind I guess it can be a little hard to tell her and Gemma apart.” Lorena shouted back.

“I see…” Daniela acknowledged just as Gemma changed direction enabling Daniela to see that Gemma had the same build as Lauren and hair, but perhaps a little more softness to her and definitely a totally different face, there was no mistaking the two from the front.

“What’s up with that?!” Lorena shouted as she pointed towards another black girl being pestered by several girls from Blainey’s team.

“Oh, that could be fun, stay here with Daniela, I’ll be right back, hopefully with some good news.” Patricia said and was off, heading towards the commotion.

Sure enough it didn’t take long before she was back, waving to get Lorena’s attention.
