“I don’t think you want to miss this.” She said and Lorena heard someone change the music and gave Patricia a confused look. “She’s pretty good at dancing, just watch.” Patricia said as she got out of the way and gave Lorena another helpful push in the right direction.

She could see a bit of a circle forming around the other black girl, she hadn’t seen her before, but it was obvious that she was from Blainey’s team. The girl was slowly warming up the dance, with slow deliberate and sensual movements and Lorena took the opportunity, as the lights allowed it between flashes, to take a better look at the girl.
She was of average height, well fitted with nice soft curves, not overly busty, as few black girls are, but endowed with nice thick enough build to give her good shape above as well as below the waist, a flat but soft belly left exposed between a glittery pink top and a matching tight skirt which showed off her strong thick legs and held her bum in an enticing embrace, a bum quite big, but not the ghetto booty type that’s just ‘out there’.
She had let her hair loose so it hid her face often enough, but it wasn’t a face that needed hiding, like her body it was smooth and soft at the same time, those eyes as captivating as those full lips.

Around Katrina everyone was still moving to the music as she started her thing. The girls had come to her begging she give the other team a bit of a show. She had told them that she was too drunk to do that, but they wouldn’t stop pestering her, so eventually she gave in and with the alcohol in her body she was more than bold enough to give it a good shot.

There was no pole here to use as she often did…but there was always people, a good enough substitute and often more fun, she admitted as she reached out into her audience and pulled a blonde girl in with her, she didn’t recognise her, so it was probably one from the other team then.

The girl reacted like she wanted to too, standing stiff and confused as Katrina started circling around her slowly bumping and grinding in a most erotic form of dance, which drew much cheer from the crowd. Yeah using people will work great she decided, it wasn’t the first time she did that, but she was more used to a pole, it wasn’t like she could jump up and do pole-dance tricks on a person though, but moving the crowd around was always fun and useful.

So she exchanged the slightly embarrassed blonde for another member of the audience as she started getting into her routine, she had to get warm and feel the music and just as important the light. She moved about within her circle, bringing her human pole with her and struck.

Katrina’s field of study was catching prey without getting caught, which meant that she was one of the two girls who supplied Blainey’s team with most of their test subjects. This dance of hers was something she had started a long time ago, she always liked dancing and not long after she started working for Blainey she came up with the idea of dancing while sampling her audience, preferably without getting caught.

It wasn’t the first time she had performed this with her friends which was why the girls from Blainey’s team were standing behind the ones from Hawthorn’s team, saying that they had already seen it so many times that it was only appropriate if those who hadn’t got the better seats.

As it were Katrina timed it perfectly, she struck when the lights weren’t on her and most people’s attention were on her lower body anyhow, she also took the opportunity to change pole which shifted the audience about enough for no one to notice that one girl disappeared. In the blink of an eye Katrina’s mouth was around her torso and with a strange sucking she was pulled straight into the dancing beauty’s throat and sent on her way to the stomach below.

Katrina pulled this stunt off several times more, before she let her human pole go and started working her way into the circle, grinding and groping as she went, causing less people to see her and shattering the circle a bit, this enabled her to snag another couple of girls before she went into the middle again and started dancing more vigorously, using all the circle in a much quicker fashion, though nearly as sensually as before. It was harder, but even during this she managed to catch a couple without those around catching her in the act.

It was a nice finale, so she started to end the dance, something that didn’t sit too well with the crowd, or rather the girls from Blainey’s team, who could tell that she was ending the show. So they tried their best to cheer her on and the few girls from Hawthorn’s team also joined in the cheering, that was, the few of them not currently trapped and tossed around inside the dancing girl’s stomach.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Party anyone?

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Lorena watched the girl, she could move, in fact she could most likely get a job as an exotic dancer should she want to. Though she wasn’t good enough to win any prizes, that Lorena was fairly certain about. Still, Lorena found it pretty funny to watch the reactions of the girls she pulled in with her, to use as human dance poles of sorts. Some were embarrassed and others were enjoying themselves to the fullest, in various ways…

Lorena didn’t notice that girls went missing, not even when Serena, who had stood next to her became the next dance pole and Gemma who’d been on the other side of Serena disappeared.
The cute dark haired brunette laughed as the thicker dancing girl swung her around with little effort, enjoying the short while she remained the black girl’s toy.

Then as the dancing girl let go of Serena she didn’t look for another, or perhaps she wanted a specific one Lorena pondered as the pink glitter disappeared into the audience and danced its way between them. Lorena saw that she was making her way around the dissolving circle as people moved out of position to see what Katrina was up to.

Lorena tried the same to some extent but figured she’d come to her soon enough as she was heading her way.
Some girls seemed to make room for the dancer, while others just about humped her as she passed, though the dancer groped quite a bit herself, not to mention bumping and grinding that juicy behind of hers in to this girl and that.
And soon enough she came by Lorena, enticing the girls nearby and Lorena awaited her turn.

She was taken totally by surprise when everything suddenly went black and a strong suction enveloped her, it wasn’t until she felt throat muscles all around her, squeezing her on down, that she realised that she’d been swallowed. By whom she wondered and realised that she’d been all the way into the throat before the girl who ate her had even swallowed for the first time.

The journey south didn’t take long though and when she pushed into the air filled stomach she found it pretty filled with girls as well and as a result pretty cramped. The constant swaying of the stomach and stirring of its contents made it not only horrible difficult for Lorena to get back to the sphincter, leading back to the throat, before she was tossed away as a result of the movements, but it also made it pretty clear that this was the stomach of the dancing girl. She had to admit, she was quite impressed.

Then clearly the dance changed and as it did so were the contents inside the stomach tossed around all the more, with all the movement Lorena almost didn’t notice when new girls arrived, almost, it got a little more cramped each time, which felt almost good when the dancer was moving about this much, as it lessened the stirring.

Finally she settled down to a slower pace and eventually stopped, Lorena could hear the cheer she got from her audience and the applause as she bowed.
She got quite concerned though when she felt the girl’s hands start rubbing her stomach, clearly the dancer had put on a bit of a belly from swallowing all these girls, now came the question; what she intended to do with all of them? They were too entangled to escape, unless she gave them some serious time in which to do it…

Katrina thought it was always nice to have a stomach this full, though it was something special this time. Normally her prey could hardly move when this many were piled onto one another, not to mention that it had to be pretty cramped in there, but that was the delight of this occasion. The girls in her stomach were obviously strong enough not to care much about either each others’ weight nor the crampness, though it wasn’t like her stomach was trying to churn them… that might hamper their movements some more. As it were though, their milling about inside her stomach felt wonderful, a satisfying meal that could really squirm…not something a girl got every day.

Still she realized as she felt small hands starting to force their way into her oesophagus that she couldn’t keep them in there much longer and reached for a flask of orange liquid. The horrible substance making her retch almost as soon as it hit her tongue, still she forced herself to get a decent amount down and felt her upset gut forcing the girls back up her throat.

It felt pretty undignified to stand there and cough up girl after girl in a big slimy pile and she hoped they weren’t too pissed about her little trick on them, doubtless she’d ruined all of their make-ups and all of their clothes were soaked by her different internal slimy substances.

As it were no-one seemed to hold a grudge, at least they didn’t showed it, perhaps that was just the same way they didn’t show the relief of her not trying to digest them, which at least Lorena hid fairly well as she tried to laugh the experience off, poking both Daniela and Patricia in the ribs, making sure to leave a smear of goop behind on their clothing in the process.

“Damn, girls, you tricked me right into that one!” She laughed and quickly dried off her forearm on Daniela’s back before the girl had time to get away.

“Hey! Why you do that for?”

“Only fair, you covered me in the stuff. I reckon a third of this is yours...” Lorena said and managed to scoop up half a fistful of mucus or something, which she then flung at Patricia, resulting in a splat on the girls thigh. “…and a third is yours…”

“Stop that!” Patricia chuckled as she failed to avoid the missile and noticed how Lorena was collecting slime for a second one. “There are better ways to get that stuff off you know…” She said as she ducked for cover.

Lorena had to admit that despite a couple of unnerving moments, the party clearly was a success and she stayed well into the night.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: She stops dancing.

choices: Madeleine is ok with that, even if her belly isn’t.
Madeleine would prefer not to wait.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
She’d had a great lazy time with the girls on the beach and after a few hours they’d all gone home to wash the salt and sand off. They’d talked about getting together for something to eat later, but Meghan had declined, saying that she had to catch up on her homework and pointing out that none of the places served her favourite dish anyway. Which had brought a chuckle from Madeline and caused Annette to bite her lip with the other girls trying to let it slide while avoiding to think about what she really meant. That she really ate people was a little unnerving for them and they were glad they hadn’t actually seen her do it so they could at least try and convince themselves that she was just joking.

As the evening turned out, she didn’t do all that much studying, just a little, mostly she just relaxed, even so it turned fairly late before she hit the sack and was busy sleeping in when her cell phone buzzed her awake.

“Hello?” Meghan queried, too dazed by sleep to be annoyed by the rude awakening.

“I didn’t wake you did I?” she heard a semi-familiar voice ask at the other end.

“Yeah, you did…” Meghan realized and looked at her alarm clock which glowed with angry red numbers in the gloomy room, the blinds and curtains keeping most of the light from the bright day outside from seeping in.

“Sorry about that, didn’t think you’d sleep until noon…” The girl on the other end apologised.

“Eh…well neither did I…” Meghan admitted and rubbed the sleep from her eyes as she swung her feet out of bed. “…I guess I should thank you for not letting me sleep the day away…”

“Good to hear. I suppose this means you haven’t had breakfast yet?”

“Yeah…I guess it does…” Meghan answered, a bit confused by the odd self answering question. “Why?”

“Well…um…I was wondering if we could grab something to eat together…”

“Who is this?” Meghan, wondered now that she’d gotten to her feet.

“Madeline…I got your number from Sally…”

“Oh, need help do you?”

“Well yeah…I hate to bother you, but I really think I do… can you help me again?”

“Hmm…well…” Meghan said and rubbed her empty stomach. “I guess you’re right, I need to catch something anyway, so I guess you can tag along…”

“Thanks!” Madeline almost screamed in Meghan’s ear, relieved that the girl would help her. “…so where should we meet? At school?”

“Sure…” Meghan interrupted before Madeline had time to list any more options. “Just give me half an hour will you and I’ll meet you at the south entrance.”

Madeline kept a hand on her stomach, trying to calm her angry middle. She had thought Robert would fill her up but after eating him she hadn’t felt that full, she had been quite amazed that she had actually eaten a whole person, her mind couldn’t quite accept that that wouldn’t be enough. After she’d digested him though she had realized that she could have gone for seconds and thirds as well… by that time she didn’t want to bother Meghan about it though seeing as how reluctant she’d been the first time.

Letting him out had been something different too, she was a big girl and she had eaten a lot before, though she couldn’t remember needing to flush twice more than a few times earlier and certainly not…she had lost count… there had been quite a lot of him going out, right then she was pretty glad she’d just eaten one boy, even if her belly told her otherwise.

When she awoke this morning she’d felt great, better than ever, there’d been a spring in her step and she felt like she’d lost a lot of weight, a look in the mirror made her doubt that though and the evil bathroom scale had told her that she had rather gained a pound. That didn’t change the fact that she felt lighter.
What she didn’t know was that she had in fact grown a bit stronger as her body had put her meal to good use and was begging her for more building material, giving her a gnawing hunger.

Madeline had ignored it for a while, then she’d eaten a bowl of cereals…her hunger had reacted as if it had been insulted, so she finished the whole package and what was left of a loaf of bread. It hadn’t helped and a couple of hours later her hunger was worse than ever, so she had called Sally and asked her for Meghan’s number…

It was a move that had paid off, now she stood by the south entrance to the school, one hand on her stomach and waving to the tall slender blonde with the other as the girl came down the sidewalk.

“That bad huh?” Meghan said shooting a glance at the hand on Madeleine’s belly.

It responded with a growl “Yeah…” Madeleine confessed, “…probably worse… can’t remember ever being, this, hungry…” she emphasized, then in an effort to take her mind off of it she asked. “So you live on the south side then?” realising she didn’t have a clue as of where Meghan lived.

“Ehh… not really, I just didn’t want to walk through the park if that’s where we were heading, it’s a pretty bad idea to be seen just before someone disappears.”

“Ahh…point taken…”

“I’d rather try something a bit further from home, now that I’ve got the time though, if you don’t mind?”
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Meghan's weekend.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
“Well…I suppose beggars can’t be choosers.” Madeleine said. “I do see why you wouldn’t want to eat too close to home.”

“Yeah, perhaps, but mostly I need new hunting grounds, so to speak. I can’t say I’ve taken the time to explore this city…I suppose if you help me, I’ll help you.” Meghan winked.

“Sure.” Madeline smiled back.

With that decided Madeline acted in parts as a tour guide, she didn’t know the city that well either, but she’d been to a few places and she had a somewhat blurry picture of the city outline, which was a whole lot more than Meghan did.
Hence she led the way and Meghan followed while they made small talk, though Madeline’s stomach had her picking up the pace, so it wasn’t long before they had abandoned the leisurely Sunday walk pace to a more determined one that had them hurrying towards another park that Madeline thought might provide them with enough cover to up and grab someone.

She was right, it wasn’t nearly as big as the one by the school, but it had been designed to shut out the busy city around it and provide a bit of an oasis, so that once you entered it the surrounding streets and buildings were soon blocked from view by dense bushes and voluminous trees. The vegetation didn’t do much to dull she sounds, but somehow not seeing the causes behind the commotion helped shutting it out.

They could tell the center of the park contained a more open space, which really didn’t suit their needs so Meghan stopped Madeline as she was about to head on in. She could hear that there were quite a bit of people enjoying the sun in the grass in there too, another reason not to go in there.
The paths running along the edges were more their area, the thick foliage limiting the line of sight severely, which was what they were after, the respite from the burning sun wasn’t unwelcome either.

Madeline looked a tad confused, but Meghan took her by the hand and led her on a leisurely walk along a path down amidst the denser growth. It was perhaps a bit risky, she knew a lot of people were using this park, being this close to the City Center, so she knew they’d run into people, she was just fearing to get caught in the act.
The amount of people coming through here was not made less apparent by the fact that they hardly got their feet moving again before they spotted a well dressed young man coming towards them down the path they’d chosen. He was carrying a couple of shopping bags and his pace spoke as clearly as anything else that he was just cutting through the park on his way to wherever.

Meghan released Madeline and got in the man’s way. “Excuse me sir.”
She got his attention and he came to a halt, judging by his slightly surprised reaction as he looked her over she could tell he wasn’t in any real hurry which was good, it was always so much harder when they were.

“Yes?”

“Could you tell me the time? My damn phone died on me…”

“Oh, certainly…” He said while shifting both his bags to his left hand and used his free right to pull his sleeve back. But as he did she got closer to him and as he looked down at his wrist to acquire the information his eyes left the blonde girl in front of him for one fatal moment in which she reached up and made his slight bow of the head into a full on bow, ending with his head in her mouth.

The shock made him drop his bags, unfortunately for him it was too late to scream. He brought his hands up to push away and free his head, only to find them grasped by slender female fingers who with and unyielding strength brought them under their control and he found his hands shoved in next to his face as she took a mighty swallow, a swallow that sent his head into her throat and most of his torso into her mouth.

He got his hopes up when he felt another pair of hands grasp his ankles, but it was trashed the second after when he felt them lift his legs up and push him down the way he was going. Meghan too was a little surprised by the assistance, not that it was unwelcome, quite the opposite, she wanted the man out of sight as quickly as possible and with her friend’s help that happened slightly quicker that it otherwise would.

With his feet disappearing into her mouth and looking into Madeline’s pleading eyes Meghan took a moment before she decided to swallow him down. Madeline’s growling middle spoke perhaps even more clearly than the eyes what she wanted, but Meghan ignored her and looked around, as far as she could tell no one had spotted them, for she couldn’t see anyone and she couldn’t hear anyone hurrying away, so she turned her attention to the bags, figuring she should get rid of them when she noticed the logo’s, one reading Victoria’s secret and the other one looked feminine as well, probably some local shop because she didn’t recognise it, other’s might so she shoved it into the Victoria’s secret bag, could be fun to see what he’d bought later, no reason to throw away a good cover, that she and Madeline were out shopping was as good as any.

A hand on her arm, grabbed her attention as well and she looked into Madeline’s eyes once more. “Please…” the girl asked, though she sounded rather irritated, though not as much as her stomach.

“Yeah sure…I just wanted to make sure it was safe first.” Meghan apologised before she engaged the much larger girl in what was supposed to look like a very deep kiss, not that it wasn’t, but it wasn’t the main purpose of it.

She worked the man back up her throat, he came up the same way he went down, so Madeline winced a bit as his wet shoes was the first of him she got to taste, the pants that followed were better, but still nothing she cared for much and the clothes on his upper body did little to change her mind about the tastelessness of clothes.

Madeline accepted that he was a meal, she couldn’t exactly ask for a naked one, he might not taste very good, or much at all, but he still felt great as he stretched her mouth and throat. His squirming legs and finally arms as they were the last of him to slip on in and down, before Meghan broke off their kiss, were thrilling.
She felt dazed, it was great feeling him settle in her stomach and having him wiggle around in there.

“Oh…” She exclaimed as she felt Meghan’s hands on her bulging middle and realised she couldn’t walk around looking pregnant and started to apply what she could remember of the hiding techniques with fairly quick and visible results, quickly reducing her belly to a mere potbelly. Still she realised that her belly was growling as hungry and angry as ever, which puzzled her.

“I’m still hungry…” She whispered, so that no one would overhear.

“That’s because you need to digest to sate your hunger.” Meghan explained.

“Oh…” Madeline mentally slapped her forehead. Naturally that would be the case. So she started concentrating, Meghan hadn’t given her much hints on this and while she’d always fancied large meals having had quite a few, especially since she started this new class, she’d only had one this big before, luckily whereas hiding a meal doesn’t come naturally, digestion does, though she wouldn’t mind hurrying the process some…or a lot.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Taking a stroll.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
As such it took her a bit of effort and time before she started mixing the angry growls of her middle with gurgles of digestion and while she worked on that Meghan left her on a park bench with the bags, while she set out for a meal of her own.

She didn’t know how relaxing it was, trying to force digestion while keeping the meal hidden was a pretty tough task, though she was thankful that she could do so in peace without having to think about anything else.

Though she did fear that her grumbling middle would get her unwanted attention, so she tried to pause her progress a couple of times as people walked by, faking a phone call one time and faking sms-ing the other.
Still it wasn’t until she had most of the guy liquefied and he was starting to flow into her intestines that her hunger pains started to recede and she could sigh out. She did realise that Meghan was taking a while, in fact the guy had completely left her stomach before her friend returned.

“There you are…I was getting worried” Madeline said as she got up, her belly back to more or less normal and fairly quiet, she wasn’t done with her guy yet, but he was far into her intestines by now.

“Yeah, it’s a little tricky to get alone with one when things are this busy.” Meghan explained.

“I guess I got lucky then?”

“Pretty much. How’s he doing?”

Madeline rubbed her belly as she tried to determine the answer. “Actually he’s feeling lonely.” She wasn’t quite done with him yet and he had eased her raving hunger, but she did realize that she did still feel hungry, more so than after Robert yesterday and Meghan didn’t seem as unwilling to help her just now.

Meghan raised an eyebrow, not the answer she was expecting. “Lonely as in…”

“Yeah, he needs a friend…do you mind? You said you wanted to have a look around town, right?”

“I suppose.” Meghan said and picked up the bag Madeline’s meal had left them with. “So shall we get to it then?”

With both of them having gotten a meal, they could stroll about more comfortably and enjoy the day, they even did a bit of window shopping, even if they decided against actually going into the shops. Every now and again Madeline’s belly gurgled loudly and Meghan couldn’t help but look when it did, though it did become less frequent and less noisy as they continued.

Almost an hour later they found themselves at an ice cream bar, Meghan bought a large cone while Madeline made use of their facilities, apparently the gentleman at the park had insisted to be let out, which left Meghan with the awkward prospect of trying to look like she was eating an ice cream.

She had opted for the use of a plastic spoon, the brightly coloured ones usually provided, she’d first picked a yellow one, but had been to greedy and broken it before she’d managed to get her first spoon full and gone back for a blue one, settling with more cautious small scoops, careful not to crush the damn thing each time she pulled it from her lips. She couldn’t really say that she tasted much of the ice cream, her body was all too efficient in hiding her meals on its own to let her enjoy the otherwise common delicacy, leaving her with a most frustrating task. At least it kept her occupied for Madeline took her time.

Once the Madeline was out they swapped, with Madeline going for the ice cream and Meghan using the cramped bathroom. Meghan had more experience and hence more success in getting the remains of her meal down the inadequate plumbing. Likewise Madeline had more success with the ice cream, even though she was barely halfway done by the time Meghan came back, she was at least able to enjoy the treat.

A large meal topped off with desert, should be enough one would think, at least Meghan did, so she was a bit surprised when Madeline’s belly started grumbling again. She had half thought Madeline had been joking earlier and half being greedy, that she just wanted the nice full feeling, but half an hour from the ice cream bar she had to admit to herself that the sounds coming from the big girl’s middle really sounded like growls of hunger.
That in itself she found a tad intriguing, she wasn’t that fond of helping anyone hunt, it was a task she most of the times found tedious enough, it could perhaps have something to do with all the times she’d been asked to get something for her mother or little sister, her big sister always came along…well Madeline was here with her, perhaps…a well…she confessed that this wasn’t like watching family eat, heck this girl hadn’t even thought of people as food only a couple of days ago and now her body craved who knows how much?
Meghan pondered why the girl needed so much, true enough Madeline was probably close to twice her weight, could that be a reason for twice the food? She honestly didn’t know, still it intrigued her, yeah, she’d help her get another one.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Continuing the strolling...

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
She stepped back, they’d found a secluded enough spot to risk it and watched as two female feet wiggled outside of Madeline’s mouth, she’d obviously lost her shoes somewhere inside Meghan and now the last futile thing she could do was wiggle her toes before they slipped out of view and disappeared between Madeline’s moist lips, her throat and torso bulging strangely, but as the feet travelled downward everything slimmed back to normal, all but the wiggling bulge in the tall girl’s belly.

“I have to admit…” Madeline said between clenched eyes as she concentrated on hiding her meal. “She was a lot better than that guy, bare skin is just so much tastier…” The woman had been wearing a fairly revealing outfit, a short skirt and a top that didn’t cover much, not that one could blame her in this heat, though it was probably warmer where she was now. “…but she wasn’t very filling…” and as if to emphasise Meghan watched as Madeline’s belly returned as far as she could tell back to it’s normal self, showing not a hint of the girl but for the occasional jiggle in Madeline’s soft flesh from the struggles inside.

The girl had been short, but still a full grown woman, Meghan herself was perhaps tall, but fairly slim, she figured she couldn’t hold that many pounds on the girl making a disappearance act inside Madeline’s belly, the wet gurgling sounds coming from it telling her the girl would soon be gone.

“So you want more, huh?” Meghan wondered, the nod and mischievous smile from the large brunette struck a cord in her, the same cord the life guard had yesterday. She couldn’t help that she saw people as food, she knew most girls chatted about boys, she’d never seen the interest other than to sate her appetite and not that of her lower lips, heck she’d rarely gotten comfortable befriending anyone and even when she had her little sister had showed most of them that they were indeed just food. She was a little ashamed to admit even to herself that she had sized the girls up back at the slumber party, even if she’d had no intention of eating anyone of them it didn’t change the fact that she had thought about it. Now one of them had managed to flip a switch in her brain, looking at Madeline she didn’t see a scrumptious snack anymore, what she saw scared her a little, which was thrilling in its own sense.

Madeline prodded her belly, “Aww… she stopped struggling.” the large amounts of digestive juices sloshing around inside as she tried to coax the girl into moving again, but it was no use, she was already breaking up, diluting the liquid surrounding her, soon she’d be part of it.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Next meal.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
They had left the busy sections of town behind as they’d taken to wandering about aimlessly and entered a distinctly more downtrodden part of the city while the girl in Madeline had quieted down and moved deep into the hungry girl’s small intestine.

By chance they over heard an argument, Madeline wouldn’t have noticed if they hadn’t passed by the alley the voices were coming from. She nudged Meghan’s shoulder and motioned towards the voices, the alley being desolate and gloomy enough to warrant a closer look. Walking down it they looked around a bend and saw two women. Their conversation was hard to follow, the younger one was on the ground snivelling, she seemed quite desperate whereas the older one, perhaps in her mid thirties was pacing on and off shooting the odd glance at the other woman.

“So which one do you fancy?” Meghan whispered.

“The one on the ground.” Madeline answered barely loud enough for Meghan to hear. The one on the ground showed considerably more skin than the pacing woman, who was fully clothed, even wearing a thin jacket.

Meghan didn’t really know how they should play this, as far as she could tell the snivelling girl was hooked on something or other that the other woman could obviously provide, but apparently didn’t, so she hoped that meant they didn’t want to attract attention anymore than she did.
There wasn’t much of cover though once around the bend, a large dumpster on one side was more or less it, the debris that littered the alley, no doubt mostly having been pulled from the dumpster by various birds and rats, provided no cover, although it did hide her scent in its own odour, stepping on any of it would rather make her reveal herself.

She dashed from the corner to behind the dumpster leaving Madeline behind and narrowly avoiding kicking a rusty can on the way, finally forcing herself to stop just short of stepping on a plastic bag filled with semi-fresh trash that had probably never even made it into the dumpster in the first place.
Meghan didn’t know what came over her, she didn’t know what to do, so she just figured screw it all and stepped forth into plain view and stared walking towards the two women, quickly covering the distance between them.

“Why are you so mean? Can’t you see you’re making her cry?” Meghan said as she approached and watched as the sitting girl looked over her shoulder and the pacing girl swirled to face her, eyes beaming and her whole body tensing up. The woman quickly saw that Meghan was too young to be a cop, a random girl stupid enough to interfere in her business?

“Don’t worry, I’ll take care of you.” Meghan calmed the sitting girl as she placed her hands on the girl’s shoulders and ran them down her arms as she leaned on closer.

This made the dealer get angry again, was this girl going to steal her customers? She really didn’t expect to see Meghan’s mouth open incredibly wide and then descend on her customer, she watched transfixed in chocked horror as Meghan leaned all the way to the ground and closed her lips beneath the girl. She continued to watch as Meghan stood back up and with a casual swallow sent a lump down her throat, a lump that disappeared entirely, just that quickly her customer was gone.

When Meghan started walking towards her, she backed away and her hands flew to her right pocket, frenetically she fiddled for a bit before producing a stiletto knife.
Meghan didn’t know how that item could hurt her, she wasn’t that keen to find out, so she stopped and kept her distance as the woman started circling her, once she was facing back the way she had come she saw Madeline moving out from behind the corner and started circling the other way, making the woman stop and with a slash of the knife through the air step back. Meghan saw that it worked and moved slowly and deliberately, making sure to keep the woman’s attention on herself and the woman’s back towards Madeline while the big girl snuck up on her from behind.

A single blow to her head sent the dealer flying, she hadn’t seen Madeline coming, nor seen her blow before it sent her into the wall of the building and knocked her out cold. Madeline watched shocked, she had expected the girl to topple over and hopefully drop her knife, not fly several meters through the air and into a wall movie brawl style, with the exception that she didn’t look like she was going to get up again any time soon.

“Nice punch!” Meghan giggles, laughing mostly at Madeline’s stupefied expression.

“Ehh, thanks…” Madeline manages as she takes in the scene one more time, a slight grumble from her belly instinctively sets her feet in motion towards the limp form on the ground. She wraps her fingers around the woman’s upper arms and starts to lift her up when Meghan interrupts her.

“You might want to empty her pockets first, wouldn’t want to oh-dee on whatever she was selling.”

“Thanks, kinda got lost in the moment.” Madeline mumbled and searched the woman, she found a bit of cash which wasn’t bad as well as a few small bags of something white, she considered throwing them away, but then realised her fingerprints were all over them, so she put them in her own pocket, figuring she’d determine what to do with it later.

Satisfied that the woman was safe to eat, she mashed the head of her meal in between her lips and used her hands to slowly cram the torso in as well and down her throat, it was a lot trickier than being fed by Meghan, the experience differed in other ways as well. For one the taste was somewhat dirty, it wasn’t the cleanest clothes the woman was wearing, partly due to her stay on the alley floor, the clothes also soaked up her saliva, Meghan had lubed up the other ones nicely for her even if it made them taste a bit like Meghan spittle.
She had to admit the thing she missed most was the movement, the woman was still alive, but out cold, Madeline couldn’t get even a wiggle out of her, no amount of pinching and groping made her slide on down any other way than like a limp sack of meat, which was surprisingly unsatisfactory.

“Well that was a let down…” Madeline said looking down on the soft bulge in her middle, the only movement coming from it was the slight jiggle as she rubbed it.

“Oh? Not much of a belly filler either?”

“Ehh…” Madeline hadn’t considered that, but realized it to be the truth. “No, I guess not, but I didn’t realise how much I liked the struggling, she doesn’t even flinch in there…but now that you mention it, I did call dibs on the snivelling one.” Madeline smirked.

“Come on, you’re claiming both?”

“Nah, you didn’t call dibs on either, though I’m not that greedy, you can have the limp one, though you’ll have to reach in and get her, but I really do want the other one.”

“Alright.” Meghan wasn’t hungry, so there wasn’t that much of a point in her keeping the girl just because it’d be fair. “You can keep her.”

The girl might not have heard the discussion, for she seemed to get her hopes up as she was forced back up Meghan's throat. Hopes dashed as she realized she was being crammed down a second throat, which triggered frantic desperate struggles, much to Madeline's liking.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Getting a fix.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
“Dammit...” Madeline cursed under her breath, causing her friend to give her an odd glance as they walked down the street again.

“What?”

“Oh, just my darn greedy gut. I was too eager to start in on the one I knocked when you said I could keep her...so when I held back to enjoy the squirming one...it was apparently already too late.” Her belly let out a content wet gurgle to emphasize her point. “She's already stopped struggling.” Madeline pouted.

“Yeah, that's one greedy gut you have. I thought you said one a day was much? What's your count?”

“Oh, I spoke too soon didn't I? Think it'll pass? I mean I'll be quite busy if I need to keep eating this much. Then again I did eat a lot before.” Madeline said patting her slowly shrinking pot-belly, causing the extra softness there to jiggle in return. “Could it just be that my appetite scaled up?”

“I don't know.” Meghan admitted, thinking for a while in silence if she could recall overhearing any discussion about it. “Sorry, can't remember hearing anything about it. There's class tomorrow, right? I guess I could check with the Professor then.”

“Please do.” Madeline smiled, though her expression still showed that she was a bit concerned over her appetite.

The two soon parted ways. Meghan excused herself that she really needed to catch up on her homework, which was true. The main reason she'd gone out had been to get something to eat, as well as postponing said homework, something the digital numbers on her cellphone told her she'd done for too long already, which left her with a long tedious evening of hard studying.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: They call it a day.

choices: She decides to go with that approach.
She keeps to those that asks for help.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Meghan was fairly late, her mathematics class sometimes overlapped Blainey's class, something that would have been problematic had she needed to take the class, but her mother had assured her that wouldn't be the case, which was true enough and Blainey didn't mind that much, she just needed Meghan for assisting, so it was fine with her if the girl showed up late, as long as it was before the practice part of her lesson commenced.

Sneaking in the door, not without getting a few glances, but smoothly enough to not really disturb, Meghan was glad to see that there was still a few minutes before practice and joined the other TA's as they gathered close to the back door, getting ready to bring forth the necessary items once the Professor gave the word.

While waiting she studied the class, there were too many, she could never keep track of that many, which was probably why it took her a while to pick out her new found friends. It probably didn't help that they weren't grouped together, apparently not even two of them were even practice-partners, so they were scattered all across the room.

Perhaps she should have paid attention to what the Professor was saying, but she only really heard her when she said it was time to practice, which brought a loud rustle from the class as they adjusted themselves in their seats.

After setting up and getting everything out, Meghan found that although most girls seemed to accept her presence they were still nervous enough to not ask help of her, leaving her not nearly as busy as the other TAs and with ample time to survey the class.

She followed Madeline with some amusement as she saw the girl toil with her urges, first pondering whether to help herself to her practice partner, or to help the girl, for which she opted for the latter, but shortly after changed her mind and gulped the girl down, only to struggle with her greedy gut's desire to digest the delicious thing.

Sally sported a sizeable pot-belly when Meghan first found her in the crowd and was helping her partner tackle something round and leathery, she didn't care what it was as she kept on looking.

The concept was fairly odd, but she couldn't help pondering it. These girls were at least potentially learning how to eat people, seeing how many were struggling with fairly small objects, it was at times fairly hard to see them as ones doing the eating. Still she tried to view them as predators, even if some looked simply delicious, Meghan put such thoughts aside even if she got the deer in headlights look staring back at her and forced herself to move her gaze to the next girl.

She wasn't the only one looking, many kept an eye on her when she was close by, but what they were thinking she could rarely tell.

There were girls who were really hard to imagine as predators, looking simply helpless, not seldom innocent or dainty, whereas others of thicker build, or more sultry complexion Meghan found needed less imagination, but then she watched as one of those she thought looked predatory stop helping her partner and trying on a practice sphere and failing miserably.

The failure shattered Meghan's impression and she wondered if they really were going to become predators. Looking further up she couldn't help halt at a cute slender thing, who looked helpless, unable to stop herself from salivating. Thinking that there was one who really looked like a delicious morsel and not a predator, so knowing she couldn't very well up and eat the girl, she at least gave herself the time to watch the girl for a moment and indulge in the daydream of doing so.

As she watched the girl who was in the middle of class patted the bulging middle of her friend, which Meghan thought would be herself in a few lessons, for her partner looked like she had potential at least.

Then a short girl called out at the side which caught Meghan's attention, she was struggling with a huge practice sphere, so large that she was lacking at least half a meter from reaching around it, but she had no intention of doing that, standing in the aisle she set it down on the head and upturned hands of the girl sitting closest, who then with her help rolled it to the next and the next.

Meghan was surprised when her morsel waved to the girl in the stairs and thanked her, before she accepted the huge ball rolling at her.
Sitting back down and with the help of her pot-bellied partner the girl hoisted the sphere above her and leaned her head back under it, then slowly the orb spread the girl's lips wider and wider, until it could fit in her mouth no more and started spreading her neck and then torso as well and a minute later the girl closed her lips for a brief instant before she turned and gave her partner a cute toothy grin, who laughed back amazed and patted the huge dome in front of her friend.

Perhaps they could become predators after all, perhaps she just shouldn't try to judge them already, they have after all not had that many lessons.

She returned to her duties, there weren't many that asked her for help, but there were still those who did, for one she took the time to help Becky get a sphere down, though she hadn't asked for assistance.
Perhaps that was an approach, to help those that needed it instead of just the ones that asked?
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Monday's class.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
So she gave a few girls a couple of pointers as she made her way up the classroom, while she looked for someone who was really struggling.

Looking up ahead, she saw just the heads of two girls sitting in the last row, with a bit of privacy as there was no girls sitting on either side of them for several seats. Or rather she saw the head of the girl, who was talking to her partner of whom in turn only hands and hair was visible as she struggled to cram a melon into her mouth that was roughly the size of her face. She didn't look like she was making any progress at all though, so Meghan turned her steps in that direction.

Meghan went on around the back and jumped over the seats so she landed in the middle of the patch of upturned empty seats between the girl failing to eat the melon and the next pair of girls.

The girl stopped by the sudden noise as she jerked the fruit away from her face and looked up at Meghan who'd suddenly appeared next to her.
Instantly Meghan realized both why the other TAs hadn't come to help the girl as well as why there were a few empty seats next to her.

The girl was intimidating, sure she was looking up at Meghan, but she didn't feel like that was the case, even though she was sitting down and Meghan being fairly tall, it still wasn't that much of a height difference, a difference made totally irrelevant when the width of the girl was added to the equation. Even Meghan couldn't help instinctively taking a step back.

Beatrice was easily the largest girl in class, though unlike her plump practice partner who was the closest one to her size and motioning feverishly for Meghan not to help Beatrice when she thought her partner wasn't looking, she wasn't fat, or even slightly soft, just an overgrown and surprisingly pretty powerhouse.

Impressed by the build of the girl, she noted with some awe that her arms were probably thicker, than her own thighs and she couldn't help catching a glimpse of the bulging abdominals protruding from the girl's otherwise flat belly, realising why the girl's partner wasn't that into actually helping the girl learn, since that'd mean she'd sooner or later end up going inside there during their practice, heck Meghan got half a shiver down her spine looking at it and figuring that she could almost fit in there without the girl needing to learn any hiding tricks to keep her hidden. That wasn't quite true, but even though it was flat, the girl possessed a lot of hungry looking belly, but on a thickly built and well over two meter tall frame it wasn't as if it stood out, there was a lot of every part of her, except perhaps breasts, which looked mostly like muscle instead of fat.
Still despite the lack of feminine softness Beatrice still possessed a very feminine build, it was all female muscle and not the otherwise typical square cut steroid frame so common in 'females' packing muscle.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Forced help anyone?

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
There was something about the strong girl's partner’s pleading looks that made Meghan overcome her uncertainty. She was after all here to help girls to learn to eat, what the meals though of it she didn't care and somehow the image of the big soft girl struggling helplessly inside that tight powerful belly invaded her mind in a way that intrigued her, it was something she actually wanted to see, even if she realised that unfortunately it probably wouldn't happen while she was watching.

After a moment of dumbfounded silence, Meghan gathered herself and forced a smile on her lips. “Hi, I'm Meghan.”

“Yeah we know.” The girls answered in unison.

“Oh...well you looked like you could use some help.”

“Yes please!” Beatrice lightened up, while her partner did the opposite. “I guess I've stopped trying to get the TAs' attention.”

“So what's your name?” Meghan wondered and extended her hand in a formal greeting, noticing with some surprise that the big girl actually hesitated a bit before taking it.

“Beatrice.” She got for an answer, trying to put the name on file, failing to notice the girl's eyes alternating between Meghan's middle and her mouth while she tried to get her hand back as quickly as possible without actually jerking it back.

On contrast Meghan failed to even register the “Abby” she got as she shook the other girl's hand while the thought crossed her mind whether or not greeting her was a waste of time. The smile on Meghan's face unnerved both the girls as she pondered if she should eat the plump one right then and there, but decided that she shouldn't rob Beatrice of her future meal.

Still watching the girl quiver was nice as well. Then she realized that she didn't know how the Professor would take to her eating a student in class, seeing as how she seemed quite protective of them during their first encounter.

“Al-right, show me what you were up to. You stopped before I could get a good look.” Meghan told Beatrice, who brought the miserable melon back to her face, for Meghan noticed that it had become half mashed by the girl's efforts to cram it into her mouth. Watching the girl struggling and failing again didn't help the health of the fruit any.

“Easy girl.” Meghan interrupted her, causing Beatrice to lower the fruit. “I think I know what your problem is.”

“I think you're too used to flexing all that muscle. Not that muscle is bad, but now you're tensing up in the wrong way, like you're trying to do a push-up by pulling yourself into the floor instead of pushing away.”

“Sure one can use muscles to accomplish what you want. Like this...” Meghan said and opened her mouth wide, wide enough to give the two girls a view that caused them to nearly wet themselves. But the mouth closed quicker than it had opened and once more Meghan appeared to them as just a pretty blonde girl, which released a sigh of relief from the two.

“That's a bit tricky though...” Meghan continued “...so I think you should just try relaxing for now. Perhaps you could think of it as relaxing at the top of a push-up in order to get back into position for another one.” She said motioning for Beatrice to have another go at the fruit.

“Feel this? Tense as a spring.” Meghan said prodding the girl's face. “Try to relax here and here.” She instructed and the girl managed to do so, which caused the melon to slowly slide into the girl's mouth.

“Now you can tense up like you did before.”

As she had passed the critical point, this caused the rest of the melon to get squeezed into her mouth. Getting the large fruit into her throat presented a similar problem, but Meghan got her around that hitch as well and as Beatrice worked the fruit into her throat the corded muscles of her strong neck tensed up as she swallowed, crushing the fruit downwards and mashing it into a pulp in the process.
She felt the melon shoot down into her stomach, but at the same time her mouth filled up with fruit-juice that she frenetically swallowed down as it felt like it continued to bubble up her throat, which it didn't, the initial squirt had been it.

“Ok, seems like you're back on track.” Meghan smiled and with a hand on the top of the back row of seats half jumped, half hoisted herself over it, to land in the pathway leading behind the seats. “Keep practising.” She winked at Beatrice before turning away, while purposely ignoring her practice partner that was struggling to find the words to ask for help for herself, she didn't need to, her body language made her intention abundantly clear, but Meghan had absolutely no interest in helping her, except down Beatrice's throat, that would be help she'd gladly give.

She hurried down to the front of the class in case the plump girl would start shouting after her, she couldn't wipe that smug grin off her face, which granted her a few puzzled looks as she walked on by.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Meghan helps Beatrice.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Down at the bottom she surveyed the classroom again, taking notice of a girl she'd looked at several times before, a short pretty thing, with straight black hair that reached down beneath her shoulders and with the front cut off at the eyes, in a way that hid her eyebrows.
She had passed her at least a dozen times and close too, with the girl occupying a seat at the edge of a row. What caught her attention was that the girl was helping her partner with a fairly small fruit, she didn't know if she should add 'yet another' to that or not, but every time she'd looked at the couple the raven haired one had been aiding her brunette friend at times nearly standing up in her seat in the process.

She decided she should investigate and headed back up the stairs.

“Um...” Meghan interrupted the two, and was met by a scared gaze from the brunette and a bewildered one from the raven haired girl, who gave her a wide smile, as wide as her dainty pink little mouth could go naturally.

“Hi.” she got from the smiling one, whom she noticed, was looking her over a little too much.

“Have you done any practising?” Meghan addressed the girl she'd come to check up on.

“Ehh...sure.” She got back, the girl looking surprised that Meghan was talking to 'her'.

“Are you sure? When I've looked over here I've only see you helping your partner.”

“Oh, yeah, I guess I haven't done any today, but it's just because it's so cool watching her swallow stuff down.” she excused while her friend blushed and tried to cover her bulging and Meghan noticed, quite lumpy middle. “Not nearly as cool as what you did, though.” the girl finished with a smile and what appeared to be a look of idolizing wonder.

“I see...” Meghan squirmed, she was certainly not used to this kind of attention, the girl was really pretty though, so she didn't come of quite as creepy as Meghan feared one such person would have. Well her task was to help these girls so she figured she'd do that, it wasn't at least as if the girl disliked her, which she assumed would be worse.
“...well, the class is supposed to teach you to swallow stuff like that too, so I think it's your turn to practice. By the sound of it you might need my help to catch up.” Meghan said dutifully, realizing only the second after she said it, that she'd offered a fan a one on one and bit her lip hoping she wouldn't have to regret that.

“Really!?” The girl beamed like a sun.

“Yeah.” Meghan sighed, not quite as enthusiastic about it as she perhaps should be. “So where were you?”

“Oh, right...” The girl fiddled with her bag and to Meghan's surprise produced a spoon.

“Ehh...from what I heard that was something everyone was using the first lesson to overcome the gag reflex. Please tell me you're not stuck there.” Was this girl serious, hadn't she practised anything?

“No, not stuck...” the girl said and put the spoon in her mouth before sliding the larger end into her throat. “Thhee noo gaghrefheesch.” she called with the item there.

Rolling her eyes Meghan reached out and grabbed the girls shoulder , she wasn't quite sure herself if she was just giving the girl a patronizing pat or if she just wanted a hold so she could lean in and get a closer look. The result however, was that the girl jerked, not quite expecting Meghan to actually touch her. This surprise caused her to swallow the spoon, which went down without causing any trouble.

“Ops.” The girl said as she stared up at Meghan, bringing a hand up to cover her mouth.

“Al-right, don't panic.” Meghan calmed her. “I'm not sure you're quite ready to digest a spoon, but we'll get it out, don't fret.” she tried giving the girl a warm smile, it actually came quite natural, for the girl looked both cute and silly as she sat there staring wide eyed. “So what are your names?”

“Kim.” The brunette said, who was quick at the chance to get in on the conversation.

“Bryci...” The black haired girl followed, removing the hand from her mouth in the process and instead lowered it to her belly, which she poked to see if she could feel the spoon.

“Well Bryci, what was pretty cool too wasn't it? Swallowing a large spoon, like any other mouthful.”

“I guess.” The girl smiled back. “But how do I get it out? It's metal, which like you said I probably can't digest.”

“Well, I'll try to get it out, but if I fail, I'm sure the Professor knows a way.”

“Ok, first things first.” Meghan said and rubbed her hands, she'd chosen a sleeveless top today because she figured she'd only get them soaked in spittle with this class on the schedule and all.
“Turn and face me...” Bryci looked puzzled but did as told. “No, your whole body.” Meghan instructed, which made the girl sit sideways in her seat.

“Now sit straight and lean your head back.” Which the girl did, which made Meghan realise that the short girl was quite busty.

The girl struggled to keep looking at Meghan, which was a bit hard with her head turned skywards, but became easier as Meghan stepped in and straddled her legs. She still looked a slightly confused.

“Well it's easier if I have a straight path to your stomach.” Meghan explained “Now open wide...”
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Bryci.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Meghan put first her right hand into the girl's mouth and then tried to ease her left hand in, but it felt pretty tight and she didn't want to hurt the girl. “You should try and relax as much as possible, this might strain a little, but think of it as any other stretching, it should tense a bit.”

She could feel the girl easing up and managed to slide her left hand in as well.

“That's it, just take a few deep breaths and relax.” Meghan realized that the girl had a partner. “Kim could you give Bryci some support so she can relax more?” to which the brunette moved closer and first gave her friend’s head and back some support, but she quickly realised that Meghan was holding the head up well enough and concentrated on providing some back rest, which with her belly in the way was most easily done by providing her own back as one.

“That's it. Great!” Meghan complimented as she felt the tension in Bryci easing up. With her hands in the girl's mouth she could even feel her pulse which at first had been quite high, but which was quickly coming down to what could be passed for someone in a relaxed state.

“Ok, lets see if we can't massage your throat open enough to let me reach down and get that spoon...” Meghan said as if it was some sort of team effort.

She did notice that the mouth wasn't tight around her hands any more, but she was still surprised when the throat didn't offer any serious resistance as she eased her fingers into it, in fact there were no resistance at all, not even when her hands followed, both of them!

“Um... It seems to be working...” She said, just to say something, not that she had done anything so far, but she leaned on down. Perplexed herself by the lack of resistance she continued with both her hands, even so when her fingers poked through into the girl's stomach and her elbows entered the mouth.
Shoving her arms down further she found the spoon and grabbed hold of the object, but not retreating back the way she came.

With her elbows against each other in the girl's throat, her upper arms were already stretching Bryci's mouth quite a bit, but Meghan couldn't really feel any real tension anywhere, so on a whim she spread her elbows apart and grabbing the spoon in her right hand, did the same with her hands.

Amazed she watched down the girl's throat, all the way to her stomach as she slowly stretched open a hole, that got wider and wider. Realising she couldn't stall anymore without it being more awkward than it was already, Meghan quickly stood up and brought her arms out, making a mental note that she'd been spreading the girl open almost the width of her shoulders and she was sure she could have gone further.

“Ehh...here!” Meghan stumbled with the words and handed the spoon back to Bryci. “Don't swallow it again. Ok?” She joked.

“Thanks, I won't.” Bryci smiled. “Oh, I mean, I will, if it means you'll help me again.” she joked back.

“I think I might be able to help you without you doing that. For now though, I think you should go down and get one of those spheres to practice on.”

“Really?” Bryci gaped and Kim too looked surprised.

“Yes. Really.” Meghan emphasised.

“See you girls later.” Meghan said as she excused herself and headed down the stairs, she really needed to talk to Blainey.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
“Professor?” Meghan queried as she approached the woman.

“Yes?” Blainey turned, she had noticed that a girl was approaching, but not taking interest in who, as she'd been busy observing the students of her class. “Oh, miss Hawthorn, what is it?”

“Eh, Meghan, will do fine Professor.” She said, halted by the formal salutation.

“Fair enough, but then you'd better call me Kelly.” The professor smirked.

“Uh...yeah...well...You see, I have a few questions. For one I was a little surprised by a girl I just helped. She had apparently not practised much beyond the spoon and yet I had little...No...I mean, no trouble, stretching her open enough to pull the spoon up out of her stomach sideways, after she had accidentally swallowed it.”

“Heh, well don't let them fool you. We have them sign a paper of non-disclosure regarding the contents of this class, as we don't want the public to know. But you know that. However most that sign up do already know, but feign ignorance to keep their sister, mother, cousin, or childhood friend, from getting into trouble from having told them, or often even taught them. I don't mind, it'd be hard to get a full class if this wasn't as common as it is. The important thing is that the public doesn't know.”

The professor shifted her footing and nodded towards the students, not wanting to point.

“Look at the third row for example, the girl on the far left in the black leather jacket. Her sister took this class last semester. The dark girl a few seats to her right...” Blainey referred to a girl with a deep natural tan, with a hard placed complexion that should she'd chanced a guess spoke of middle-eastern heritage.“...her older twin sisters took this class three or four years ago. The blonde in the pair after her almost swallowed her practice partner just before you got down here, but then remembered to fake learning and picked up a melon instead. The two you see that's not practising much, but quite busy talking instead both know and and are just stalling, because they find practising on objects boring. The blonde at the right end also knows, I'm pretty sure she's had family here before, but I must have had fifty students called 'Smith', so I've got no idea which one taught her.”

“Oh, I didn't know. I thought you were guarding this secret rather intensely.”

“But I am. Why do you think I stand down here looking like a damn stuffed bird watching over the class instead of being up there with the TAs helping? Not all girls are capable of learning and those that are not have no incentive to keep their mouths shut, which means I have to fail them.” Blainey said and to Meghan's surprise patted her belly.

“Oh, I don't mind failing students.” Kelly said with a wink. “It's partly therefore I prefer to have a class of two hundred and thirty, rather than one of just thirty, which would probably be the case if girls didn't spread the word.”

“Not capable of learning? You mean they don't study hard enough?”

“Sometimes that might be the case, but most often girls find the subject fascinating enough to study enough. It would seem that many girls just can't, sure they may think it's cool that they can swallow an orange or a melon whole, but as far as I'm concerned if they can't put someone in their belly, then they belong inside one.”

“The girl you helped the first day? The short dark haired one...”

“Sally?”

“Yes. I thought I'd have to fail her, I was pretty sure actually. I still am pretty sure she'd have failed if she hadn't gotten your help, about as sure as I am that she's reached her potential.” The professor noticed Meghan's perplexed expression, so she continued. “You see, girls are not equal, some like you can learn to swallow insane amounts and some, like Sally can never get beyond fitting a single person in her gut and probably never learn to hide even that one to any great extent.”

“There's also a great range of talents, even when learning the same skills some have a much easier time handling certain aspects. For one, I remember a girl a few years ago that had no problem getting four...or was it five?...girls into her throat, but she couldn't fit even the smallest of them inside her stomach. Another girl on the other hand had a hard time getting even a slender girl down her throat, but she had no trouble hiding anyone she managed to get down.”

“So when you said Sally's reached her potential... You mean she can't improve anymore?”

“Well, sort of, she can still learn new skills and improve in the use of the ones she already knows, but this is an unfair game, skill isn't everything. One needs a natural disposition and yes, it usually takes a while to find out what that is. But as I had initially placed Sally in the 'lost cause' category, I doubt that she'll manage anything that'll impress me, even with your help.”
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Questions...

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
“Help...yeah, about that, I did help another girl this weekend, and well she got a bit hungry...” Meghan stopped herself as she saw that Madeline had come down the stairs and was heading towards the supply table. “Speaking of the devil, that's her.” Meghan nodded towards the large girl.

“Oh, so she's gotten her partner down, I missed that.” the professor exclaimed noticing that the girl helped herself to a bottle of orange.

“Yeah, I watched as she tried helping the girl first, but just couldn't resist gulping her down.” Meghan giggled.

“Well, anyway, she wanted me to ask you if the hunger would subside?”

“Wasn't that vague? Well it totally depends on what 'hunger' means. What did she eat?”

“Ehh...four...or was it five?”

“Ahh, I feared it'd be normal food.”

“No, no, and that was just yesterday. Possibly more if she grabbed something after we parted.”

“Oh, that's quite a bit. Well the body does adapt and a bit of huger as it does is normal, she might get even hungrier before it subsides though, She'll never get back to being content with a cheeseburger, if that's what she was wondering though.” Blainey snickered even as she listened to the girl in question retching in the room behind the classroom.

She'd turned on a couple of showers and the splattering noise of water against tiled floor did help some in covering up the less appealing sounds she was making.

Almost as the afterthought, for which it truly was, Blainey added: “She doesn't need to stuff herself silly, if that was what she feared. The hunger will pass eventually and her stomach will be content with a lot less than her stomach currently tells her that it would.”

“Ehh...” Meghan managed, a little confused by the way Kelly blurted that out.

“What I mean is, that if she can put up with being semi hungry for a while, she'll see that this is just a phase, she doesn't really need to eat as much as her stomach tells her and after a while it'll realise that as well. It's normal to be 'extra' hungry in the beginning. Tell her not to worry.”

“I will. Thanks!” Meghan said as she headed towards the back room to help her friend.

Kelly had been a bit surprised by the amount Meghan had said the girl had eaten. She didn't know how much that had showed or if it really mattered if it had shown. What she didn't tell and didn't want to let on was that she was a firm believer of the theory that one could to some degree influence one's potential while ones body adjusted.

The theory was basically that one's body and thus potential adopted to the challenges it was faced with and that it needed building material to do so. In essence that if one didn't eat enough one would stop developing and fall short of one's full potential and likewise if one continued to present serious challenges to one's body it'd continue to develop beyond what it would most likely have done otherwise.

She wasn't alone on this or similar theories, many had come to similar conclusions, but no one ever voiced them, as they had no interest in the theory being either spread or proved, for just like Blainey, the others that had formed such theories had also reached their potential. And as much as Kelly liked her students, she preferred that they remained her inferiors.

Luckily for her, girls usually found the aspect of eating other people, not only daunting, but also a moral threshold that was difficult to handle and thus often went hungry, to the point that they usually didn't develop their full potential. Many girls had the help of friends and relatives to coax them, but they usually showed restraint. The times that girls had no such qualms Blainey tried to discourage them, even if it was just by saying that they looked like they had put on weight or something, which wasn't always true.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Help...

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Meghan entered the room that were behind the chalkboards of the classroom. It was not unlike a dressing room, even if there was no sauna, not that most would want one considering that they'd just been in a hot sweltering place anyway.

She'd gone back there to check up on Madeline and assist her if need be, but the girl was standing back up with the support of a shower stall wall, just as Meghan closed the door behind her.

The slimy practice partner looked a little taken as she twitched about before collecting her knees beneath her and shakily got to her feet, obviously pretty exhausted by the ordeal, but she looked otherwise unharmed.

Meghan fetched a towel for the girl, but she declined it as she instead stepped into one of the stalls in which Madeline had turned on the water earlier and began removing her clothes. Meghan was a little surprised as she realised just how big the girl was. She stood there looking and hardly even noticed as Madeline took the towel and used it for a napkin before heading over to a sink and did her best to rinse the wretched taste out of her mouth.

She did know that they had paired up according to size, but unconsciously she hadn't accepted it, that the small bulge in Madeline's gut had been this big lass, which was just as tall as Madeline and certainly softer, she wouldn't be surprised if the plump girl had a few pounds on Madeline.

Realising that the girl was getting naked and by the glare she got from the girl that an audience wasn't welcome, Meghan trotted over to Madeline, with a grin on her face.

“Quite a mouthful that one, huh?” She said, trying to keep her voice down so that the girl wouldn't overhear her.

“Yeah, not bad at all...” Madeline admitted. “I could have done without this part though.” she said and spat into the sink before trying to scrape the taste off of her tongue with the towel again.

“I understand, but that would have left her with only one other way out.” Meghan teased, patting Madeline's ample behind.

The big girl was a a bit taken by surprise by that. “Um...yeah.” Before she could form a sentient reply, her stomach spoke what she really thought for her, with a deep long demanding growl.

“The thought crossed your mind, I hear.” Meghan snickered to which Madeline nodded somewhat ashamed, as well as afraid that the girl in question would hear her, if she spoke her mind.

The shower was turned off and the girl asked her partner if she could fetch her bag, since she had her spare clothes in it.
Madeline agreed and left the room, while the girl re-entered the shower and Meghan produced a fresh towel for the girl, before leaving as well.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Cleaning up.

choices: Meghan decides to say hi to Bryci.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
“Meghan. Come over here will you?” The professor called to her as she left the back-room.

“Yes, Prof...Kelly?” Meghan blurted as she went on over to the woman.

“I forgot to tell you earlier.” Blainey said as she turned towards her desk and retrieved a piece of paper.

“I took the liberty of bringing a form. Fill this in and put it in the white letterbox by the school reception desk.”A smug smile grew on the woman's lips as she watched Meghan's emotions toil when she accepted the paper, wondering what it was. “Class starts on Friday.” She added before stepping away, leaving Meghan with her dumbfounded look and the application paper for the advanced class.

Ogling the sheet up and down, Meghan tried to determine if the professor was pulling her leg, but she decided pretty quickly that it wasn't the case. There wasn't much information on it though, just a few paragraphs of mumbo jumbo that required a few signatures. There wasn't even any information at all what the class was about, not even it's name, just a time and place to be and the course code, which was apparently: GI8U2.

Meghan was brought back to her senses by the class gathering their things and leaving. So she put the paper away in her own bag and headed for the door.

As she waited for everyone in front of her to mill out of the classroom, she realised that after Wednesday's class, she'd no longer be a TA, she had after all only agreed to be such up until an advanced class would start and now that was happening.

Being taller than most, Meghan looked out into the hallway beyond the blocked door and saw Bryci standing there against the opposite wall, half sitting in the narrow windowsill, apparently waiting for someone.

Seeing the girl, made Meghan remember that she'd sort of promised to help her. It also made her recall what the professor had said about girls faking ignorance.
No it had seemed genuine, either Bryci is one hell of an actor or she has to fall in the 'natural talent' category. How was it the professor had said, high potential?

Admittedly she thought it'd be more fun with a friend that could develop some skills than a 'lost cause'. Meghan hadn't realized that the professor's speech had affected her so much, but then again she had assumed Sally would get better, if she can't then it'd be almost like hanging with a normal person and she knew her sister would eat any such she brought home, unless...someone of these girls got Sally first.

That was a strange thought, most of these girls would start eating people soon enough, or at least she felt pretty sure they would.

Eventually she made it though the door and outside things moved along much better.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: The Professor.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Hmm...were she to pick a friend?

It seemed so odd to consciously choose who'd be your friend. But she had to admit she had never had many and most of the ones she'd gotten her little sister had shown what she had considered to be their proper place.

And if what Blainey said was true, then that's most likely the scenario that'd play out with Sally and her friends if they were ever to come on over, not to mention that if Madeline opened her mouth she'd likely get swarmed by request of helping them hunt as well. The thought felt like a ton of bricks on her shoulders.

Then there was Bryci, she had seemed friendly enough... and then some...
Sure she'd probably need to help the girl out at first, but after that?

The question led her thoughts to a scenario she found appealing, as admitted were the looks of the girl as she now got a much better look of the short pretty raven haired girl. Had she been starting to check girls out? The thought perplexed her, but she pondered it for a while and settled with accepting that she did find Bryci more attractive than Sally or any of her friends, the girl had an interesting look and a face somewhere between cute and sultry with a dainty little mouth that still retained nice full lips.

Heck she'd like to see her eat someone with that little mouth. A realisation that made up her mind.

“Hi! Bryci, was it?” Meghan said trying the, at least to her, unusual name while trying to keep out of the milling crowd still flooding the corridor.

“Yeah...hi!” The short girl replied nodding, almost glowing despite her pitch black hair.

Meghan considered how to approach the subject, but figured she might as well get straight to the point, she did after all have to get her ass to the next class pretty soon.
“Well you see, I just learned that I don't have to be a TA any more and I'd hate to go back on my word. So what say you, of a little private lesson later?”

Bryci, didn't quite follow, or rather she didn't really believe what she had just heard, so all she managed was an open mouthed “W-what?”

“You, me, in private, later?” Meghan clarified over the rustle and chatter of all the milling students. “Ok?”

“Sure!” Bryci smiled back when she came to the conclusion that it wasn't a joke on Meghan's part.

“After school ok?” Meghan wondered and received a nod. “Here” she added as she fished out her cellphone and pressed to get a new entry for a contact. “Type your number and I'll call you later.”

Bryci, adapt with the item still managed to fumble a few times before getting the number right and handing the phone back.

“Great, see you later then!” Meghan said as she merged with the crowd and headed for her next class.

Bryci felt all giddy, should she tell Kim? No, she decided this would be her little secret.
Kim could swallow large oranges...Meghan could...her mind swooned at the thought. And she was going to get a one on one session...
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Being friendly?

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Meghan hadn't really thought this through, at least not at a conscious level.

So with her classes done for the day she started SMS:ing Bryci, that her own classes were over didn't mean that the other girl's were.

It also gave her an excuse to wander about looking occupied and sneak up closer to people, she had a few attempts spoiled as other people emerging at the scene, but eventually she found a guy to satisfy her nutritional needs for the day.
