Though she paid her cell phone more attention that him, even if he caused her to take a break in her typing in order to find the location of the ladies' room.

From her message exchange she gathered both that Bryci was on her way home and that she actually lived pretty close by, she got the address and code for the apartment-building’s front door too.

With the guy out of her system, she realized that she should probably bring something for later.

The few minutes she'd stayed at school had really thinned out the residents, so now she found getting alone with a straggler wasn't that hard, in fact as she looked around she found several targets sitting alone, two of the computer-labs in this corridor alone offered such and looking around a bend she saw a guy up ahead, sitting alone on a couch studying.

Hearing footsteps behind her she turned to see a tall blonde, having just exited the stairwell and was walking away from Meghan. Opening the door separating the stairwell and the corridor had caused the girl to nearly drop the books and papers she was carrying, so she was walking pretty slowly as she tried to get her stuff together again.

For Meghan there was no hesitation, with confident strides she set a pace that would cause her to quickly overtake the other girl.
Apparently the girl didn't sense any danger, she didn't turn as Meghan closed in on her, in fact she didn't react at all until Meghan's moist lips had closed around the girl's trim middle. The sight of the girl had made Meghan salivate, in a short dress that left her arms and most of her legs bare she had as far as Meghan was concerned looked delicious.

Sucking in those long smooth struggling legs, didn't disappoint, the girl was nice and clean and wore a tasteful perfume that gave her a delightful fragrance, she had probably used some moisturising cream as well, which added a pleasant taste.

It was all Meghan could do to keep from Mmm:ing as she rolled the girl around in her mouth, it even took her a moment before her brain slapped her and told her to leave the scene of the crime and swallow the girl before she got caught.

So reluctantly she let the girl slide down into her cavernous stomach, at least she'd get to enjoy the girl's struggles for a while, she didn't usually keep meals around, but there was certainly merit in holding the digestion at bay for a while first. But then she usually only ate when she was hungry and the hunger didn't dissipate until the meal did. Keeping people in the stomach did absolutely nothing in regards of relieving hunger, or worse hunger pains.

It was only minutes later that she rounded a corner and saw the building up ahead where Bryci supposedly lived.
The code opened the door and standing in the quiet entrance she could make out music reverberating from the walls, apparently someone a floor or so up was playing very loud music, but it still barely registered down here, still a sign that this was a building for student apartments, the floor chart on the wall was another implication, simply by the sheer number of apartments, indicating that they had to be pretty small to fit that many in.

Oh, floor and apartment...she looked at the chart realising that she didn't have Bryci's last name, still that was an unusual first name, by any luck they had spelled it out. As she read she saw that there were both kinds listed, both with the full first name and the kind with just the first letter and a dot.

Holding her thumbs she scanned the floors on the chart and found a Bryci Collin on the fifth floor.

So she was at the right place, looking over her shoulder she noted that there were both stairs and elevator to choose from, perhaps not surprising for an eleven story building. Still she'd had to choose which to use.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Preparations.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Meghan gives the elevator a quick glance, more to see if someone is about to come out of it or not, rather than an interest in using it.
It's not like stairs is an enemy of hers, even with a passenger in her belly she gingerly bounce up the steps, taking them several at a time with ease.

Reaching the second floor of the building she can tell the music came from here, and with the stairs circling the elevator she passes it seeing the doors close behind what she thought was a curly haired feminine brunette.

The next floor also had a loud resident, almost as loud as the one below, passing the elevator she could tell it was going up, though her pace had her outrunning it so as she climbed the last two floors she was ahead, noticing that there were more people who liked their TV on maximum and music high there as well.

Reaching Bryci's door and ringing the bell she saw the elevator go past, but the angle was wrong so she didn't get a look inside.

Bryci opened without hesitation, it almost seemed to Meghan as if she'd been waiting at the door, but a look inside told her that might not necessarily have been the case. The apartment was certainly not big.

On her right was a narrow opening into a small excuse for a kitchen.
Most of the remaining wall on the right was taken up by a large desk, encumbered by a computer and piles of school books, on top of which rested a shiny practice sphere, the smallest version if she guessed correctly.

The far wall, the only one with windows, though the blinds were closed, had a queen-sized bed protruding from it, taking up a large part of the room.
Leaving the wall on the left full of wardrobes, most of which had their doors covered in mirrors, making the room seem a little larger than it actually was. The last door in the row, directly to the left as one entered, was the one leading to the bathroom.

“Welcome to my humble abode.” Bryci greeted.

Meghan could tell that she'd made a rush cleaning, the bed was probably not usually made and the books on the desk looked like they had been hastily piled according to size rather than content and relevance. She supposed that she appreciated the effort, though not quite sure if she actually cared as long as the place didn't smell or looked dirty.

“Thanks.” She said removing her shoes and setting her school-backpack down by the side of the door. “I see you brought a sphere home.”

“Yeah, you told me to get one, but I haven't tried it.” Bryci blushed, ashamed that she hadn't followed up on Meghan's instructions during class, but had made Kim try it instead and she had failed.

“Oh, don't fret.” Meghan calmed her, it was not the type of sphere Meghan had had in mind anyhow, this one was no bigger than a kid's basketball and Meghan realized that she had neglected to mention the size to Bryci, she had meant something the size of a large medicine ball, or possibly larger. She was uncertain as to how much Bryci could handle, but it seemed that her ignorance was genuine, possibly for the better, she decided that a humble Bryci was certainly better than a cocky one.

Taking a seat on the bed as the only chair available seemed to be the office chair by the desk that Bryci was sitting in, Meghan pondered out loud. “I'm not quite sure where to begin... Have you read the book?”

“Sure! Many times...” Bryci started enthusiastic, but waning “but ...I haven't practised much...more like ehm...imagined.” she managed, in lack of a better word, she did manage to fool Meghan though. Who took it for theoretical practice rather than fantasizing about the ordeal in general and going by the blush on the short girl's face and averted eyes, probably Meghan in particular.

Bryci had found the book very interesting indeed and helpful too in visualizing what happened inside the body and the fate of the unfortunate food, so she wasn't lying when she said she had read it many times, at least the parts with descriptions and action, there was a lot of rules and warnings and mumbo-jumbo in the book that she admittedly had only read in order to make certain that she hadn't missed out on anything essential or interesting, as a result her book was now clearly marked so she knew what parts to skip.

“Al-right, then we just need to put that theory into practice then.” Meghan smiled. “First thing first, you need to open your mouth really wide.”

Bryci looked dumbfounded and opened her pink little mouth as if at the dentist, revealing a healthy pink inside and pearl white teeth.

“No. I mean really wide, I'm sure the book covers that.” She didn't actually know if it did or not, she had to admit that she hadn't actually read it. “Like this.” Meghan said and opened her mouth, making it stretch wider and wider in a weird way because things seemed to be proportionally enlarged to some extent on the inside so it wasn't just strangely extended lips.

Bryci in turn only looked on in awe at the display, she had indeed read about it, but not really considered applying the techniques on herself, the thought was a bit awkward, not that she had anything against doing the eating herself, she had just not looked at herself as the one doing the eating.
The feeling of not being the predator intensified as she realised that she could easily fit inside the pink cavern Meghan showed to her.

Ready to leave they:

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Schoolgrounds.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:

The interruption caused the girls to look up from their work for a moment, but they didn't recognise the cheerful girl that stepped inside, before the door could close though another one entered as well.

“Hey Meghan!” One of them called, confusing Meghan as she didn't recognise the redhead, nor her slightly softer brunette friend.

“Hey!” Meghan answered none the less and walked over to the girls a tad confused.

“We were going through the assignments for Thursday's class, but we're totally stuck on 324, especially the B-part of the problem. Have you figured it out?” The redhead continued.

“Well I haven't gotten that far yet, but let me take a look, maybe I can figure it out.” She said realizing that they must be in the same class for organic chemistry.

The two girls parted a little as Meghan stepped around behind them, so that there'd be room for her to lean on down between them and have a look at the problem. Thus they were a little surprised when her hands were placed on their outer sides and forced them together before everything went dark.

Meghan didn't really savour the two, she just quickly engulfed them all the way to the chairs' seats, then sucked the rest of them in as she swallowed repeatedly in order to get them down quickly.

“You knew those two?”

“No, can't say I've ever seen them before, but judging by this...” Meghan said and held up a book on organic chemistry, “...I'd guess they were in the same chem-class as me, but there's like two-three hundred students taking that, I've no idea how they knew my name.”

Bryci nodded, accepting the explanation, before moving her eyes from Meghan's face, down to her trim and still flat belly.

“Shall we go somewhere more private or is this fine?” Meghan asked, gathering the girls' things not wanting to leave stuff behind, but more importantly she realised that they had solved most of the problems for the assignment that was due Thursday and she herself hadn't even started on them yet.

“What's more private?” Bryci wondered seeing as how few people had been around and now they were inside a room with a pretty well isolated door. Admittedly there was still the chance of someone coming along, she just considered it slim.

“Well higher up for one, I'm guessing there's none above this floor as there's no students' rooms up there and the further up the father away will we be from anyone if these two decide to cause a ruckus.” Meghan said patting her belly. “I'm also pretty sure there's a handicap bathroom on each floor. They don't have windows.” She added, nodding towards the small round glass-window in the door leading into the hallway.

Convinced Bryci agreed to go further up the house and accepted the bag that Meghan had managed to cram both the girl's stuff into, despite that, it didn't bother her much, a couple of weeks ago she'd have complained about hauling something that heavy around.
Even the stairs didn't bother her, she knew they opted out the elevator because they wanted to see and hear if there were anyone around.

Exiting the stairwell on the eighth floor even though there were a few more above that, they looked around before searching for the bathroom in question.

It was hardly hidden, with signs in the ceiling and on the walls pointing the way and there was indeed a handicap bathroom amongst the half-dozen restrooms that clustered together.
Finding it unlocked, Meghan opened the door to find it:

Still without the rigidness of the struggling meals before, she had a slimy aspect to her, not in a distasteful way like eating a snail or anything, but gravity alone wanted to make her already wet and slippery form to just slide on down, so she did more or less just that. All Bryci had to do really was to relax and guide her on her way down. It didn’t even take a minute before the girl was just a bulge in her belly, a very large one at that. Bryci had left her fly open and that was a good thing because it would have been forced open otherwise and her purple top was hiked up so high it didn’t really cover more than her sports bra did.

“Okay, I’m ready.” Bryci said and patted her huge gut.

“Alright.” Meghan said and opened her mouth wide and bent down over the much shorter girl.
But then Meghan pulled back, she’d never even touched Bryci, but the girl had been head and shoulders inside that dark chasm, so it was perhaps not so surprising that she looked a bit taken.

“Sorry about that, but you do look nicely fattened up.” Meghan giggled and patted Bryci’s big belly.

Bryci’s brain struggled to process it all for a real response. She did know that that was another aspect of fantasy she’d have to explore, finding herself getting a bit moist as well as eying Meghan a bit more thorough than was prudent, not that Meghan noticed as she wrote it off as just her friend coping with the shock of her prank.

“Ehh...was that a compliment?” Bryci struggled. “...No, you just called me fat, didn’t you?” She finally settled, crossing her arms on top of her bulging belly in a playfully miffed manner, trying really hard not to make as big a deal of Meghan’s prank as it really was to her.

She did in earnest find it scary and struggled to cope with the fact that Meghan could eat and digest her on the spot with little trouble, but at the same time she also realised that if Meghan would have had any intention of eating her, then that would have happened a long time ago. So she would have to harden her nerves and learn to accept this new world turned upside down and the morbid humour that did come with it, she did see the funny aspect of Meghan’s joke, but that didn’t mean she could bring herself to laugh at it just yet.
Probably didn’t help that it had turned her on as much as scared her seeing as embarrassment and laughter don’t play along that well either.

This time Bryci remained standing and at Meghan’s request tried to hold back digestion least she’d digest the girl in her stomach before they were done.
It actually proved harder than she thought, as she hadn’t been interested in that aspect before, so Meghan had to start her instructions there before moving on to the actual task at hand. The bulging dome of Bryci’s belly, which so happened to be under Meghan’s hands, being prodded and poked as Meghan guided Bryci’s attention to different areas, organs and ways to perform a technique.

The actual poking tended to break Bryci’s concentration, causing her to drop all techniques previously applied and only focus on the one Meghan was currently telling her about, probably for the better in the long run seeing as it’s a tad hard to listen when you’re multitasking, but it did mean that the bulge in Bryci’s middle moved about quite a bit despite its occupant hardly even flinching, as it shrank and re-grew and shifted this way and back.

So when Meghan slowed down and stopped the poking and instead just went back to repeat the things she’d already covered while gently stoking the dome, she got as shocked as she had been earlier in class as she dome quickly shrank away and she found herself rubbing Bryci’s smooth flat belly after just a couple of moments.

She realized she was gaping dumbfounded, but luckily she noticed that Bryci’s eyes were closed, so she gathered herself together as Bryci’s own hands came up to rub the belly as well. “That’s the way girl. You’re getting the hang of this.” Meghan said, trying not to sound as impressed as she was.

Bryci, having had her arms at her sides while she concentrated, opened her eyes at those words and looked down surprised when her hands didn’t meet the protruding bulge they expected.
“Oh wow...” She giggled. “Look at that!”

She rubbed the top of her belly and gave it a hard poke.
“I can feel her in there...” her smile faltered a bit “Now I kind of wished she’d move around some more...”

“You haven’t forgotten to give her air have you?”

“No, I don’t think so...”

“Well give her a bath then! That should wake her right up, I suspect.”

Bryci didn’t really answer, she just donned a smile that with her rather sultry appeal to begin with failed somewhat at being mischievous and crossed over to being rather scary. The ominous gurgles that followed from her belly didn’t change that one bit and Meghan watched with some fascination as Bryci’s belly-caressing hands moved lower, indicating the state of the girl inside.

It wasn’t long before Bryci undid her pants fully and retook her previous seat.

She much preferred this digestion to her previous ones. This time the meal was small and helpless and didn’t feel like a strain...well up until the point where she had to expel it. There it ruined her experience, not painful, but not effortless and not insignificant either. The remains of the girl were barely less than the previous one and that size difference was most likely due to their original size difference.
Luckily the chair again bottomed out, so she wouldn’t have to face the cause of her indignation.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Redhead.

choices: Meghan doesn’t want to try and catch someone in the act.
She decides to at least give it a try, but it’s getting rather late.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
“You looked like you enjoyed her more than the first one. Personally I thought the first one was tastier.” Meghan mused as Bryci got herself in order.

“Well taste-wise you may be right, but the last one was so much easier going and I liked not being bloated.” Bryci giggled as she thought of what she had just done. “Though I didn’t really like the finish...she was as troublesome there as the first one...you don’t know any trick to make them well...stay small...sortof?”

“No...” Meghan started, but halted herself, when she realised that Haley had said something about that...”Well I don’t know, but I think there’s a way.”

“Oh!” Bryci had first looked a bit disappointed, but she couldn’t help becoming giddy when she heard the hopeful tone of Meghan’s voice.

“Tell you what. I’ll let you in on a little secret, promise not to tell anyone.”

“Okay, I promise!” Bryci sounded surprisingly sincere for once, so Meghan didn’t push the subject.

“Alright, Blainey is holding an advanced class, and well, I’m in it. That’s why I’m quitting as a TA for you guys. Hopefully it will be covered there. My sister said something about something like that and she’s kind of snoopy, and usually right.”

“So she knows?”

“Nah, I don’t think so.” Meghan lied. “I wouldn’t ask her if I were you though as she’d probably just try if she could, using you as a test subject.” She added a bit more truthfully. “Then again that’s her usual way of greeting people, so you might not have time to ask in the first place, which is why I won’t invite you over to our place.”

Bryci looked both intrigued and a little paranoid.
“Is she here at school too?”

“No...” Meghan started, not sure if she should mention that it was actually her younger sister. “School should be safe...from her...” she added realizing that Blainey had been teaching girls to eat each other for years, who knew how many hungry girls were out there?

“I do realise though that the class you’re taking, the v101, isn’t a new one. I don’t know how many times Blainey has held that, or how many of those girls are about, or how much of a danger they present. I don’t know the code of conduct. Perhaps they don’t eat each other? Perhaps there’s some secret badge or something to tell who’s taken the class and that’s a way of leaving each other alone?“

Stopping her rambling for a moment, she concluded. “I haven’t heard of anything like that though, so you should probably keep an eye out. And if you do hear anything, please tell me right away, will you?” She said making the ‘call me’-sign with her right hand.

“So you think there might actually be a lot of girls out there actually eating people and not just swallowing stuff, like we do in class?” Bryci realised she hadn’t actually thought about it as much as dreamt about it, fantasy and reality, tended, even for a dreamy girls such as her, to be two different things and she usually found the former more interesting than the latter, even if this evening was proving that she might have been wrong in that assessment.

“Yeah...” Meghan started, remembering the girl she encountered under the water at the beach and the lifeguard...then her mind wandered to Madeline, whom she had fed herself and the way Madeline had talked about it, seriously doubting Madeline would stop eating people. “I’ve seen a few.” She said realising that she had forgotten about her mom’s and Professor Blaney’s research teams, not to mention the ladies themselves...even though she avoided thinking about her mother’s eating habits.

Bryci just nodded and her mind started wandering.

“We’re done here right?” Meghan said as she picked up the now flushed girls’ belongings intending to see just how much of her homework the girls had done for her and stepped back out into the hallway, assuming Bryci would follow.
That the girl did, but she sort of sneaked a bit paranoid about getting jumped by someone but mostly just wanting to try and sneak up on someone and catching them in the act, now that Meghan had convinced her that that was actually a real possibility and not just a scenario that could play out in her perverted mind.

She wasn’t bad at it, Meghan didn’t hear her, so she turned around to see if Bryci was coming along and found the girl moving suspiciously right behind her.

“What are you doing?”

“Sneaking” Bryci whispered.

“Why?”

“Because I want to see what you saw, someone doing what we just did and we can’t catch them if we make a lot of noise, remember how we tried not to get caught earlier?”

“Yeah, I do...” Meghan sighed... not that she wasn’t intrigued by the idea. It was after all one of the main reasons she’d taught Madeline and Bryci in the first place. Then again getting caught sneaking around like Bryci was, would be pretty embarrassing.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Shatting...

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
“Maybe some other time Bryci.” Meghan snickered “I’ve really got to get back home.”

The two of them made it back outside together where their paths went different ways.

“Now remember to practice, no more just helping your partner.” Meghan scolded.

“Yes Mam!” Bryci joked and stuck out her tongue.

Meghan was glad she’d approached the girl, she seemed quite fun despite her initial fan-girl act. “Don’t hesitate to call. I don’t think my schedule is all that busy, so don’t be a stranger.” Meghan said as they waved goodbye.

Not really knowing what to expect from the girl, she was a little surprised to get a sms later with Bryci’s MSN and email. She responded with sending a picture of herself poking her tongue out like Bryci had done before and a message with her YIM name, also stating that MSN was a total spyware.

After that she wasn’t so surprised when her computer blipped as Bryci had joined her preferred instant messaging service and sent her a message. School really had to take precedence at this point though so she kept the chatting to a minimum.

Unfortunately Meghan had paid a bit too little attention to the actual assignments she’d been given and felt a bit bad about turning Bryci down the next day, when she asked if they could meet up later. Apparently there had been a group assignment that she had totally missed and it wasn’t helping that when she found a group that she could join, she just wanted to eat most of them, two of the guys for being so damn annoying and the other two girls for just looking so delicious. Not that the last guy wasn’t rather tasty looking as well, but he didn’t show nearly as much skin as the girls did... Perhaps it would have helped if she’d gotten something to eat before sitting down and spending most of the evening with them.
Heck even after they were done she had to look at their finished assignment to get their names, because she couldn’t remember them.

Even so, when they were done she did control her urges and went and found someone else to eat, some male student that ogled her as she walked by. He hadn’t been hard to lure somewhere private, even if they had already been alone, she had decided against taking the risk of doing it right then and there.
She didn’t learn his name either, nor his taste, as she’d just been too damn hungry to get the clothes off of him. At least he’d been a hefty guy and thus more filling than most and the highlight of her day, which was saying something, she really hoped tomorrow would be a lot better.

It started well enough. Even if Meghan couldn’t help but feel that there would be some unforeseen task or assignment that she had missed that’d jump her and ruin it as well.
So she was relieved when school was over and she was only given half right.

There had been an semi-unforeseen task she’d neglected, but it was one she could live with, as it was Bryci that had texted her, asking her to bring a few ‘friends’ over, like the one she had brought last time.
Not being able to help the grin on her face at the cute way she had phrased it, she had texted back that she would see what she could do.

So far the school was a pretty busy place though, so she wasn’t sure what to do. Thinking that if she should carry some over to Bryci, then she should probably eat first, carrying people around tended to help you build up an appetite and she hadn’t eaten since last night.
Frankly there’d be one less to carry if she ate her meal first, plus with any luck the corridors wouldn’t be so buzzing with people after she’d taken care of her own needs.

It wasn’t easy, people everywhere and all the skin showing didn’t help either, it just felt like teasing. For some reason they always seemed to be in groups. Yes the girls seemed to always be in groups she corrected herself realising that her hungry eyes had focused on the bare delicious looking skin and neglecting the more covered up guys...whom she noticed were quite frequently moving about on their own.

She also realised that she was in the entirely wrong place. If she wanted to snag someone she should be in one of the less trafficked areas, like some corridor a few stories up where there’d hopefully be the occasional comer or goer from a computer lab or something.

Plan laid out she waited by the toilets as they offered a bit of an alcove into which she could drag her victim. There was also the possibility of someone coming to use it, to which she hoped she could decipher their intent in time. Meaning that she could let them do that and she’d eat them afterwards instead, as she didn’t really appreciate the mental image of her prey being scared shitless in her mouth.

Having a look in one of the mirrors and adjusting her garb to help grab a man’s attention she stepped back out and waited for a suitable target to entice, ensnare and engulf.
It wasn’t long after that something caught her attention.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Moving on...

choices: She decides to hunt more actively.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Having fiddled with her jeans, bra and top, probably didn't give her any edge in this case, not that she didn't think it wouldn't have if her victim had paid any attention, but he was nearly blundering into the walls as he was busy sorting the papers he was also searching through.

Probably going to write a report she thought, while at the same time deciding to step out of sight instead of confronting him and as he passed she hurried up behind him and spread her mouth out and engulfed as much as she could in one go.
Her height helping her in this case as she was able to with a small leap come down over him and lean on down, taking him in as she went, knocking his hands down while her lips moved to close around his hips, sending a few papers flying in the process.
Then she quickly straightened herself and leaned her head back, lifting the remainder of the guy up over herself with surprising ease and sucked with gravity's help the rest of him inside, before with a quick swallow sending a lump down her throat which was what the male student had been reduced to.

Looking around quickly to see if anyone had caught her she spotted none and heard the feet of no one.
Relieved she reached down and gathered the papers the guy had dropped and with some hesitation she shoved then in and swallowed them down to join their owner, whom was busy being further reduced from the lump of meet he had been to a soup. Meghan hadn't even let him put up a futile struggle, but had given him the business treatment of her digestive tract and he was soon shown the next stage in the process. It wouldn't be long before he would be asking to be let out so she stepped back into the toilet she had visited earlier and took a seat.

In a couple of seconds he had been swallowed and a couple of moments is all the time he had spent in Meghan's stomach and after a couple of minutes he was already coming back out and by that time she had already forgotten all about him, as she finished up and pondered how she should tackle Bryci's request. She considered outright skipping it and going over to the girl empty stomached, but at the same time she had semi agreed and she didn't really want to go back on her word.
Still that didn't mean she had to hang around in this boring corridor hoping for the best, even if it had yielded her a meal that guy had been the first one she'd seen since coming here, the next might be a while and she didn't feel like waiting.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Loner.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Fishing out her cellphone she notes that not much time has actually passed, she did get her meal rather quickly and as such the digital numbers on her touch-screen read sixteen : twenty three. With them having decided to meet up at Bryci's place by five that did leave three quarters of an hour. So she could wait here and if nothing showed up go for a more aggressive approach, which she knew by experience was the harder way of doing things as it was hard to find the opportunity to strike. Admittedly it was the more fun way to go, even if it tended to leave one with a hungry belly more often than not.

With that in mind she settled for waiting... the boring kind, where even the seconds seem to drag out, as was apparent by the fact that when she thought she had waited forever and got her cellphone out again it said only eight minutes had passed.
Returning it, with a sigh, to its place in the outer pocket of her school-bag of choice for the day, a shoulder-slung overgrown handbag-looking thing in black leather, before putting the bag back down on the floor again in order for it not to be in the way when she got busy.

She stopped herself from humming a tune and only after having let her fingertips tap frustratedly on the wall did she bring herself from doing that as swell and struggled from doing any other such action of boredom while the minutes slowly crept passed, without a single soul passing.

Thus when she heard girls talking down the hall and coming her way, she felt relieved and decided to confront them despite the fact that they weren't lone easy pickings. Figuring that since no one had passed for all this time she was pretty sure she could get things done and be out of there despite there being a bit of a commotion, before anyone came to investigate.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Stay a while...stay for...

choices: The girls had heard the conversation, or at least enough of it.
They had not made out what had been said.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
It was pretty obvious that by their conversation that the girls had just finished a session in a lab and were coming up here to write their report, probably the same as the guy she had eaten just before, but unlike him the girls seemed to be paying more attention to where they were heading. Making Meghan realise that she couldn't just stand there and stare at them while they approached, so she settled for faking finishing up a bathroom visit and stepping back out while they passed.

It worked pretty well, they paid her no mind and like with the guy before she quickly snuck up behind them and before they got suspicious she struck.

In a spur of the moment she decided to try something. Thus reaching out, she put a hand on the side of each of the girls and squeezed them together, while her mouth opened wide and descended over their heads.
Glad to hear only their muffled protests and feeling their erratic struggles as she worked their shoulders and torsos down her throat. Meghan hence had them fairly pinned before the girls panic stricken minds came up with more creative and useful ways of resisting, but by then Meghan had a good hold on both of them and just crammed them both in a foot or more at a time, meaning that in just a few short swallows her lips closed behind their feet and she was able to swallow them down. Feeling with delight as they wiggled and squirmed, taking delight even in the small inaudible vibrations, once they had settled in her still flat stomach, that came from the girls screaming their heads off.

They would do nicely Meghan decided as she patted her belly and retrieved her school-bag, deciding to hide the girls away enough to give them ample of room to move about. She always did like it when they didn't just sit still and whimper and whine, these girls seemed pretty energetic and feisty, she hoped they kept a little spunk for Bryci, but that didn't mean she couldn't enjoy them first.

As the walk wasn't long it was just a few minutes later that Meghan rang the bell on Bryci's door, hoping the girl would be home despite her being twenty minutes early.

The lock of the door moved before the handle, apparently it was set to auto-lock upon being closed. Not that it mattered, Meghan was more focused on the warm eager smile of the short pretty girl that stood in the opening. She decided to give the girl a hug, barging on in without a formal invitation. Holding the girl in one arm she reached back and closed the door with the other.

“Hello to you too?!” Bryci giggled as her feet dangled a foot off the floor in Meghan's grasp.

“Well you were blocking the way.” Meghan joked as she set the girl down in order to get her shoes and short jacket off.

Bryci put her right hand on her guest's belly as the girl turned around, spurring a “Yes, I brought you a little something...” from Meghan, much to her delight. So with her initial question answered she trotted back into the main room, eager to begin.

Meghan soon made her company, taking a seat on the made bed opposite Bryci, who had claimed the only real chair in the room, the office chair by her desk.
The short raven-haired girl had on the same pants she had changed into after her shower the day before yesterday and a similar top that would allow her belly to stretch.

“Can I have one right now?” Bryci inquired. “I'm soo hungry...”

Meghan hadn't noticed before, but her friend's belly was more or less continuously grumbling, perhaps that was why she hadn't, if it had just been the occasional roar, then it would have stuck out and grabbed one's attention.

“Well I was figuring you should really be catching your own meals...”

“Aww... come on... Please!” Bryci whined.

“Oh, don't be such a miserable little puppy. I have an idea...” Meghan smirked, looking quite pleased with herself and the idea she'd gotten.

“What?”

“Get undressed...”

“What?!” Bryci cut her off, repeating her earlier question.

“Just listen...” Meghan continued. “... You don't want your clothes ruined and I very much intend to eat you and taste you while doing so. Once in my stomach...” She said patting the flat expanse hiding the two people already inside. “...you can eat the girls already there.” She said not knowing how much of this the girls in there heard of the conversation.

“Well al-right...” Bryci said resigning to Meghan's request, or demand, not really sure which it was. She did however not find the idea at all as bad as she had let on. Meghan stating that she'd eat her had sent a shiver down her spine, in a good way.
So she got out of her chair and started pulling her garments off, tossing them onto the bed, pausing only to see if Meghan wanted her bra and panties to go as well.

The sports-bra did join the other clothes on bed, but her pink lace panties were only at her knees when Meghan grabbed her hips and shoved her whole bottom into her mouth in one go. A hard suck and she was folded over forwards, with only her shoulders, arms and lower legs sticking out.

Meghan leaned her head back and Bryci tumbled into her mouth entirely.
The short girl was delicious and hidden away inside the tall blonde's mouth Bryci was indeed short. Laying flat out on Meghan's tongue she wasn't even reaching from her teeth to the back of her throat, a position she found herself in after Meghan had tossed her about and tasted her some, the saliva covering every inch of the girl.

Not content there however Meghan continued to enjoy the flavour of her black-haired treat, who in turn was more or less forced to hug the giant tongue, but she wasn't forced to hump and grind herself into its pink slippery slithering flesh. Bryci didn't much mind the abuse, apparently she could handle the battering that would have left a normal girl bruised and beaten. Instead she had to struggle when she felt like she was going to cream all over Meghan's tongue.
Luckily Meghan swallowed her before she failed and she let herself climax in the girl's throat instead, spasming as the muscles around her rhythmically pushed her downwards in a controlled and effective manner and a moment later she was forced through a sphincter and to her surprise dropped into an open space.
She had expected to be forced into a fairly tight slimy chamber with another girl, not falling some feet and land on a moist and fairly hard surface, but not slimy.

The darkness made her incapable of assessing her surroundings properly though, there wasn't the slightest shimmer of light. It felt weird, in here with her in this darkness was someone else, yet all she could sense was the overwhelming heat and humidity of the chamber and the noises that surrounded it, most notably the steady thump-thump of Meghan's heart. Well there was the steady complaining of her own displeased gut, but that was about it.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Two girls walking.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
She felt alone in there, but Bryci knew she wasn't, so she reached out with her arms feeling for something, a tad surprised that she didn't even feel the wall of the stomach she was in.
Then her whole world lurched as Meghan stood up.

A gasp from somewhere to her right revealed that Bryci wasn't the only one taken off-guard by the sudden movement that had sent her sprawling back to the stomach floor.

Bryci decided to just crawl over to the noise instead of walking, a task she saw as nigh impossible while Meghan was doing just that, even if the giant blonde kept her stomach perfectly still. She couldn't discern a single ripple going through the fleshy walls of the chamber she was in.

It wasn't far, she had hardly begun before her hands blundered onto something that yelped and struggled to get away, but in the dark and already pressed against the wall of her prison, the girl didn't get anywhere before Bryci had realised what she was and reacted. Putting her hands out to grab some part of the girl or other and as she was on her knees and the girl standing, she got one fist of calf and another of ankle, which served her just fine.

A tug on both revealed that she could apparently lift the girl with surprising ease and as a result the girl toppled over, falling away from the naked girl holding her lower legs and enveloping her futilely twitching feet, that she was unable to kick about as long as they were trapped in the iron grip of the unseen woman.

She yelled for help, her friend was in the darkness somewhere, but no answer came. All she could do was struggle as best she could and continue screaming. Apparently it did her little good as she quickly felt her lower legs and calves follow her feet down her aggressor’s throat and trying to hit her opponent with her balled up fists resulted in only a couple of glancing hits before they were pinned and crammed in along with her hips, only to be swallowed down quickly.

Not until her waist was sliding into her aggressor did she sense her friend, who apparently had a hard time making out where anyone were as in the pitch black darkness she had only her hearing to go by. A few uncomfortable impacts on her right shin and thigh through the skin of the girl eating her, told her that her friend was kicking her foe as best she could. It didn't seem to slow the girl down though, who just grunted and using her hands forcefully crammed the rest of her current meal into her mouth.

Turning around as she swallowed hard, Bryci fended herself, and managed after a couple of tries to grab the kicking leg, quickly cramming it into her mouth and as the other foot came up to stomp at her she shoved that in alongside the first.

Feeling pretty satisfied with herself she decided to take her time with this girl and enjoy both her struggles and pleas for mercy, only when the girls fists came flying did she speed up enough to get them under control, but then she returned to her slow pace.

Outside Meghan had first stood up pondering what to do, but had fairly quickly settled for sitting down again, this time in the office chair and have a swing around before leaning back and wait for Bryci to finish.
She could feel the initial commotion, but then she'd been moving about herself and by the time she settled down and concentrated not much was happening.

Letting some air out of her stomach would let it close in on the occupants and enable her to feel what was going on in there, but she decided against it, she did after all want Bryci to be able to move about. But not feeling much she did wonder if the girl was done.

“Bryci are you done in there?” Meghan asked down to her trim middle. “...punch once if you are and twice if you're not...” she added realising that Bryci couldn't very well yell back. The girls had been screaming their heads of since she swallowed them at school and she hadn't heard a thing only felt some of it, kind of like she felt the two pokes in her stomach wall right now.
“Okay, just punch me again when you're ready...” She told her belly.

Bryci was almost done by then, just the girl's shoulders and head outside and that close up her screaming was a real strain on the ears, so she pushed the last of her in to silence her, but then took a while savouring the feeling before she swallowed for the last time, sending the second girl down into her immense gut.

Not able to see the expanse of her stretched out stomach, Bryci could only feel around with her hands and her newly acquired control of her organs. What she could tell was that she was huge and that she felt stuffed, but it also felt great.
The weight was somewhat cumbersome though, each of the girls she had just eaten probably had a few pounds on her, even so she felt that she could probably walk around carrying them, if it hadn’t been for the displacement of her center of gravity that their protrusion from her body caused.

They felt great in there, wiggling about, her body hugging them very tight indeed, so they could do little more than squirm. Despite the pleasure they caused she considered digesting them straight away, not being able to move without toppling over was bad enough, but her stomach also called for nutrition.
It took some effort but she held the thought at bay while she enjoyed their movements some more. She was supposed to practice was she not?

Yes, she was. So putting the delightful sensations and her body's demands aside for a moment, Bryci concentrated on her insides and on the lessons she'd been taught so far, Meghan's voice had played through her head plenty of times as she had daydreamed about the night before dozens of times if not hundreds already. Not she tried to recall them again, this time focusing on the part where she hid her meal.

Hands gently slid over her huge gut as she concentrated, trying as much as she could to make the bulge smaller, but nothing seemed to happen, when Meghan almost nodded off to sleep as she laid back in the office chair she felt Bryci punching her again. By then the girl had given up, if her belly had shrunk any she couldn't tell, she would require Meghan's help again and so she had called for being let out.

Travelling back up Meghan's throat, she was somewhat relieved, she had expected to be let out this way, but her mind had struggled with Meghan's earlier choice of words, her blonde friend had said that she would eat her and not just that she would swallow her. Eating as far as Bryci was concerned involved the meal taking a different route when leaving.

Back in Meghan's mouth Bryci felt herself and her double bulged belly being tasted once more and as Meghan's mouth opened and blinding light flooded in over those giant teeth, Bryci could see her giant gut for herself, but then she was more occupied by being awestruck from the sights surrounding her.

It didn't last long though, Meghan leaned forward and she tumbled out of her friend's mouth finding herself caught in her hands and somehow back to normal size in the process.
