It was much more obvious with the seventh girl, who left the predator on stage with the having eaten a large meal look and the eighth and final girl gave her a bit of a belly, though fairly odd looking with her muscles draping the protruding lump.

“Miss Daneford, would you please show off your belly to the audience?” De Luca resumed once more and her assisting student started slowly walking about the stage, giving the students both frontal and sideways views of the lump in her middle.

“Eight full grown women and it can be passed of as an early pregnancy or for a girl of a bit softer build, just natural flab. Pretty impressive don't you agree?”

Meghan raised her hand, which somewhat surprised the professor. “Yes Miss...?”

“Meghan...” Blainey interjected, deciding right then and there that it might be best if Meghan's surname remained unknown.

“...Meghan” De Luca repeated, finding it a bit strange that the otherwise pretty formal Professor Blainey would use the girl's first name, especially in front of the class, which seemed a pretty formal place and time.

“I don't agree.” Meghan stated bluntly.

“Don't agree what?” De Luca, didn't quite follow, this interruption taking her somewhat off-guard.

“That it's impressive.” Meghan said motioning for Miss Daneford, granting her a few stares from the other students, though sitting at the front, most could just see the back of her head and with half the front row inside Kimberly only her practice partner could see her clearly and she was giving Meghan a most approving look, looking quite smug in fact.

“You don't?...” De Luca fumbled and Professor Blainey interrupted again.

“Miss Daneford finished V101 just before summer, she does not have the experience you have, and in that context her feat is really quite remarkable.”

Blainey saw that Meghan resigned, even though she said nothing and motioned for Professor De Luca to continue.

“Where was I...Oh, yes... Miss Daneford, you can release the girls now. Someone give her a potion...”

One of the professor’s researchers had stood ready and Kimberly was already chugging the vile thing before the professor finished her sentence and the girls were coming back up and spilling over the floor before she could resume her place at the chalkboard of her choice.
There she waited until the girls including Kimberly had removed themselves and retaken their seats.
Apparently all of the soaked girls had decided to freshen up after class instead of getting Miss Daneford's gloop off of them right away.

“Right then...” the professor announced when the rustle had more or less settled, silencing the low murmur in the classroom.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: A demonstration.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
“How does this hiding work?”

“Imagine a one dimensional being in a two dimensional space, like this chalkboard.” The professor said and drew a line on it.

“It's only aware of itself along that one dimension, though it's naturally needed a width in the second dimension in order to exist there. In this case the width of this chalk line, but it could be the line drawn with a pencil or something else, perhaps those are different types of entities. Alas it's not of importance here.”

“What is interesting is when we introduce a second one dimensional being in a two dimensional space. Parallel they are totally unaware of one another, they have no means of detecting the other. But what if they cross?” She said drawing a second line.

“Here the two dimensional property they've been given is interesting, do they perceive one another as that minor creature, the mere length of where their lines coexist?”

“Perhaps only one of them is in the proper one dimension, and the other being manipulated out of it's natural dimension feel that it's being shrunk and thus perceive it's fellow being as gigantic.”

“The smallest this being could then become, would thus be totally perpendicular to its native dimension.” De Luca said drawing another line, that was just that to the first she had drawn.

“Imagine the same to a two dimensional creature in a three dimensional space. That's perhaps a bit easier, seeing as you've all grown up watching cartoons and reading comics, they are all two dimensional and we're used to a three dimensional space.” She said and picked up a piece of paper.

“So like the earlier one dimensional creature, the two has to be given a three dimensional property that it might be unaware of. Since drawn characters are what we're used to, perhaps a piece of paper isn't such a far fetched representation. It is fairly thin, so a good way of minimising the two dimensional creature.”

“Now what happens when this character is brought out of it's natural dimensions?“ She said and held up the paper so all could see it. Then turned it sideways.

“On the side like this, is probably as small as one could make it in it's own dimension.”

“Imagine then that this creature is interacting with another in it's dimensions, one that has access to this third dimension. They share height and width, so turning the first one sideways would not help all the way if this three dimensional creature was predatory, it'd be like swallowing a rod as long as itself.
And what about the width that is now protruding into its own extra dimension?
Clearly the two dimensional creature is quite unmanageable like that.”

“So what ways is there to reduce the two dimensional creature, to a more manageable set of three dimensions?” De Luca said and crumbled the piece of paper up in her hand.

“Simple and purpose filling, but hardly the most effective way.” The Professor said and drew a quick girlish figure, roughly the height of a paper on the chalkboard and held up the balled up paper in front of it.

“It could, fit, but the creature would be bloated. So what if you folded the paper properly?” She said and picked up a pre-folded piece of paper and held it up to the chalk-figure like she had the other paper.

“It could very well fit in there, perhaps even without showing.”

“So why am I rambling on about this?”

“What's the next step?”

“It's adding physical dimensions to our known three dimensions. Well some asks what about time then? Well time isn't exactly a physical dimension now is it. Question is what happens when you add a fourth dimension? Or a fifth?”

“That's our conclusion. That that's what 'hiding' one's prey is about. Forcing the prey out of these three dimensions that we're used to and into whatever other dimension or dimensions that the predator has access to. The result being a shrunken version of the whole three dimensional being in the three dimensions it's used to and the rest is elsewhere. Much like the one dimensional being may have appeared shrunk to it's fellows, while the two dimensional to its fellows, might have looked pretty weird, but I assume that's normal for cartoons, right?”

“At any rate, we know what a three dimensional person roughly looks like, though there are individual differences and we know what a two dimensional representation of the same looks like as well.”

“We do however not know what the person looks in any dimensions beyond the three, but we can assume that they are limited there as they are in the three we know. Similar perhaps in some ways to how a two and a three dimensional person correlates.”

“Take for example our demonstration with Miss Daneford here, at first she could hide the other girls just fine, but as they tallied up she was unable to keep doing so. This proves that there are limits to her reach in those dimensions.”

“What is more interesting however is that these were not just three dimensional beings she swallowed and hid away, I can attest to that the results would have been very similar, perhaps even identical if they had been. But now they were fellow girls with similar traits as herself, which means that these dimensions can interact with the normal three and yet somehow bypass each other.”

“With this in mind a wealth of questions arises and we've been very busy studying the aspects of these dimensions.”

“For one, just like in these three, everyone seems to be similar, but with individual differences. Some are tall, others short, some are skinny other's thickly built, some are chesty other's not and so on.
It's the same in that expanse as well, though different.” De Luca said and once again turned to her chalkboard and drew a girl.

“This is how she might appear to our eyes and like most she's got a capability in these extra dimensions that when she influences something would be more like this.” She said and drew a larger version of the girl around her.

“Curled up in her stomach her three dimensional self would only make a small bulge in her belly. But here techniques come into play, for it seems one can to some extent manipulate the extra dimensions to where they are needed. Like this perhaps...” She said and drew yet another version this time with a different coloured chalk. This girl version had a head and legs only a bit bigger than the original girl, but a huge belly.

“In that big belly her, or a similar sized three dimensional item wouldn't make a bulge on her three dimensional self as they'd fit neatly in that huge gut.”

“But the thing with many skills is that you need to keep at them.” the professor said and picked up her two pieces of paper again.

“Like these two, the crumpled up one takes up a lot more space than the folded one and both seem to stay in this, much less obstructing to the predator shape than their original one. However they could take up a lot less space, at least for the crumpled one. If for example I squeeze the crumpled one in my closed fist like this.” She said and closed her fist around the paper.

“While I keep squeezing it in my hand, the crumpled one hardly takes up more space than the folded one, perhaps even less, but as soon as I let go it fluffs back up again.” She said and opened her hand again and like she said would happen the crumpled paper regained much of its previous volume.

“The same thing is true for the folded one, although retaining a much smaller volume than the crumpled up one, if I squeeze it between my fingers I can make it a lot flatter while I squeeze it and as soon as I release, it it too fluffs up again to some extent.” De Luca said, demonstrating as she spoke.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: De Luca covers the basics on hiding.

choices: Professor De Luca hands over to Alectra.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
“Now there is actually another aspect to this that's quite visually astounding, but that isn't quite as common to master as the hiding. Therefore I'd like to ask Miss Mitchell to assist me with a bit of a physical demonstration.”

Daniela, a PhD student on Professor Blainey's team stepped forth, a blonde with a fairly slender frame apart from her massive chest that was even larger than the professor's and on her frame looked larger still.

“In order to hide a large prey-item, one has to first ingest it. I assume all of you are familiar with stretching your mouth and throat out of proportion, doubtless this is an aspect allowed by these extra dimensions.”

“However, like I showed earlier with the hiding and the belly, and the relocation of extra dimensional properties to it.” She said motioning to the figure on the board, specifically the bloated one, while she picked up a new coloured chalk and drew a new figure similar to the bloated one, only this one had a huge head.

“Interestingly enough there are apparently ways to do more than just stretch ones tissues, one can actually stretch ones three dimensions like Miss Mitchell will show us I hope.” The professor said motioning for Daniela to do her thing, unfortunately for her without a victim.

Daniela opened her mouth impossibly wide and like the professor had said, it did more than just stretch, it actually seemed to grow bigger as well.

The Professor motioned for one of the students to come up on stage, she choose one of the girls who'd already been inside Kimberly and who was in the front row. And the girl got the hint as De Luca motioned for her to go over to Daniela, who's mouth now reached down to the floor and was wide enough for the girl to just walk right into, if she just ducked her head down a bit, since she was as tall as the assistant.

She didn't though so Daniela stepped forth and engulfed the girl in one bite, as quickly as it took Daniela to close her mouth the girl was gone and Daniela's mouth back to normal.

“Miss Mitchell's three dimensions doesn't want to stay stretched though, I bet you all know this from the stretching you are used to, it takes active effort to retain such a state. So it does to shift her hiding capabilities to her head region as well.
For as you see, the girl in Miss Mitchell's mouth is as far as I can't tell well hidden.”

And indeed she was, one could tell that Daniela had something in her mouth, but that was about it.

“Another strange aspect we've found in regards to hiding is that what matters is mass, not volume, meaning that if Miss Mitchell here had put a mannequin into her mouth instead, which would have the same volume as the student in her mouth, then she'd have a much easier time hiding it. And had Miss Daneford earlier swallowed eight mannequins instead, she wouldn’t have sported any belly at the end.”

“You've probably noticed that swallowing down air for your partner while practising hasn't made that big a difference in the difficulty of hiding her, despite that volume wise you both might consider there to be much more of the air than of her.”

“That is because apparently it really is mass that matters and the density of air is just one point two-two-five kilograms per cubic meter, while people weigh almost exactly one kilo per liter, or cubic decimeter, if you prefer. Meaning that air is roughly eight hundred times less dense than people and in short, that much easier to hide.”

“Thank you miss Mitchell, you may release her now.” The professor said, while Daniela did just that and the re-soaked girl once again lumbered back to her seat.

“Like I said before however...” De Luca resumed. “...attributes in these unseen dimensions have individual differences. Some girls might indeed have an inclination towards this...” she said and pointed towards the large headed girl-sketch on the chalkboard. “...and as a result have an easier time swallowing things and hiding them as they enter, but they might have a hard time doing the same once the prey-item reaches her stomach.”

“Or she could be more like this...” De Luca said and motioned to the big-bellied version yet again. “...and have trouble getting anything down her gullet, but having no trouble concealing anything that ends up there. While yet again others might be more evened out like this one...” She finished and motioned towards her original enlarged figure around the first figure that was supposed to represent the three dimensions of the fictional girl.

“These dimensions interact with the visible three in other ways as well, for one you've probably all noticed that you've grown a lot stronger since you learned to interact with these new ones. That's part of why I like the representation of the extra dimensions as a larger version of the three as there seems to be more in those that affect the three, than the other way around.”

“Like for example muscle tissue, it's like there's ever so much muscles at work, hence your strength, but you doesn't seem to need to carry it around, at least that's what your bathroom scale will tell you. Same thing with a lot of other things. To a normal person, your skin might actually feel pretty unyielding, because its extra properties fight back, and the flesh beneath it doing the same thing, it being as a result much firmer.”

“Take Miss Mitchell again, that's an impressive chest, I think you agree. But there's even more of it that you can't see, but only gravity to affect what little you actually can, though little just being a relative word in this context.” The student's could see the woman in question blushing as the professor talked about her unashamed.

“I hope you don't mind Miss Mitchell, but do you wear a bra?”

If the deeper colours on her face wasn't enough of an answer, then her head shake was.
Then the PhD student quickly went back to her group and stepped behind some of her colleagues, so that the whole class wouldn't keep staring at her breasts, which despite the lack of a bra actually stood out proudly from her chest.

“What I meant earlier by that you don't seem to need to carry this extra dimensions around, is just that. It seems like it, because you're using your three dimensions to determine what is happening and not all of them.”

“Take for example this character.” De Luca said drawing a stick figure on the chalkboard.

“For it to travel to the end of that chalkboard over there...” She said pointing towards the other end of the scene. “... It would have to walk there. Same thing if it'd been three dimensional, like you see me. To get there I'd have to walk there all the same, despite having an extra dimension.
Adding more doesn't help in that regard, you'd still need to move there and that you don't feel yourself carrying your extra dimensions about, or even your hidden prey, doesn't mean that you aren't. Fact is you are, but you're using whatever dimensions they are in to do so. Just like this character would use his two to get there and I'd walk through these three.” De Luca finished taking said walk.

“Well then I think that's about it from me, a basic overview of what's to come.” De Luca finished and motioned for the next speaker to take over.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: A second demonstration.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
She had introduced herself earlier, but not that many remembered her name, since she hadn't been one of the professors, but rather one of the PhD students in Professor Hawthorn's rather large research group.
Meghan was one of the few that did know her name, but she'd met up with the woman earlier at her mother's lab. The girl hadn't been the most slender then, but now Alectra was decidedly plump, which made Meghan raise an eyebrow, while others did so because they had expected one of the professors to take over.

“Well then...” Alectra started in order to silence the low murmur that had arisen during the switch.

“...like Professor De Luca, I'll give a bit of an overview, but we have to start this course somewhere and thus I'll later continue on to actual techniques.”

“What we've been studying is two problem areas; The need to catch prey and the process of making them leave.”

“In other words, we've been studying how to get the most out of every meal.” She said and gave her extra flab around her waist a squeeze. “Don't worry, this isn't the intended result, but may happen if you don't do things properly. But in essence that is what we try to do, but in those extra dimensions Professor De Luca spoke of.
Her findings have been very useful in explaining what we've been doing and does offer new ways to tackle old things.”

“You see one of the properties the extra dimensions seem to lack is that of being fat, there seems to be a few different forms of size and mass, but fat as we know it as more or less useless extra weight to haul around isn't one of them. For fat may be a way to store energy, but it's a very cumbersome way, and it only stores energy, no other nutrients that the body might need, whereas you can teach your body to store all things needed in the unseen dimensions.”

“With that in mind you could thus actually store up on resources and not eat for a longer period of time. Whereas earlier if you ate a lot you'd just grow fat and would still need to eat again almost as soon as if you'd just had a normal meal, because the body craves more than just energy.”

“That takes us to the second aspect we've studied, ways of getting more out of every meal.
Naturally this would lead to needing to catch fewer meals than otherwise, which is a desired aspect I assume for most. It also leads to a third aspect we've tackled, the unpleasant but necessary step of relieving one of what's left of the prey once you're done with it.”

“Previously one has been required to seek out a specialized toilet, that can handle a load of what most would consider unnaturally large proportions, like the ones here in school.” She said and paused looking up into her audience.

“I heard that it's a fairly new investment and seeing as we have a few post graduation students attending this class, this was perhaps news to you. I just wanted to make you aware that you don't have to choose the alternative when one can't find such facilities. Which is to spend a long disgusting and troublesome time on the toilet trying to get the prey down without clogging the facilities.”

“Okay, what I meant earlier was that, if you absorb more of your prey, there will be less left of it to get rid of.”

“But that doesn't seem to be the only way of making your bathroom visits easier, there's also what I suppose you could call a quick fix. The dimensions Professor De Luca spoke of also apply to your digestive tract, if they hadn't digesting a hidden meal would have been much less filling than a non hidden one, but as you all know, it is not.”

“Normally though once you've released your prey it's popped back into its regular size, whether it's been regurgitated, or digested. But you can actually digest it in those dimensions in a way that enable you to relieve yourself there as well. Meaning that the end result might not actually be less than otherwise, but the toilet only account for the excrement's three dimensional properties and thus the result is still that you'll have an easier time flushing the items down.”

“Now that was the basic overview, now you'd better sharpen your pencils and your ears if you want to learn something, because from here on I'll cover several techniques to achieve these things.” Alectra said and walked over to the chalkboards while the students adjusted themselves and their belongings and hoped that she wouldn't be asking for volunteers...

She didn't have time to go very in depth on these three aspects, but she did manage to cover a few techniques before the class was over. By which time all the students had also received the material for this class and various material for upcoming ones.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Another aspect.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
“I suppose we'll meet up after the next class or so.” Clarice said as she turned to Meghan. “Because I don't think this is something we should practice on one another.” she added with a smirk.

“Agreed.” Meghan smiled back.

Seeing as the class had focused more or less entirely on various ways of digesting things, using one's practice partner to help with the study wouldn't be very optimal, especially considering that practising anything once is a tad little, even for someone as gifted as Clarice.

So the two parted ways, not that the school-day was over, except for the post graduation students and perhaps the odd other student, seeing as the professors had actually managed to squeeze the class in during regular hours, rather than as Meghan had suggested, during evening hours.

As this one had been held in the morning that meant the rest of the day remained, though for Meghan's part she was kept busy until her last class for the day was over at four in the afternoon. By which time she'd already received two messages on her cell phone from Bryci asking if they could meet up.

She figured that there was really no reason why not, she hadn't had time to hunt, plus with the new rule of not hunting on school, she was a bit reluctant to try her luck there. Though there were no surveillance cameras anywhere so she wasn't really sure how the rule would be enforced.

Even so it'd be more fun to go out hunting with a friend and besides Bryci would probably like a look at this new stuff as well.


Hence she messaged the girl that she was coming over right away and minutes later she was greeting the short girl in the doorway of her apartment.
This time without any weirdness. Meghan wasn't about to wait for Bryci to take another shower before heading out.

Still there was plenty of waiting anyway as the two went through the material for her new class. It didn't take many minutes before they removed the clips holding the bundle of papers together and started passing them between themselves instead, often pausing to get the other girl's attention “Hey, look at this!” or “Listen to this!” and so on.

Eventually though, and long before they'd gone through the material, it wasn't just Meghan's stomach that demanded to be fed, but Bryci's as well, although she had at least eaten that day, Meghan had not.

So shortly thereafter they headed back out the door, this time Meghan took her things with her, including the new material they'd been reading.

Bryci not carrying anything took the lead as her door locked automatically anyway and started heading towards the school like they had before.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: After class.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
“Not that way.” Meghan said behind her halting the girl in her steps.

“Why not? We'll need to go there afterwards anyway, right?” She said implying that even though they'd had a look at a few things that'd help lessen the load, it wasn't as if they had learned them, there'd still be way too much for a normal toilet to handle.

A while later they visited a park that allowed for enough cover, both visual from the ample amount of foliage and the traffic would cover up quite a bit of noise.

As it were things had progressed smoothly, despite Bryci deciding to tackle a group of four guys.

It wasn't like the pretty girls hadn't gotten the boys' attention, or that they had perceived them as a threat. Even so Meghan had thought it a tad bold, but they had paired them up more or less and Meghan had gotten hers to turn their backs to their friends while Bryci had made her two lean on down, promising to kiss one, but not telling who, before giving them both a wet sloppy kiss all over their heads and Meghan supposed that she shouldn't be surprised, but still was by the lack of difficulty the little lady swallowed the two down.

It hadn't been completely noiseless though and beckoned their friends' attention, but as they turned around, they found themselves seeing very little as Meghan had pinned them together and engulfed their heads from behind, she was tall enough that she hadn't needed for them to lean on over.

Then Meghan got her second surprise as Bruci picked up the guys she was eating by their feet and stuffed them into her mouth. Then sucked them down hard. Hard enough for Meghan to stumble forward losing her balance totally and out of fear of getting pulled in with her guys opened her mouth and throat wide enough to lose her grip on them, enabling Bryci to with a quick suck and swallow claim the rest of them and send them into her now quite large gut.

The girl then quickly snuck into an alcove, seating herself on a bench surrounded on three sides by the park's neatly trimmed and dense bushes. The only opening was that side towards the path on which the girls had just met the guys and where Meghan still stood. On the other side of the path were yet more bushes and trees, effectively blocking out the view of the city
and the traffic, although doing little for the constant city noise.

Once seated Meghan saw Bryci's huge gut diminishing soon it fit in her lap. At first she wondered if the girl was digesting, realising that she wouldn't been able to hear if her gut was gurgling over the traffic, but it stopped shrinking when she just looked plenty pregnant.

“You're a greedy one aren't you?” Meghan teased.

“Oh, sorry about that, I just wanted to practice hiding some more, and when I saw that you hadn't swallowed yours down...I guess I got a little greedy...” She said, while at least having the decency to blush. “Mind giving me a few pointers, I seem to be at a loss as to what to do next...”

“Alright...” Meghan said taking the seat next to Bryci and the two of them turned their attention to the short girls bulging belly.

They kept at it for a while and slowly the girl's belly receded, finally leaving the girl with what could be passed for an early pregnancy. And by that time Meghan had had time to wonder several times what would have happened if she hadn't let go of the guys. Watching the soft swell in the little girl's belly, that now wasn't much to talk about, didn't really put her mind off of that question.

Eventually though her stomach demanded to be fed and shortly thereafter they came upon a couple. This time Meghan didn't waste enough time for Bryci to be able to steal her meal and the two soon struggled nicely within her stomach. That however didn't sate her hunger, only digesting would do that, so she proposed that they'd all return to school and practice there.

Meghan had been a bit reluctant to take the large bathroom again and let Bryci in, but the girl had insisted that she'd want to go through the instruction as well. Plus that that way they might give each other pointers. For Meghan had already proclaimed that she'd move one of her couple into her throat while she digested the first and That's what she did, with Bryci insisting on tackling her preys after Meghan had sated the worst of her hunger.

Fact was that Meghan had been so hungry that she hadn't paid the new techniques that much attention, she'd only semi-tried and as a result she was done shortly after having seated herself.

Bryci on the other hand took her time. Asking for Meghan's help to look through the bundle of papers for useful stuff and reading through them as she sat there on the porcelain throne and her belly returning to normal.

Then it was Meghan's turn, she took longer this time, but she frankly felt weird sitting there with Bryci watching, so she took nowhere near as long as Bryci had.

It may have been Friday and all, meaning she really did have the time for more studying, but the thought of another session with Bryci watching her taking a crap, just felt so uncomfortable, that she said she had to go home.

Bryci had pleaded for her to come down to the study-center and let her run the papers Meghan had gotten from class through the copying machine. That Meghan agreed to, figuring it was a pretty easy way of doing things, plus that way, Bryci might be able to help her for once.

She considered grabbing another meal to study on at home, but she really wasn't hungry, so she figured that she'd practice again in the morning instead.

Bryci on the other hand as she waived goodnight to Meghan had no intention of returning home just yet, and she had signed no papers on not hunting on the school ground, something several unlucky students wished had been the case.

That night both the girls studied the material from Meghan's new class, but with different enthusiasm. Meghan while interested in the subject as such although the topic of poop was a bit disconcerting and at times made her feel as if she was back on the toilet with Bryci watching her didn't help. Plus it wasn't like it was fun reading, the language was perhaps even drier than even her normal schoolbooks, as this had been composed from the works of the PhD students who thus in order to be proper had lain on their thickest academic lingua.

Bryci on the other hand albeit a bit troubled by the language, still read it like a teenage boy would read porn when no one was watching and well in her case, it would seem it pretty much was. Meaning that she was up until the early hours before sleep finally claimed her.

So by the time she awoke and called Meghan to ask her to join her hunting again, Meghan had already eaten and with the new techniques of extra absorption with which she had gotten a bit of success, she really wasn't feeling like eating anytime soon.

Bryci on the other hand was ravenous, despite her excessive eating last night. Today she'd have time to go over all the techniques though, and she really did want to try the whole store energy thing as well, it should mean that she'd be able to keep on eating, would it not? The concept intrigued her like so many other things that circled around the subject of people getting eaten.

Unbeknownst to her, one of the reasons she was constantly hungry was that her extra dimensional self was still growing, so naturally it needed building blocks.

That was probably a good thing for her, as it meant that she could spend a lot more time practising than her friend. But fearing that she'd get full she studied up on the whole storing nutrients things before heading out even if her belly was giving her an earful for making it wait. Still she concluded that she could take the papers with her anyhow and study them while she digested.

Needless to say, come evening Meghan had had another meal and felt like she'd pigged out, and Bryci had lost count and still felt that she could go for a few more. And she'd actually managed to store a bit food as that weird unseen fat. She hadn't really gotten the hang of it, but at least she hadn't totally failed. She feared that she'd put on as much regular fat though, but she wasn't sure. Her was body ravenous and as she carried people about, practising on hiding them before she digested them, she actually burned plenty more calories than she thought.

It had helped in that regard that she had tired of hunting at school, both because of the lack of students there and the fact that the ones who were there seemed to be in constellations and places that didn't really promote her eating them.
And that the school was the only place she felt comfortable letting the people back out again and she was making good progress in that regard, she also managed to squeeze in quite a bit of practice in on that subject throughout the day.

Stored energy or not, during the night Bryci's body depleted her reserves and come morning she was just as hungry again.

She was a little afraid that her pigging out would have ruined her figure, but a long hard look in the mirror revealed no such thing and her bathroom scale agreed with her visual assessment. So with her fears settled she headed out once more to make the city unsafe.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: First try.

choices: Bryci waits outside for Meghan to finish up.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
That morning it was Meghan who called Bryci, having felt a bit guilty by turning the girl down the day before. Her timing was pretty much perfect as Bryci was already heading down the stairs to go out and hunt.
So hurrying to get ready they decided to meet up at a spot they thought would serve their purpose and hopefully easy prey.

With a head start Bryci hadn't been able to pass up, not one, but three opportunities, so when Meghan arrived the girl was busy applying the final touches to hiding her meal. Actually had Bryci been a bit more casual about it Meghan might not have noticed the slight pudginess of her belly. But as Bryci was caressing her gut quite blatantly it was hard not to take notice in the fact that she didn't seem quite content with the state it was in.

After getting some assistance from Meghan she managed to remove the bulge entirely though and seemed quite content with that. Meghan was more interested in getting the ordeal over with, so that she too could get something pleasantly wiggling about in her stomach.
She never asked about Bryci's meal and if she had, she would have thought that Bryci was lying to her if the girl had claimed that there were four people in her stomach, even though it was actually true.

Before the topic could come up though a trio of guys approached and Bryci was upon them before Meghan could object, to her surprise Bryci sent one of the guys her way and while he walked on over she could see that behind his back his friends were quickly disappearing down the little raven-haired beauty's throat. Realising that she needed to act before he caught on Meghan shocked him by being as forward as her friend. Being grabby isn't normally a good trait, but as she grabbed all of him and with her being so much stronger there was little he could do to object, except perhaps wiggle and squirm pleasantly and Meghan really didn't mind that at all.

Looking at her greedy friend Meghan saw her sporting quite a belly. Apparently it was more than just reluctant to go away as well, so she suggested that they'd return to school, seeing as there was a sure-fire way to remove it and that was more or less what they were supposed to practice anyhow.

Meghan regretted calling Bryci up as soon as they got back to school and found Bryci leading her by the hand into one of the handicap bathrooms.

Sighing she closed the door behind them and waited for Bryci to take the first turn.

She motioned for Bryci to take the seat, since first she wasn't actually hungry and secondly she hoped that she could sneak away into one of the smaller toilets and do her business there. Well she could do that as soon as Bryci got started, but she got the impression that Bryci had studied without her and well she did want to know of any revelations the girl had gotten.

As it turned out, before the short girl would start she wanted another try at hiding her meal properly. Though even with Meghan's help she failed at that, but did manage to reduce her pregnant looking belly to a significantly less bloated one before gurgling noises started coming from within and once those started it wasn't long before the bulge deflated.

The visual change implied what was going on inside and it was hard not to look at. It didn't take long for the little girl's belly to become entirely flat, during which time she had asked Meghan several questions that she'd gotten semi-sentient answers to. Then came the whole absorbing properly deal, Bryci had quite a bit to handle obviously she had practised and found a few things that she applied before she started questioning Meghan, who ended up mostly look things up that Bryci had seen in the material, but not really grasped. Hence it took a while before Bryci gave up on her occupants and evicted them, by then she had absorbed quite a bit more than she normally would have had. Several times more and with the shift of mass to the parallel dimension, what remained was less than the previously normal load of a small girl, much to Bryci's satisfaction, but it still bothered her that she needed one of these special seats, but perhaps if it'd just have been one and not six prey she might have managed to use a normal one. She'd have to try that when she got home. The aspect of bringing one and using her own facilities excited her.

Now it was Meghan's turn though, much to the larger girl's discomfort. Still she realized that she obviously needed Bryci's help. The girl hadn't been forthcoming at all with what she'd done while she was doing it she Meghan needed to ask the girl while trying to apply it at the same time, the tables were now turned, now she was the one being taught, unfortunately these things Byrci hadn't known since childhood and she wasn't really sure what was the proper cause of action apparent by the fact that she still had quite a bit more to learn and to Meghan's frustration Bryci going with what felt right, a vague useless advice, that spoke of Bryci having some talent for doing it, and less for teaching it.

In the end Meghan did manage to reduce the load quite significantly and even managed to store a bit of her meal in that new way Alectra had spoken of, so even though she got quite a bit more from this meal than a normal one and her normally just eating one a day, she didn't feel bloated or full and felt like she could have another, though she wasn't spending more energy, so she could probably go for days afterwards without eating, but that was a later issue. The important thing was that she could get more practice now. Bryci seemed quite eager to get going even though she'd have a much larger meal and gone much harder at it, for while Bryci might have gotten away with a normal toilet for a one-person meal, the one-person meal Meghan had just had, definitely needed the specialized throne she had used.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Guilt-eating.

choices: Are you coming back inside to take care of that or what?
Is it safe to come out?
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Much to Meghan's indignation once she is done Bryci opens the door and leaves it open.

“I'll wait outside” the girl says and sure enough while she's struggling to get her hipster panties quickly enough back up and into place Meghan can see the girl outside waiting.

Just then she hear a nearby door unlock and Bryci disappears, while Meghan flushes the toilet, she can just barely make out a bit of commotion outside and as she turns to wash her hands the little brunette is back outside her door smiling at her and giving her tummy three quick pats that speaks louder than words of what just happened.

Then as Meghan reaches down to pull up her tight jeans another door unlocks and as she struggle with the buttons she hears a thump and some rustling outside, but no more than that and when she finishes with the last button of her button fly of her jeans she looks up to see Bryci smile back at her idly rubbing her still flat middle.

Meghan gathers up her stuff and then gives the short pleased girl outside another look.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Finishing up.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
“Ok, are you coming back inside to take care of that, or what?” Meghan asks, wondering if she should leave or stay.

“Oh, I suppose I should, shouldn't I?” Bryci admitted and re-entered the room, letting Meghan close the door. “I had thought of getting a few more, but as we're already here I suppose there's no point in bringing these two along for the hunt.” She said as she got herself ready to sit back down again on the porcelain chair.

“Wait a moment.” Meghan interrupted her. Stopping the girl in mid bend.

“Oh, you can take a seat, just don't digest.”

“Okay.” Bryci said and took her seat, waiting for Meghan to continue.

“How much have you trained keeping your digestion at bay?” Meghan wondered.

“Not much I suppose.” It wasn't really the aspect of it she had been interested in, though she did sort of hold back while she practised hiding and while she was waiting to get to a place where she could digest properly, but if her meals semi-digested in the meantime hadn't really mattered as long as they weren't screaming to get out of her ass, when she was miles from a toilet. She did have quite good control of her digestion capabilities, so that meant she was fairly good at holding them, back, but she admittedly hadn't really practised that specifically.

“But I think I'm pretty good at it anyway, I didn't digest the one's we caught out there until we got back here did I?”

“Well that's not quite the same and it certainly wasn't a long while was it? It took us what? Ten? Fifteen, minutes to get here?”

“Oh, I guess you're right that's not that long is it?”

“No.” Meghan continued, Bryci eating the people exiting the other toilets out there made her realize that the school wasn't a safe haven. Bryci had told her before that while she and her classmates from the advanced class had agreed not to eat people of school ground, that still left every other predatory girl out there that wasn't in the class and some of them were quite skilled as well and like Bryci here would undoubtedly glean knowledge presented in that class.

More specifically Bryci's stomach didn't seem that safe, especially now that she admitted to not having properly practised making her stomach a safe place.

“But then why do I need to keep prey safe in there anyway?”

“Because it's useful when you practice, especially with friends. I mean it's only fair that I visit your stomach now that you've been in mine several times, but I'm not willing to go in there if you can't keep me safe.”

“Oh...” Bryci was a bit taken by that, she'd never considered swallowing Meghan, though admittedly she looked very delicious and the concept of having Meghan in her stomach was quite enticing.

“So what do you want me to practice?”

“Well for starters the whole, keeping digestion at bay and not just at a minimum, but also the whole release thing. You know I've brought girls back up my throat for you to eat and that's something I don't think Blainey is covering in the V101, unless that's changed now. They've been using some orange concoction.”

“Yeah I know about the potion.”

“You have any with you?”

“No.” Admittedly Bryci hadn't seen any of the stuff outside of class.

“See, so we have a couple of things to cover and you have a couple of people in there to practice on.”

“Al-right.” Bryci hadn't really been that fond of the subject, but the incentive of getting to swallow Meghan was quite a big one and she was beginning to think that the concept of having someone helplessly trapped inside for an extended period of time was beginning to sound pretty interesting as well.

With that Meghan started instructing Bryci on some safety techniques and much to the occupants of Bryci's stomach delight the change in there was quite rapid and significant the foul smells soon disappeared and shortly there after their eyes stopped watering and instead the accommodations were just warm dark and wet and not semi-hostile. Her stomach also quieted down and stopped tossing them around and squeezing them from time to time.

It wasn't hard for her to learn, she was quite good at controlling these muscles organs and whatnot already.

Then it was the whole release thing, that was significantly more tricky, she was pretty good at controlling her stomach muscles, but this was a fingertip kind of procedure, you didn't want to vomit your meal back up, you wanted a controlled regurgitation and harder than controlling the stomach was controlling the throat which just wanted to swallow everything back down.

Still in a more or less vomit, at least dry vomit, fashion Bryci did manage to get one of her preys back up, though Meghan stopped her from letting any of it out of her mouth.

“That's good. Now swallow it down and get the other one.”

The swallowing part wasn't hard, getting the other was, as the first one was in the best position. So she ended up getting that one several times before finally managing to switch, but by then she wasn't really sure it was a switch.

“What do you have in there?”

“A guy and a girl.”

“Oh, nice and distinctive, good. Get the guy this time then.”

The guy had been a fairy tough looking hard-rocker kind of dude, not with the long hair, but with a shaved pate and a bit of beard instead. While the girl had been an average brunette in a fairly summery dress that was now threatening to tear into a million pieces and would have had, if the soaked fabric hadn't clung to her skin so tightly.

Sure enough after a bit of fiddling about Bryci managed to get the guy back into her throat, at Meghan's signal he went back into her stomach though and it was instead the girl's turn.

“Okay, hold her there. I think it's time we got moving, so digest the guy, but keep the girl in your throat.”

Bryci did as she was told, it was a bit much to concentrate on all these things at the same time, especially as the girl wanted to slip down her throat from time to time. It wasn't long before the guy melted away and vacated her stomach though.

“Now make you stomach safe again before you swallow the girl back down again.” Meghan managed just before Bryci had swallowed her anyhow. And it was a good thing too as Bryci's stomach had still been quite unpleasant even if most of the nasty stuff had left with the guy.

Bryci realized that now she did get to try digesting one prey at a time, so she finished the guy completely before she started in on the girl, in fact she even let him out and got up of the seat to have a look.

“What are you doing?” Meghan wondered.

“Oh, I was wondering if I could get a single meal down a normal toilet, you know like the one I have at home. I guess this would have worked, but it's a bit big, perhaps I can do better with her.” Bryci said pointing towards her own stomach and sat back down after flushing to take care of the girl.

Indeed the guy had been a bit big, especially coming from a little girl, but a normal toilet would have managed with some complaints, the girl though being just under hundred thirty pounds rather than they guys just over two hundred, ended up being a more girlish sized turd, nothing that would have given Bryci's toilet at home any trouble. So with a satisfied smile on her face Bryci flushed the girl away and made herself ready to leave for another hunt with Meghan.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Practice.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Meghan admittedly not hungry, felt that with this storage thing, she should be able to go for another meal, though she was aiming for two. She'd have to find some way to burn those calories later though otherwise she wouldn't be able to practice again before midweek and that'd be really bad, but that was a later problem.

She was rather amazed at Bryci though, the girl had eaten at least five people today, probably more seeing as she didn't have any trouble hiding these last two while she'd been having trouble this morning when she found her. She knew the girl was still adopting and 'growing', something she felt quite sure wasn't the case for herself, but even so it was quite fascinating to watch the small girl eat so much.

Oh and it was quite obvious that Bryci hadn't been content with those two and was looking for more than that now. The first guy they encountered she dismissed out of hand, hardly paying him any attention as he vanished into her depths. Already walking along towards where she hoped to find the next prey before he even hit her stomach.

At Meghan's suggestion she did start paying him attention once he got there though, first with the safe surroundings and later with a few trips up and down her throat while they waited for new suitable prey to present themselves.

It didn't take long once they got to a good location, well they had almost been there when they found him, but before that while there'd been prey there hadn't been opportunity.
In fact as they got there they spotted a group of girls walking in front of them, Meghan tried to dissuade Bryci, since there were four girls, but the short girl just ignored her and walked faster as to overtake the group. Coming from behind they had plenty of advantage, but Meghan didn't think that was enough to keep things under control, so she stayed back hoping that that would deter Bryci, but alas it did not.

So when Bryci launched herself at the rear most girl and engulfed her almost from head to knee in one go, Meghan realized that she couldn't just let this deteriorate into screaming chaos if the other girls should catch on and hurried to catch up and take care of any trouble maker.

Before she even got close Bryci had cleared her throat of the first girl and filled it with the second and as she sidestepped her friend, Bryci was shoving the upper half of the third girl into her throat, just as the last one turned to face what she had assumed was her friend. But before she could scream, Meghan forced her mouth shut and brought her head into her mouth silencing the girl properly.

Trying to manoeuvre the girl into position she was surprised to find out that she couldn't and then felt a strong tug on the girl that was strong enough to make her spin around and face the cause of it. Namely Bryci, who had already swallowed the girl up to her hips and swallowed yet again making Meghan bend over and almost kiss the short girl as they were now face to face, mere inches apart.

A nod from Bryci made Meghan release the girl, well she only had the head and Bryci the rest, even so Bryci wanted her to let go before she quickly sucked in and swallowed down the last of the prey.

“Why did you take her too?” Meghan wondered.

“Well you didn't seem to want any so that did make them all mine, no? You can't just barge in at the last second and steal one, that's just rude.”

“Oh al-right, I didn't think you'd go for them if I didn't help but when you did anyway I thought I'd help keep things, well, nice and quiet.”

“I do realize that, but if you want to help, give me some pointers on this thing.” Bryci said, pointing to her bulging middle. So they sat down on a bench while they waited for someone for Meghan to come along while Bryci struggled with hiding the five in her stomach, she only had a small bulge riding high by the time a young couple walked past and nearly got out of her seat before Meghan could push her back down again and indicate that those two were hers.

“Damn, you're greedy.” Meghan accused her when she returned, idly rubbing her stomach where the couple now struggled futility on the inside. “You planned on claiming these two as well, didn't you?”

“Well...I guess not as much plan as much as it was instinct. They did look nice and now I think I have the room.”

“Tell you what you can have anything we find on the way back to school.”

“So we're heading back, you don't want more?” Bryci wondered.

“No, I'm not that hungry at the moment.”

“Okay then.” Bryci agreed and hoped that something would present itself on the way back.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Hunting.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
The two girls used their catches for some more practice before they parted ways, Bryci again going out to catch something, determined to make use of the facilities she had at home and with Meghan showing her how she could digest meals one at a time, she didn't have to settle for just one. Again she saw no reason to leave campus and some unlucky students got to become more intimate with the pretty girl than they really wanted.

Meghan on the other hand was quite sated and felt quite invigorated, something about that stored energy just made her feel satisfied and alert in a whole other way than she usually did, except perhaps just after a meal. She did fear though that it'd last for several days, she really needed the practice, she couldn't stay full for days.

Come morning and afternoon and thus the next GI8U2 lecture, the sated feeling had not left her, which meant no more practice before hand.

She took her seat next to Clarice, was it?
It felt somewhat weird to know you were supposed to practice with this supposedly very skilled stranger. She'd have to get to now the girl.

“Clarice, I don't know how to put this, but we really got to get to know each other if we're going to practice together.”

“Oh, I agree completely.” The ginger nerdy looking girl replied and turned in her seat to face Meghan properly. “There is one very important question I have to ask you though, it's quite intimate, but I need you to be truthful.”

“Okaaay...?” Meghan offered somewhat perplexed “What is it?”

Clarice leaned in closer and kept her voice down so they could keep their conversation private, there was a slight murmur going though the classroom with it being a good ten minutes left before it actually started.

“How do you feel about other girls?”

“Um...I see now what you meant about intimate. Had you asked me a couple of months ago I would have said that they were delicious.” This brought a sincere smile to Clarice's face. “Now though, after having met so many other predatory girls I have to admit that there are at times other urges and feelings.” Meghan said and unable to look Clarice in the eye as she did, looking over her shoulder instead and seeing a blonde that she recognized.

“Huh? Actually, that blonde over there with the curls in her hair...f...six seats down, is the one that made me realize I had other than nutritional interest in girls.” That made Clarice raise her eyebrows and look around.

“You, you mean Jamie?”

“I dunno her name, I just saw her at the beach last weekend, she's a lifeguard is she not?”

“Yeah, that's Jamie al-right. She's a fiend of mine.” Clarice said turning back to Meghan. “She's single as far as I know, not that that matters when we practice.” She added with a wink. “So I suppose she could help you with those other urges.” Clarice continued keeping her voice really low.
“You see we only allow lesbians into our group, so it's a real burden off my chest to hear that I can introduce you. However with the class currently as it is, we're not really meeting up for practice since well the topic at the moment is digestion. I suppose I can take you to meet the gang and all, but depending on what topic they cover here it might be a week or two before we start to hang out at our usual spot.”

“Which is?”

“Oh, might be good to tell you, it's at the sports gym over by the C-building, don't go there without my company, it really is our place and well intruders tend to get taken care of if you know what I mean.”

“Thanks for the warning. You have other tips and warnings? I'd love to hear them, being new to town and all.”

“Sure, have a look around, but don't stare, just steal a glance as I give you direction.”

“Okay, I can do that.”

“You see the back rows up by this corner, lots of hulking muscle right there. Well like my friends they too are sort of a group that sticks together and unsurprisingly the campus gym is their place. Obviously they like lifting weights, but more importantly they are always looking for protein, so going there tends to make it very likely that you'll become a protein snack for one of those girls. Dacia, the energetic girl on the edge there with the natural tan in a red dress used to be a TA for V101 a couple of years back, thing is she has a thing for eating other predators, so once the students learned to swallow each other the disappearances of V101 students increased dramatically, actually that's the case every semester anyway and she is part of that reason.”

“On the other end pretty high up you see a slender Asian looking girl. Kind of nerdy, with fake glasses at times. She seems to have them on now.”
“She used to be in our group, before my time, apparently she went ape-shit and ate someone and when the girls tried to make her pay that just meant that she got even more girls to digest. She's a loner and I feel sorry for the sucker that ends up as her practice partner. She is also as you might have guessed a major player and we've given up any ideas of making her pay. Perhaps Kari can go toe to toe with her, but who really knows? It's just not worth the risk. Just stay well clear of her. Her name at any rate is Casey, which is one indication that she really isn't as Asiatic as she for some reason looks.”

“In the middle you see a trim fairly tall brunette sitting with a confidence as if she owned the place, That's Karen, she's also a major player. The girls around her are by no means pushovers and certainly not the submissive kind, but they seem to obey Karen's every word without question for some reason. We usually call them her bitches, and in a sense I suppose they too compose a group of some sort. If they have a place to call their own, then I don't know where it is, probably not on campus.”

“There are a lot of girls here I know nothing about, I think a lot of them are post grad students.”

“What about those three?” Meghan asked indicating the three TAs from the current V101 class that she noticed were sitting in the first row, something Clarice and Meghan wasn't after last class' demonstrations.

“Oh, those. Nothing to worry about, Blainey realized that she couldn't allow for girls form any group on campus to be allowed to TA for her class, as they, well. They used their position for recruitment purposes and after Dacia she realized there were other reasons as well, perhaps more important ones.”

“So you see the TAs she has now are nobodies, well perhaps Julianne shows a hint of promise, but the other two you should refer to as snack and dessert. Fact is that every other girl in here is able to take on anyone of them, or more like all three of them at once, any day, any time. That they are here is simply because Blainey couldn't very well start an advanced class behind her own TAs back. She was simply forced to include them, even though they are not of the same stock as the rest of the girls here.”

Hard words, Meghan realized there was something cold, but honest about Clarice and felt glad that they were going to be on the same side and made a mental note not to screw that up. She also realized just what Clarice had said, here in the classroom were many of the top predators around, she'd do well to remember these faces, but at the same time she couldn't very well sit and stare at her classmates.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Second class.

choices: Meghan finds heself one of the six.
Meghan is not amongst the six.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
There weren't nearly as many professors and others on stage today, but still quite a few. Blainey was there and greeted everyone as she started of outlining what they'd cover today. Apparently there'd be more techniques on the same subject, well there had been more in the material than what had been covered in class. In fact hardly anything was covered last time and she seemed to recall Alectra saying that they'd continue where they left off.

Though surprisingly Alectra didn't take over from Blainey to cover more techniques, instead De Luca stepped forth catching everyone's eyes with her painted on low cut jeans and short flowery orange-ish top that barely contained her breasts and ended just below them, leaving a lot of smooth slender skin between it and the pants below, broken only by an unpierced innie bellybutton.

“Last time we started on the subject of acquisition and storage of energy and miss Condon with the help of her colleagues will resume that topic shortly. However, I will insert a bit of the expenditure of energy in the meantime.” De Luca said giving Alectra a nod, making Meghan all the more certain that by the end of this semester Alectra would probably become Doctor Condon.

Denise started out as if it was some class on mechanics, forces mass and energy requirements. It made more sense when she started referring to things, more specifically a predator carrying prey around.

She started out fairly simple with just a transportation of mass from point A to point B, but then added the pendle motion of walking or running and the inherent inefficiency in the fact that the mass does not move smoothly from point A to B, walking you can easily tell that the center of gravity does not move in a straight path.

Then surprisingly she asked for one of the researchers from Hawthorn's team to continue. Emily Tomore the pale slim blonde was called and although quite busty she had nothing on the professor, who now that the girl of average height stood next to her, looked surprisingly tall. Something about those extreme curves of hers made her look short, but she was in fact several inches taller than Emily.

Emily then took the chemist's approach, which was why De Luca had handed over the piece of chalk. Emily went on to give a quick overview of how energy in the body is stored and then retrieved and more specifically used and then went on to try and get some rough numbers on the conversions needed for the example of the walking or running predator.

De Luca thanked the girl and added her numbers to the growing formula in the ongoing example.

“Okay then, now I need some volunteers.” De Luca said with way too much satisfaction. It being fairly obvious what the volunteers would do in this demonstration.

Meghan was glad they weren't on the first row as De Luca eyed the girls there hungrily, but then she raised her gaze to the general level again and added. “Well then, seeing as I'm not getting any volunteers I'll just have to ask for...you girls on the....hmmm...third row to come over here.” She said without meeting their gaze and moved over to the chalkboards on the left of the stage and produced a blank one before adding “All of you.”

Meghan realized that meant her, when De Luca had said the third row, she, like most others had waited for her to pick one side or the other, not the whole row, which was possibly the most filled row in the classroom being close enough to see well, but not too close to risk...well this.. .

De Luca hadn't really thought about it, she'd just picked a number at random and it was just when she didn't hear anyone getting up that she had added 'all of you'.

While the girls were quickly removing excess garments and such and moving onto the stage De Luca dashed to the room in the back and retrieved a bathroom scale and stopped to instruct the TAs to retrieve another item she needed.

So when she came back she was faced with a row of half naked students, the third row to be precise.

“Oh... I had only thought of having five or six volunteers, but you're less than half as willing as volunteers, so I suppose it's only fair you're more than twice as many.” De Luca said with a mischievous grin.”But I suppose that I should stick to the original plan. You, you, you, you, you and you. Stay. The rest of you please return to your seats.” De Luca added and motioned for the girls she'd picked out to form a queue over by the chalkboard she had prepared.

Putting the bathroom scale on the floor she motioned for the first girl to step on to it as she made a list on the chalkboard. Soon enough she had the names of all the six girls and their weights in this semi-undressed state listed neatly on the board.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Class starts.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Unfortunately Meghan found herself to be one of those six.

Denise then stepped onto the scale herself and added her own weight, which made a few raise their eyebrows.

Then she ordered the volunteers to get in line again and before they managed that she had crammed the first one in and swallowed her down, just that quickly, and almost repeated the process with the second girl.

De Luca wasn't savouring them at all Meghan realized and watched as the professor was clearly enjoying herself, but in a more gorging, gluttonous way and while she came to that conclusion De Luca had made her way through the girls in front of her and she got to experience that rough treatment the professor was giving all the girls.
Strong hands grasped onto her and easily lifted her up and forcefully crammed her into not just the professor's mouth but far down into her throat, so it only took a single swallow to send her far enough that gravity slid her down the rest of the way. By then she felt a girl's hand on her feet and the girl seemed to travel with her into the depths and pile on top of her as she herself piled on top of the girls that had gone before her.

Not stopping for a moment's rest it wasn't long before De Luca grasped the parallel outstretched feet of the last girl, that still stuck out of her, with one hand and shoved them inside, finishing up with licking the fingers of that hand.

Then she looked down at her bloated middle and quickly it shrank away until it only resembled a mid term pregnancy at most, riding somewhat high on her belly.
She then stepped back onto the scale and added the new weight to the board.

“According to this, the girls weigh about thirteen pounds.”

By then the TAs had brought in a treadmill behind her and she stepped on to it and started with the programming.

“Let's see what calories this machine says I'm burning while hauling these girls around.” She said attaching the sensor on a cord to her wrist. “Huh...rude machine asking a lady for her age. Well seeing as we're all ladies here I can divulge that information. It's thirty-six.” She said finishing the pre-programming and hit the start-button.
To the surprise of especially the girls in her stomach De Luca didn't walk, even at a quick pace, no she started jogging and a pretty brisk jog it was. They would have been baffled had they known that she had maximized the elevation incline on the machine as well judging by the ease she took and held the pace.

Undoubtedly she had chosen that setting, Meghan thought, so that she wouldn't have to carry out a whole workout in front of class before she got any interesting numbers, but still.

While De Luca kept running the TAs distributed the new material, even taking care to leave a set in every now vacant seat for the girls currently inside the professor. They took their sweet time carrying out the task and even as they retook their places on stage the professor kept on running, instead Alectra had readied herself to take over and so she did.

So while Meghan along with the tangled mess of other girls bounced around inside Professor De Luca's stomach they heard miss Condon resume last week's lecture. At least they were the closest students and apparently many enough to keep De Luca from hiding them completely, but they were still hidden quite a bit and there were quite a few other things going on that kept them from hearing what Alectra had to say. So all in all while miss Condon covered technique after technique they could at best make out snippets here and there.

And as time went on the professor's stomach that had been so calm and nice from the beginning was beginning to sound grumpier and grumpier and after a while the girls could hear the professor's guts begging to let them try the techniques Alectra was covering on the tasty treats inside her stomach.

By then it was so noisy that Meghan and the girls didn't notice when Alectra handed over to several of her colleagues, who went on with explaining different aspects and techniques.

There were even an questions and answers episode where a few girls presented quite a few questions and straightened out a few things, apparently some girls had succeeded better at absorbing things than they had at storing it as the new fat and got a bit of the normal fat instead, much to their dissatisfaction. It sounded like that particular problem got somewhat straightened out though.

Through it all De Luca had kept on running without missing a beat and as the stage cleared she kept on running until one of the TAs notified her.

So she pressed the stop-button and the machine slowly ground to a halt.

“First you notice that protein isn't stored as fat, my body might use it for other purposes or if I had digested as I ran along for fuel, but it isn't stored as fat and thus we can eliminate that part of the equation. Secondly we find that on such a diet I would not have any carbohydrate source and as miss Tomore showed us, we need quite a bit of carbohydrates, glucose specifically.
