That didn't mean she was satisfied and while she was at it she did manage to catch Julianne a few times as she hurried past, she even managed to get another technique out of the girl.

So by the time the class neared its end, she hardly had any bulge at all, the one she had could be passed of as a very large meal, which was when she realised that she had no intention of letting the girls out any other way than the natural one. Something that made her glance over at their stuff, should she clean that up?

She started gathering their things, luckily it wasn't that much, small girls have small things and don't carry too much around. Taking it all back to her own seat she could stuff a lot of it inside her own bag and thus only require one of theirs to contain the remainder. That'd be her 'practice partner's' bag, if anyone was nosy enough to ask.

Blainey hadn't missed thing though and the girl's actions spoke pretty clearly to her. Not that it mattered much, in fact it meant that she didn't have to worry about those two any more. They had been learning, but too slowly for her taste, she might have had to taken care of them herself had not this plump brunette solved the problem for her.

She'd also noticed that a lot of the girls with knowledge prior to the start of the class had seen that there were proper swallowing going on and dropped most of the faking routine. She could tell there were still a few holding back, but how many she wasn't sure, some of the girls had even managed to fool her, making her wonder if some of the girls she ate last week hadn't been as bad as they had let on.

No matter, they shouldn't have played that useless if that was the case.
There were still quite a few that were bad and with many coming out with their skills, chances were slim that these ones were faking it.

Her stomach let out a purring request and she decided that at least two should not make it to their next class, question was; Which ones?
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: The skinny one takes the plunge.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
The girls inside her gut had heard the thing about her practising hiding on them and they had noticed that there was a more or less constant change as Georgina continued to hide them more and more, so even though they found it a bit overwhelming to be trapped in that warm wet darkness, they did decide to stay the practice session, if that was what Georgina wanted.

However as the session was over and they could hear everyone leave and feel Georgina move with them, they wondered why they hadn't been let out yet.

So it wasn't until that time when they finally started struggling, but by then they hardy made a bulge in the heavy girl's gut and their struggles actually just felt nice to her. She had considered starting to digest them, but seeing as she didn't know if she'd be forced to throw them up or not, she decided to play nice. And it wasn't like she had mastered those hiding techniques either so, she moved onto her next class carrying the girls along after she'd left their stuff inside her locker.

During that boring history lecture she'd paid more attention to hiding them than to the lady in the front going on about the civil war or what ever it was, she hardly cared.

There was still one more class though making her almost curse at first, she just wanted to go home and digest these two in peace, but then she realized that her toilet might not be able to handle that, Which was when she remembered that Blainey had covered a few techniques that could help her in that regard, so the two girls inside her found them selves exploring the social economics of a girl's belly, or at least exploring her lower digestive tract while the girl in question hardly paid attention to the topic of social economics, which was what was the professor in front of the class droned on about.

Georgina wasn't quite done when the class was though, so she moved down to the study center to read a bit, while the girls wrapped up their tour.

It took a while, but eventually Georgina could feel the girls move up her ascending colon and then back down again as she gathered her things and headed towards the nearest toilet.
She had thought she'd need to hurry the last bit, but as the two smaller girls settled inside her big butt, they didn't cause nearly the pressure she'd feared. In fact she could calmly move along and make herself comfortable, before she needed to swank a bit to spread those big soft cheeks and start to push the two girls out.

Well there was only one big lump so she couldn't tell them apart, but she could tell that they were a lot smaller than her partner had been. In fact she noticed after she'd wiped herself and stood up, that the specialized toilet hadn't bottomed out as it had done with her partner.
The two girls inside the bowl were quite a bit too big for a normal toilet, but not horribly so, she thought as she pushed the handle and sent them on their way. With a bit of practice she could probably get away with using a normal one, if she only ate one at a time, or at least shat them out one at a time, she corrected herself when she felt the empty feeling in her gut. It had been nice with two in there.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Inside Georgina

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
It was a few days after Meghan's trip inside De Luca, when she and Bryci had gone through the new material at least somewhat. She hadn't gleaned much from the last lesson, that was for sure. Luckily the short girl seemed nigh obsessed, so even though she wasn't the greatest teacher, Meghan did get a bit of help from her.
A couple of trips into the raven haired girl's stomach helped her burn off a few calories as well so she could practice some. Bryci seemed to enjoy visiting hers as well, so it was a fairly mutual exchange.

It wasn't the only class she was having though, so in a free period she was sitting down in the student center's main room, where she wasn't the only student quietly reading or scribbling down notes, or answers to questions as they struggled to solve them. Meghan was reading up on biochemistry which was the class she'd have later in the afternoon.

Just then a large girl loomed over her, looking up Meghan recognized the face.

“Hey Madeline, been a while hasn’t it.”

“Yeah, I'm sorry to disturb, but could you come with me in here, I need to ask you something.” Madeline said and moved into one of the isolated rooms that were meant for group-work. She held the thick door open while she waited for Meghan to gather her things and move inside.

Closing the door behind the blonde, Madeline moved to the non-openable window that offered a view out into the main room and not outside as one might have expected, and pulled down the scroll curtain that effectively blocked that view and the view of anyone looking the other way.

All the other walls were bare except for the one what might have been an outer wall, but instead of a window it housed a white-board covering almost the whole thing, but then again it wasn't a very large room. Just large enough for a table and eight chairs around it and barely enough room to sit in those chairs. There were probably a dozen rooms like it spread out over the student center all well isolated so that the people working in groups didn't disturb the rest of the students who wanted piece and quiet.

“Well I think you understand what subject it is I want to ask you about...” Madeline said as she eased in to the slightly complaining chair next to Meghan. The girl looked like she'd lost weight, but she was still pretty soft, though most of the belly was gone, she was still wearing her old now somewhat looser clothes, though the scale at home didn't say anything about a weight loss, so she wasn't so sure herself.

“I do.” Meghan said. There was only one that'd requite them to really move in here. And sure enough as Madeline started asking questions Meghan answered them as best she could. Apparently Blainey had thought it prudent to introduce a couple of new things from the advanced class. Only a couple of techniques and only what Meghan thought was what Blainey thought was the most basic and easiest techniques. She didn't honestly master any of these herself, in fact she made notes of which they were so that she could take a look at them. If Blainey thought it was the best place to start, then perhaps it was.

“Yeah I noticed that Blainey covers a whole lot more in class, than what's actually in the book.” Madeline said when Meghan questioned her about a few things. She hoped that wasn't the case for her own class, but then again the V101 book had been exceptionally wordy hadn't it?

They did go through a few techniques, some new, but mostly ones that Meghan knew better and in the end Meghan had let Madeline have a look at her notes from the first class. She wasn't sure she should give the girl a full copy of everything, like she'd done with Bryci though.

Madeline was very grateful for the help and the next day she managed to catch Meghan in a similar way for some more questions and answers. It was during lunch this time, but as Meghan didn't eat normal lunch per say, it meant that it was almost as a free period to her.

By then Bryci had helped her go through all the new material and it would seem that the material wasn't quite up to speed to the point that it covered the upcoming class, but there were a few things on hiding, none of which was anything new to Meghan and a few things on avoiding digestion.

They hadn't tested any of them out. Frankly Meghan had been at a loss as to even how.
“It's simple...” Bryci had said giggling. “First I send you to my stomach, then I try to digest you, while you do this mumbo-jumbo and then I poop out what's left. It's as easy as that.”

“Yeah as easy as that to become your poop, I'm sure.” Meghan had replied not quite thinking it so funny, but had still found herself countering. “How about we do it the other way? You visit my stomach and try avoiding becoming my poop?”

“Now why would I wanna do that?” Bryci replied.

“See what I mean?”

“No, I meant avoid becoming your poop.” Bryci said with a smile and a wink.

“Oh, I see what you mean.” Meghan joked back and turned her behind in Bryci's direction as she gave it a slap. “You like it don't you?”

“I do! It looks good. Good enough to eat. You sure you don't want to be my poop?” Bryci countered again. And had Meghan not been clothed, she might have tasted the round protruding body-part as well.

It the end though they had just ignored those techniques for the time being.

Meghan hoped the lecture later today would bring more clarity into the matter and that she would be outside a stomach this time so she could learn.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Later.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Meghan took her seat next to Clarice, again the girl had arrived before her ,despite the fact that she was even earlier this time.
“So you're sure this is a good spot?” Meghan asked.

“I suppose not, I had no intention of being a damn labrat last time either. I guess you just never know.” Clarice said, not sounding quite as upset as Meghan had thought.

“Sorry I didn't stick around last time, but you didn't look like pleasant company when I left.”

Clarice chuckled at that. “No, I guess I wasn't. I was the first to go down, so I didn't get to see who she picked. Luckily I found out later that she hadn't picked Summer, so it turned out not to be the total loss I feared.”

“Summer?” Meghan wondered.

“Yeah, a friend, you'll get to know her later, I saw a bit of hiding and stuff in the material, so I guess we're going to start meeting up soon enough I think.”

“Yeah, I noticed that, nothing new though. I hope there's some in the material we get today.” Meghan sighed.

“Oh, I see. Then I get why you didn't find that Kimberly's demonstration too fancy.”

“Right. But what about Summer?”

“Yeah, well you see, she's not the sharpest tool, as you'll learn, but she's the best ever at taking notes, she didn't miss a damn syllable said last lecture. It turned out that the professor only chose lean girls for her experiment. I didn't know I fit that category, but I suppose I should take it as a compliment.” Clarice said with a smile that closely resembled a sneer. “And well, Summer is a girl for thorough study and lots of practice you could say. So she put on a few pounds prior to the last lecture and apparently that's why she didn't join us inside the professor I think.”

“That's good, I hope you don't mind sharing those notes. I can't say I got much down last class either.”

“Well...” Clarice smiled with more warmth this time. “I suppose I should share with my partner.” She said and shuffled through her papers finding a bunch of papers that were clearly from a copy-machine. The handwriting on them was good, almost cute, but easy to read. The amount of papers made Meghan realise as Clarice handed them to her that she probably wasn't kidding when she said Summer hadn't missed a word.

“Take these, I'll get another copy after class.”

“Thanks! So who is she? I guess she's the one I really aught to thank.”

“Oh, better not do that before I've got time to introduce you properly. She's a bit unpredictable.” Clarice chuckled as if at some private joke. “Anyway she's the blonde with the long straight hair. Next to the other blonde you fancied.” Clarice teased.

“Jamie you mean?” Meghan said, not really playing dumb, but making sure. The nod from Clarice was all she asked for.

Since Summer was sitting down she didn't get that good a view of her, but it didn't look to her like the girl had put on that much weight.

Unknown to Meghan she had, but the professor had covered how to get rid of it last time and with her excessive studying and practising of everything, Summer had worked most of it off again, so now she was just pleasantly soft, nothing that a healthy normal girl would aim to get rid of. The only place where she did have a bit of extra softness was down below, but Meghan couldn't really see Summer's rather large and meaty, but very well shaped bottom.

What struck her was the girl' blue eyed gaze, there was something distinctly wrong with it. At first she thought the girl was squint-eyed, but that didn't seem to be the case. It really did look as if the janitor had left, but forgotten the lights on.

She didn't know just how correct that assessment was. There was no real way to sugar-coat it. Summer was by all accounts really stupid, which it usually didn't take anyone very long to figure out, so it came as a surprise to most that she was a straight A student, she had aced her V101 class as well and she aimed to do the same with this one.

What she lacked in wits she made up for in stubbornness and perseverance, that's why she was so good at taking notes, because she had to go over them again and again and again and she did. That's what she'd always done with any task given to her, just gone at it until she got it and eventually she apparently did, because otherwise she wouldn't be a straight A student.

There had been one problem with these traits of hers though and that was when she'd joined the V101. The combination of not understanding what people meant along with a desire to study all the time at any opportunity given, had meant that she held an unofficial record for most practice partner ever, not counting classmates that had helped her without accepting to be her partner, she'd gone through a dozen and a half, or rather they had gone through her by the end of the semester.

This was what Clarice had meant with Summer being a bit unpredictable.
It wasn't any malice or anything that had made her send them through her systems, she'd just not considered all the implications of what had been said or her actions. They had agreed to help her practice, but she hadn't really contemplated that they probably didn't want to become part of her next bowel movement.

Though however many classmates she had eaten there wasn't anyone that had been able to keep count, she certainly hadn’t and even though they had been plenty, they were nothing compared to the amount of people she went through when studying in general. Normally she dropped a subject after she got her grades, but since she'd joined Clarice's group of friends by then and they never seemed to stop studying this subject, neither had Summer, to a lot of people's misfortune.

Meghan might have eaten people all her life and Summer was still on her second year of doing so. Even with that time difference Meghan wasn't anywhere close to the number of prey eaten by Summer. That's how much she 'studied' as she called it. This class would undoubtedly make that difference a lot worse.

Officially her 'unfortunate' partner for this class, was Jamie, the life-guard girl, who had made it perfectly clear that they weren't actually going to practice as partners. The group had chosen Jamie, for this task because she was strong enough that they had hoped that Summer wouldn't be able to just grab her as a snack if she got the wrong impression. Which would most likely be the case and possible end for any of the weaker girls in their group if they'd been given the task. Most of them though hadn't qualified for this class though, so perhaps the point was mute. Even so, none of them were envious of Jamie in that regard.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Third GI8U2 lecture.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Again Blainey covered the introductions, this time while the TA's distributed the new material. Which apparently as most had suspected contained a lot more on hiding and that other thing that had confused most of them, not that they had time to go through it now.

“Okay, we're going to move on to hiding, as you recall V101 didn't really have that much to offer on this subject, which means that even talented students such as yourselves often had difficulty moving about in public with someone inside you. Well I doubt that that's the case for most of you any more,” Blainey said struggling to avoid looking at her own TA's from the current V101, who were probably the only ones in the room that did have this problem to any extent.

“However as this class aims to have you practising on more than just a couple of people, there is need for you to thus be able to hide more than just a couple of people. So Today we will start on that and later move on and continue next time with things to make it safe to practice with your friends.”

“So yet again it is my pleasure to hand over things to miss Condon.” Blainey said and Alectra stepped forward, taking her place at the center and getting down to business.

Meghan got a bit of a chock at her appearance, she'd been very properly dressed every time she'd seen the woman, but she still looked very different from what she recalled. Admittedly she hadn't really gotten a good look at her last time, but the one before that she'd been downright plump. Now however Alectra looked even slimmer than Meghan could remember her being back at the lab when she had first met her.

That proper business attire now looked really good on her, those somewhat loose and soft business pants hung lightly from her body, draping that round bottom in a teasing manner that only really showed half the merchandise. Likewise her fashionable top was clean cut and form fitting, somewhat dark, but that matched well with her Latino heritage.

Miss Condon went through several techniques, nothing new to Meghan, which she guessed was why she paid so much attention to the woman instead. She'd gotten a few odd glances from Clarice because she wasn't taking notes to which she'd replied with a shrug of her shoulders and mouthing “Nothing new.”.

“Okay, so now I need some volunteers.” Alectra said abruptly, having hardly finished the sentence before. “Ah, who am I kidding. I need lots of volunteers for this one.” She smiled, but that smile just kept growing until she was giggling at all the horrified faces of the students.

“I'm just kidding with you. As fun as it would be with a demonstration, it's a total waste of time and I think the one we had in the first lecture proves the point well enough. Instead I think my colleague here could give you a few more pointers.” Alectra said. She wasn't allowed to just use her friend's first name and she just couldn't bring herself to say 'miss Smith' about the girl that had been on the team nearly as long as she had herself.

Lauren continued, but as far as Meghan could tell it was all old news to her, perhaps she should pay more attention, but it was hard when she could just as well have held the lecture herself.

As she stepped aside Alectra couldn't help but linger on the demonstration joke, what she really would have thought funny would have been if Haley had come in and given the girls a proper demonstration, but the professor had forbidden any mention of her youngest daughter in class, so bringing her here was quite a bit out of the question. It did make her rather puzzled as the girl in question was writing quite a bit of the stuff that her supposedly quite a bit older sister was studying here.

Alectra scanned the room for the girl in question and found the pretty bored looking young woman. Perhaps she wasn’t studying as much as the rest, no need might be. Oh well. She still thought the concept amusing enough.

Soon enough they had covered enough of the techniques for hiding to move on to answering a few questions while other girls behind them were readying things.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Class starts.

choices: She means to meet up with Bryci.
It's Friday night, something is bound to be happening.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Finally something new Meghan thought as a woman she sort of recalled from Blainey's lab, but couldn't quite place, was left alone in the center of the stage. The other researchers there apparently keeping a bit of a safety distance between themselves and the various things they'd brought in.

“Al-right, so for those of you who don't remember. I don't blame you, we were quite numerous that first day. I'm Nicole Westlake.” The tall, dark haired and quite sultry researcher announced as she beckoned for everyone’s attention.

She was dressed as far as anyone could tell in only a lab-coat. Meghan found it curious how the garment only reached down to her mid thigh and that those thighs seemed naked and there seemed to be no garment on the way to here bare feet either.

“Anyway, I'm sure a few of you were puzzled by some of the material you got last time and there's even more of it in that which you got earlier. So before I start explaining that, I thought it'd be best with a demonstration and don't worry, no volunteers for this one. You'll see why in a moment.” Nicole snickered as she moved behind a set of tables that they had put forth with large clear chemistry glass containers on them with something at the bottom of each one.

“Okay, here we have a container with some stomach juice, pretty nasty stuff, I'm sure at least some of you can make worse stuff than this, but it's pretty nasty.” Nicole said and reached behind her and retrieved a leg of some creature. It was something from the meat market for sure, a large club of meat. She held it by the still protruding bone and the rounded thick end didn't have much spare room as she lowered it into the container.

As it connected with the liquid at the bottom a loud fizzle came from it and Nicole let go of the bone and as a result the club was inside the container with the bone handle sticking nearly straight up. And the whole thing was visibly sinking into the container as the liquid level rose. The reaction did slow some as the juices got diluted by melted meat, fat and bone, but not a whole lot. Nicole didn't wait for it to finish though but moved on to the next container.

“Now this one is even nastier.” She said and retrieved another meat club and repeated the procedure. This one sank at least twice as fast and only a liquid remained moments later.

“As I said, pretty darn nasty, I doubt many of you, if any, could produce something this bad. However...” Nicole said as she moved over to yet another container. “There are worse things.” She continued as she repeated the routine once more. This time she didn't so much place the meat club in the container as much as gently drop it inside, because as soon as it made contact with the liquid in it, it just melted away, so the decent of the club hardly slowed, but moved from item to liquid in one fluent motion.

She moved over to a differently shaped container, but that was still clear. This one narrower and a bit taller, but if it contained anything like the others it was no wonder why it was equipped with a base that was even wider than the other containers, as you obviously didn't want it to tip over. This one looked about half full unlike the previous ones which had just had a bit at the bottom.

“Now this is more of that last really nasty juice.” Nicole said as she motioned towards the last container. And then removed her labcoat, revealing that she was just wearing a two piece bikini underneath. It wasn't the same one she'd worn when Meghan had met her, but the sight did make Meghan recall the occasion, she still looked as good and suddenly she looked sopping wet all over as if she'd been sprayed with water in order for a men's-magazine photo-shoot. She did look the part.

“This is what I'm going to be talking about.” Nicole said and shoved her right hand into the container, which resulted in a lot of fizzling and bubbling along most of her lower arm, but she held her arm there while it continued and then after half a minute or so retracted her by the looks of it unharmed arm and hand. She then turned around without saying anything and retrieved a slab of meat, which had been cut to fit and dropped it into the container. This piece of meat melted away as quickly as the club had in the previous container.

“I'll be back in just a moment and we can get started then.” Nicole said and slipped into the room behind, leaving the baffled students to wrap their heads around what she'd just done and her colleagues to carefully remove all the dangerous stuff.

It didn't take long and miss Westlake soon returned dripping water from her quick shower. She left a wet trail as she went and retrieved her labcoat, which she put on. It soaked up a lot of the water and clung to her in places and she didn't bother buttoning up the front this time.

She went on with the help of power-point more than chalkboards to describe various techniques of both neutralizing hostile substances, as well as creating s shielding layer as she had shown earlier.
Apparently it was a tricky business, one thing to counter another and they all knew how to create quite a varied concoction of fierce things, defending against that would require something just as intricate. Not to mention that it was a lot easier to test if you managed to produce something that would digest something than it would be to see if you managed to produce something that would defend against something. The trial and error approach didn't sound very appealing to anyone, not even Summer, who all things considered tended to make sure she was the one on the outside.

The shielding she had shown earlier was what most girls found most interesting, the problem with it was that that any shield is bound to have a weakness, if your predator can find that your shield is more or less useless, but even if that isn't the case, the shield is only buying you time as the shield is constantly digested. Admittedly better it than you, it still requires you to constantly replenish the shield, which means that you burn through your reserves in quick order.

After class Meghan and Clarice finally exchanged numbers, somehow it had slipped their minds earlier.
“I promise to call you if I think it's a good time for you to meet the girls. Chances are that they'll be busy with the previous stuff for a while longer. However, I recall you offering me a private lesson concerning this.” Clarice winked “A perfect date for a nerd like me, you should know.” She added grinning.

Meghan didn't quite know how to interpret that, Clarice wasn't bad looking or anything, but she hadn't struck her fancy either, at lest not yet. At least Clarice was lightening up, so she figured it might as well be good to keep it light hearted. “A date it is then.” She semi-joked back, not sure if the other girl would take it seriously or not. “Call me when you think it's time, I'm just awful at making plans.” Meghan added before they parted ways.

She was heading towards the copy-machine, making a set for Bryci like she'd done with the previous material. It felt a little weird with Clarice finally opening up. She already had a practice partner of sorts in Bryci. But then again Bryci was learning along with her, doubtless Clarice knew a lot more than she did in a lot of topics, not to mention it'd be nice to have a whole group of friends. Perhaps she could bring Bryci into it later?
There was the lesbian issue though, Bryci seemed open enough, but neither of them had actually done anything like that to the other even though they had been pretty intimate all the same. She would just have to keep them separate for the time being and hope that they could coexist in her life anyhow.
Madeline showing up earlier did make her feel a little bad that she sort of abandoned them for other company. Luckily it didn't seem to her like Madeline held a grudge or anything, so they were probably still friends she hoped.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Avoiding...?

choices: Go home to Bryci and have a look the new stuff.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Meghan met up with miss Collin, as she'd teased the girl after the last Lecture, since especially De Luca and Blainey kept calling everyone 'miss'. And so as she'd walked over to Bryci she had realized that she didn't knew the girl's last name even though it was on her door.

*Urp* Bryci greeted her.

“Oh, that was very lady like.” Meghan teased. “Nice of you to wait for me, too.”

Bryci giggled at that. “It was just a snack. That you've promised not to grab a bite at school doesn't mean I can't, does it?”

Bryci's changed to a somewhat chocked expression as she got an epiphany “Oh, sorry, you meant that you wanted to take care of my peckishness problem, didn't you?” She said as she brought a hand to her belly and gave it a little rub. “Tell you what. She didn't do a very good job, so I still wouldn't mind your help.”

“Ha-ha...” Meghan said dragging the words out. “Very funny.” She added and poked her tongue out at the short dark haired girl.

“Hey, that wasn't very lady-like either.” Bryci said and gave Meghan a light punch. “Besides a snack like you should be thankful I asked first.”

“Huh?” Meghan was confused. “Why would I be a snack?”

“Well we're on school ground, where you aren't allowed to eat, but I am, that makes you the snack, now doesn't it?” Bryci teased licking her lips, while she tried hard not to giggle.

“Never thought of it like that, but I guess we should leave then. I doubt that greedy gut of yours will be content with just a snack anyway.” Meghan accused.

“Oh, I guess you're right.” Bryci said as the two of them started walking. “But you could be a nice appetizer.” She chimed in, sounding hopeful.

“So what do you call her then.” Meghan asked pointing towards Bryci's belly.

“I already told you. She was just a snack, I haven't started the meal yet.” Bryci giggled back. “Besides she's here.” She added and slapped her own behind. “Which proves my point. If she'd been part of a meal then she wouldn't be all done before the others had joined her in my tummy now would she?”

Meghan had come to accept Bryci's strange humour, the girl really liked to talk about people as food, including the two of them, so as they left the school grounds she countered the smaller girl.

“Well, it seems you passed up your chance little girl.” Meghan grinned pointing to emphasize that they had just barely passed beyond the gates. “You don't look very filling, but I guess it's a start.” Meghan said and made her stomach growl a bit. “Oh, seems my stomach wants more. Did you have some filling or what?”

“Nope, the filling passed the expiring date I'm afraid.” Bryci smiled.

“Drat. Seems I've got to find something else then.” Meghan giggled back. “Any ideas where I could look?”

“You could start in here.” Bryci said and opened her mouth, but not wider than normal, they were in public after all, even if they made sure no one was close enough to hear their conversation.

“I doubt there's anything in there, my tummy told me that even the whole thing didn't look very filling.”

“Oh, well then we should look elsewhere shouldn't we? How about this way?” Bryci said and started walking without waiting for a reply.

“Sounds good to me.” Meghan said and made her belly rumble again. “Tummy agrees.”

At first the two of them had walked together, but since both wanted the meals they came across they decided to walk in opposite directions and call one another when they were done. So Meghan had found herself walking back towards Bryci's direction, she wasn't that surprised that she'd finished first. Bryci had eaten as much as she had now even the first time they went out, she had no idea how many people were in that bulging middle the girl had when they finally met up and headed back to school.
Waste minimization or no, with four people Meghan knew she'd need proper facilities and she was pretty sure the same was true for Bryci who tried passing her girth of as some sort of pregnancy.

Now they had already gone through the material concerning these bits, seeing as the new stuff didn't concern digestion, but now Meghan had gotten Summer's notes and the questions and answers bit had actually turned out rather useful.

As they left the toilets Meghan had commented Bryci's gluttony. “That was some serious gorging you did there.”

“Yeah, I guess so.” Bryci said rubbing her now flat belly. “Feels kind of empty after that. You mind helping me out?” She said grinning.

“I'll pass.” Meghan declined.

“Eventually yes. Didn't plan of keeping you in there forever. Just until I got home or so.” Bryci said trying not to giggle.

“Some girlfriend you are, not even gonna give me a one night stand.”

Chao-xing Li waited. A midday sun shown through the dense Indian foliage and illuminated her impossible beauty. Someone could spend their life imagining and theorizing about the most ideal picture of beauty, and their conjured image still wouldn't be able to hold a light to the diminutive Chinese woman. She wore her shining ebony hair in a bob that ended just above her large brown eyes. She wore nearly nothing, as she often did to allow her to hunt more freely; only an athletic bra, a pair of short-shorts, and a pair of sandals clung to her paragon of a body.

"...Annnnnd clear!" rang out from behind her in a husky Indian accent. A plunger was pressed, and suddenly the bridge before her exploded into a menagerie of splintered wood and bent railroad ties. Chao-xing stood her ground as the shrapnel clattered uselessly off her body; her perfect, hairless skin might look and feel as soft as silk, but it was tougher than steel.

"Good job, Jayanta." she called out in a heavily accented Chinese accent. A tall, muscular Indian man emerged from the canopy behind her, a grin on his face. He removed his safety goggles and strode up next to the Chinese girl.

"Thanks, Chao." he replied.

"Now, where should I be standing?" Chao-xing asked.

"Uh," Jayanta produced a sheet of paper and studied it for a moment, "16.7 metres from where the track ends. So," he pointed at a stretch of land underneath where the bridge once was, "There." Chao-xing strolled over to where he had pointed.

"Thank you again for this, Jay. Once Abigail and I have cleared the city, you're welcome to anything you want in it." She called back at him.

"Oh, it's no problem, Chao. My two friends are hungry, I feed my two friends." He smiled back at her.

"No, no, don't dismiss this, Jay, you helped us take out every possible way out of the city, except for the railways. Mumbai would be well and safe if it wasn't for you. Abigail and I are in your debt."

"I thank you for the kindness, but I do this not for money, but for friendsh-" A train whistle cut Jayanta short. He and Chao-xing exchanged looks, as she smiled.

"There it is," Jayanta started," first refugee train out of Mumbai. 4.2 kilometres of steel, with 120,000 people fleeing the carnage Abigail is creating inside the city onboard."

"And it's found the end of the line already." Chao-xing said with glee. "How many more do you think will follow it?"

"Well, this area is inaccessible by radio for the next thirty kilometres, and the trains will be going at about fifty kilometres an hour, so I say they get suspicious about an hour from now, and they stop sending the trains in about two, two and a half. It took this train twenty minutes to get here, so I say 6 or 7 find their way here."

"720,000 to 840,000 people. Thank you so much for this Jay." Chao-xing replied with joy on her face, and a growling in her stomach.

"As I said, no problem. Now I believe the train will be arriving very soon, if you would make ready."

Chao-xing planted her feet firmly in the ground and pointed her head at the railroad track that ended at the now demolished bridge. She could see the tracks shaking, and felt her heart pounding in tandem. She hadn't felt this excited in years. She waited, seconds taking hours, for two and a half minutes before it came.

Sparks screeching out of the wheels, the locomotive barreled off the tracks at full speed directly towards the tiny Chinese girl beneath. Time stood still for Chao-xing. She looked into the conductors bewildered face, and read the graffiti on the engine. In her peripherals, Jayanta looked on in wonder as bird emerged from the trees, fleeing the cacophony. And then, the train was upon her. Chao-xing opened her mouth and began a sustained swallow that she normally did when she ate large objects, and caught the train with her mouth. The engine of the metal monstrosity flew into her gullet in a split second, followed by the car behind it, and behind that one, and that one, and that one...

Jayanta looked on with utter shock. The scene before him didn't look real. The massive locomotive cars shot forward faster than anything he had ever seen into beautiful, beautiful Chao-xing. She was swallowing them nearly twelve a second. Jayanta knew each car had between 150 and 200 people inside; he had done his homework. Fathers, sons, mothers, daughters, families, they entered his friend thousands at a time, never to emerge. Their entire lives led up to feeding this gorgeous girl before him. In the end, they were destined for Chao-xing Li. Jayanta felt his manhood rise.

And just like that, it was over. The thunderous metal clamors ceased immediately. There was a moment of silence before Chao-xing stopped tensing. She looked about and then looked over to Jayanta with a look of "Did I do it?" upon her. Jayanta looked at her and felt his heart melt. She looked so... innocent. She had just killed 120,000 people, how did she look so... cute? Her mouth opened slightly, and Jayanta tensed with anticipation of her words.

"Urrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrruuuuuuuuuuuppphhhh." she belched. Another moment of silence followed before she started laughing. Jayanta looked on confused for a moment before he began chuckling, and in a few seconds, both were paralyzed with laughter. Thirty seconds of this scene of mania passed before Chao-xing held up her hand and muttered "Wait." A breath passed before she slightly lifted one of her legs and farted deeply and loudly for nearly twenty straight seconds. Following this, she smiled and jumped in the air with joy.

"That's it! 120000 people, digested at the same time! I did it!" she practically squealed with joy. She ran forward and wrapped Jayanta in a tight embrace, squeezing the air from him with here inhumane strength before she realized that she was hurting him.

"Oh... I'm sorry, Jay." she said, backing off.

"That's... not an issue." the Indian man said, gritting his teeth through the pain. Suddenly, there was a sound neither of them were expecting. The train whistle cut through the air like a hot knife through snow. The two exchanged looks for a moment.

"That's not supposed to be here for another fifteen minutes." Jayanta said.

"Well, it's here now!" Chao-xing yelled, running back to her spot. Once more the train fell on her, and once more she slurped it down like a wet noodle. Panting, she belched and looked over to Jayanta, before another whistle was heard. When it arrived a minute afterwards, it once more found its way into the small girl's stomach, even as she farted out what remained of its predecessor. She burped in tandem with the next whistle. She shot a glance back towards her friend. "This is going to be a long day." her look seemed to say...



Three hours later, Chao-xing Li collapsed to the ground. A new, fully loaded train had arrived every five minutes, and every five minutes, 120000 more people met their end in Chao-xing's reluctant tummy. But now it seemed they had stopped. Jayanta looked towards his small friend. There had been 42 trains by his count. Five million people. Lost somewhere in that sleeping girl over there. Sighing, Jayanta retrieved the wheelbarrow he had used to transport the dynamite he used to blow the bridge and returned to Chao-xing. With great effort, he slowly moved her lithe, impossibly heavy body into the wheelbarrow, and from there, rolled her to the car they had arrived in. He carefully moved her into the back seat of the vehicle, and laid her down, throwing a blanket over her. He watched her sleep for a moment, still coming to terms with the sheer number of people that had ended up as one of this nymph's farts. He sighed and started the car, driving it away.

"Well," Jayanta thought as he pulled onto the dirt road, "If there's that many people trying to get away, Abigail must be raising hell in Mumbai."

"There's this place on the beach I know." Wicks said as the two began their walk through the corridor. "A little family room that's out of sight from any prying eyes. Should be about thirty people in there, all families, so no tears once we're done. I'll grab twenty, you take the rest."

"And why do you get twice as much as I do, Emily?" Jennifer questioned.

"Because last night, I skipped dinner, and you got to feast on an army."

"Fair enough."

Wicks threaded her fingers through Jennifer's own while the two continued through the shattered concrete and rusted walls of the abandoned facility before arriving outside. As they started towards the car, a thought occurred to Jennifer.

"How did Blainey leave?" she asked, noticing the locked gate. Wicks looked around for a moment following this.

"Honestly, I have no idea." Wicks replied as she started towards the gate.

"Here," Wicks said, tossing Jennifer the keys, "Start up the car, I'll be there in a moment."

"Sure." Jennifer replied, catching the keys. She climbed into the hybrid and placed the keys in the ignition, causing the vehicle to start. It was then that she had a strange idea. She looked at the gas pedal, and then at Emily, who was still busy with the gate... if she wanted to, she could...
1111111111111112111111112111121211121111.title: "This place on the Beach."

1111111111111112111111112111121211121111.content:
Dismissing the thought, Jennifer slid over to the passenger seat. A moment later, Wicks climbed into the driver's seat. She brought the car outside the gate, climbed out, and shut it behind them. She got back in and started her way down the broken road. After a few minutes, she broke the silence.

"So Jennifer, are we a thing now?" Wicks asked, rather calmly.

"What?" Jennifer replied, taken aback.

"A thing. Like a relationship?"

"I know what a thing is."

"So, are we?"

"We met yesterday, Emily. Not to mention I just ended a relationship Friday."

"Oh, what happened?"

"Boyfriend cheated on me."

"Boyfriend?" Wicks asked, with a tinge of surprise.

"Yeah, my boyfriend, this guy Dave." Jennifer replied, looking over to Wicks.

"Oh, from the way you were back at the warehouse, I had thought you were..." Wicks' voiced trailed off.

"Gay?" Jennifer finished for her.

"Uh, yeah." Wicks replied uncomfortably.

"I don't know why you're skirting around it, you're the one that threw me onto the bed." Jennifer accused as they pulled onto a more maintained road.

"I was lonely. I learned my baby sister had been killed by one of the greatest mass murderers in history, and then I have her avenger wrapped around me while we're both naked. It was spur of the moment."

"And how did we get naked? I was already there, but you were fully clothed when I passed out." This caused Wicks to pause. After what seemed like a long time, Jennifer cut the silence.

"There's nothing wrong with being gay, Emily."

"I'm not saying that," Wicks replied, "It's just, I've never been with a woman before, I've never wanted to be with a woman before, but I'm sitting here, thinking about you naked."

"Aww, I'm flattered." Jennifer said insincerely. There was another long silence before Wicks broke it.

"Are you, Jenny?"

"Am I what?"

"Gay?"

"N-" Jennifer instinctively went to deny it, but then her mind flashed across the events of the past three days. She thought of her calculated plan where she made out with Melinda Scarzeni to get the drop on her. She thought of her and Jessica lying breathless on a dirt path, naked as the day they were born. She thought of Victoria - oh god, Victoria; her mind flashed through her teen-aged years.

Her and her football team had just won a game against a nearby school, but during the last twenty minutes, she had been cut by the cleats of one of her opponents when they both went for the ball. The cut was long, but shallow, and even though it hurt like hell, she finished the game, scoring a goal fifteen minutes later. Afterwards, everyone on the team had congratulated her on her three scores when they went into the locker room, but then Victoria approached her. She didn't say anything about her goals, she only placed a hang gingerly on her wounded leg and asked if she was okay. Afterwards, in the showers, Jennifer found herself constantly looking over at Victoria, sneaking peeks when she thought the curly haired brunette couldn't see her, but she knew that she had noticed. And yet, even after she knew she had been found out, she kept looking. Her and Victoria locked eyes for a moment as they were getting dressed later, and suddenly she felt weird. She fled the room without saying goodbye. That night, when she was fucking her boyfriend at the time, Tom, she imagined it was Victoria whose head was between her legs.

"You know what, Emily?" Jennifer started, receiving sudden intuition regarding her life stance, "There are people that I like.Those people have been both boys and girls. If liking a person who happens to be a girl that makes me gay, fuck it, I'm gay." Wicks thought on this for a moment before replying.

"I suppose that makes me gay as well then." Another moment of silence before Wicks spoke again.

"Don't worry about that Dave guy, he'll get what's coming to him."

"He already did. Him and the chick he fucked."

"Oh?" Wicks looked over to her.

"Yeah, people who try to fuck me over have this horrible habit of falling into my stomach. Strangest thing." Wicks looked over confused for a moment before she realized who she was quoting. The two shared a smile and a chuckle. After ten minutes of silence, Wicks once more spoke.

"So, is this a thing?" she asked. Jennifer thought about it for a moment, tonguing the words, before responding:

1111111111111112111111112111121211121111.content:
"Yeah," Jennifer decided, "We're a thing."

"Good, good. Glad to hear it... honey." Wicks said awkwardly.

"Me too babe." Jennifer said with over exaggerated confidence. They continued in silence for a few minutes before Wicks spoke.

"It going to be kind of weird to be fucking someone ten years younger then me."

"Wouldn't be my first time with a geezer like yourself." Jennifer replied. Wicks' eyebrows furrowed.

"What do you mean?" she demanded.

"When I was fifteen, I started banging my twenty seven year old history teacher." Jennifer spoke, candidly.

"What?!" Wicks exclaimed in surprise.

"Yeah, third time, we got caught. I got a week suspension; he got fired, blacklisted, arrested, and put on a sex offender's list."

"Jennifer, that's not okay."

"I was young and stupid, he was hot and much more stupid."

And when I got out of university, I spent all my time putting in hours with the force, so I could become commissioner. I've really only had two other relationships. First one was my freshman year. Second was this Hispanic guy, Carlos, that I started dating my senior year. We got along pretty well, and he was rather good looking, but one night he came home when he was supposed to be on holiday, and found me halfway through a truck full of people. And so Carlos joined them. How about you?" Jennifer's face twisted into a smirk.

"A lot more then two."

"Fine, fine. I lost my virginity at thirteen to this Josh Willbrooks, who I dated for a few months, but then we broke up in search of new horizons. Uh... then I dated a few more kids who were too young and awkward to make a lasting impression. Then came that bit with the history teacher, then I was dating this guy Tom Oaks. He was probably the best person I slept with for awhile, but we broke up after he graduated later that year. Then I got to university, and I started dating this guy Joseph, but I dumped him for this other guy Michael, and then there was this guy Randall Milkins, who got really aggressive with me at a party this one time. He grabbed me and started yelling at me, but I used to do a lot of martial arts during high school, so I managed to get free, and I broke his nose. He got angry, and tried to hit me, but that guy Dave, and this other kid, Aaron, held him back, before the guy hosting the party, this huge kid named Mike, literally threw him out. I slept with Aaron, and started dating Dave. And after that, I got with..." Jennifer paused for a moment, "My best friend Victoria, and then I fucked one of Blainey's TA's, Jessica. Oh, and after that, I started dating the Head Cop of America's second largest city."

"Wow, that's quite the story," Wicks observed, "But you paused for a second when you started talking about your friend Victoria. What's that about?"

"Not now." Jennifer softly spoke, voice immediately becoming laden with grief.

"Jenny, we have to be honest with each other if this is going to work."

"Not. Now." Jennifer nearly spat, with a voice of ice.

"Fine. We're almost there anyway." The two traveled in silence for the next five minutes, before they pulled into a beach parking lot. Getting out of the car, Wicks pointed towards a small, light blue coliseum with a tarp covering it.

"That's the place. A little area for families to get out of the sun for awhile. And a great spot for hungry women to take their fill. Let's go." Wicks started towards the building, Jennifer in tow.

There having the party at this rent - out place called "The Ballroom" about five minutes from here. After some five minutes driving down the avenue her neighborhood was connected to, Ai took a right and turned into the parking lot for The Ballroom. It was rather plain architecturally; a plain rectangular prism with only one floor, but there was clearly time and effort put into the paint job on the place, with many detailed paintings over a general white and gold motif. Ai certainly appreciated the aesthetics, and hoped that the building's owner wasn't inside; she liked what he had done with the place. She turned off her car, and started towards the brass handled oaken double doors.

She pushed open the doors and walked through a entrance hall before throwing open another set of doors. Inside was the main hall; a Greco-Roman themed location with paintings of the culture's gods. Slow Latin music played throughout the red oak floored room, and over the two long hardwood tables. At the one on Ai's left sat 13 people, and the one on her right 7. Mostly Hispanic, the table on the left was comprised of the celebrated person's family; all adults, save for the girl herself, and another girl close to her age. The table on the right was comprised of a more polyethnic group, but all were around the Sanchez girl's age; friends from school, Ai deducted. They all sat, eating an array of breads, different styles of pork, and fruits, more of which Ai noticed were set up on serving trays on a table to the side.

Ai's moth began to prematurely salivate she made her first move; she moved to the table on her right, grabbed two of the children (a blonde haired white girl and a black haired Asian boy), and shoved them into her mouth simultaneously. Without breaking stride, she swallowed once again, bringing the first two into her up to their calves, and shoved her new two victims' heads into her mouth, alongside her previous prey's legs, before stepping once again, grabbing hold of another two, this time a black girl and an Asian girl. She swallowed, finishing off the first two and bringing numbers three and four in to their midsections. Following this, she shoved the heads of the black and Asian girls into her maw, alongside the torsos of the red haired girl and the black boy, causing her cheeks to expand almost comically, like a chipmunk's. She swallowed again; three and four's calves dangling from her mouth, as five and six's body from the waist down did the same. As Ai grabbed hold of the seventh and final person, a blonde haired white boy, someone from the other table shouted, getting their attention. Quickly, Ai shoved the blonde boy's head into her own, and choked down the conglomerate of people-turned-food with three successive swallows.

There was a clamoring of chairs as Ai turned around to see that all of the people at the opposite table had rose. Ai swiftly put herself between them and the door, her dexterity not addled by the seven people in her gut. The whole family began backing away en masse towards the back, away from Ai, with looks of fear and bewilderment on their faces. Chuckling, the fifty year old Chinese woman began advancing towards them. They continued to back away for about five metres, before one of them, an older, large man, wordlessly picked up a chair and ran at Ai, screaming. "No, Papa!" eminated from somewhere in the crowd as Ai continued her walk, unfazed. Once the two were close enough, the man swung the chair like a club as hard as he could. Ai deftly ducked backwards until the chair had past her, at which point she stepped forward and delivered a savage jab into the man's throat at a breakneck speed. He dropped the chair as his hands clutched for his neck and his face turned purple. Ai, without ceasing her strut, grabbed the man, lifted him clear over her head, opened her mouth, and allowed him to effortlessly slide into her.There was a moment of silence that Ai cut with a large belch and a smirk. The crowd erupted in a chorus of gasps and screams as they all started to panic, scattering in every direction, but whenever someone tried to move in a way that wasn't the way Ai wanted them to go, she interposed herself, causing the person to reel back in fear, until all twelve were huddled tightly in the corner.

"Why are you doing this?" came a whimpering voice from the recently turned fifteen year old girl. "She's rather pretty." Ai remarked as she spread her smirk to a grin.

"We all have to eat." she said advancing ever closer.

"We're not food, we're people!" came another voice that Ai couldn't quite pinpoint over the sound of the music.

"Unfortunately for you," Ai said, standing only about two metres from the group, "You're about to find out how much you really are food." She put on her best sympathetic look before continuing; "I wish I could tell you that you were all about to have a quick and painless death, but that would be a lie. Every last one of you is going to suffocate to death in my belly, and then I'm going to digest you, and shit what's left of your body out into the sewers. The police will never know what's happened to you and your families will spend their time wondering and crying about you. I also wish I could say I was sorry, but I'm not. But I do wish you luck in whatever life comes after this one. Good bye." With that, Ai dove into the crowd. In a flurry of screams, cries, and gulpings, she attacked the family, taking mothers, fathers, sons, and daughters in three at a time, all to the tune of slow Latin rhythms over a sad sounding voice in Spanish.

With a final swallow, Ai sent her last victim, ironically the girl whose party this had been, sprawling into her. She belched loudly as she checked her phone for the time. 18:30. Ai almost felt a tang of regret for her most recent meal, as when she ate more then ten people, she couldn't properly contract her stomach to kill them, and digesting them in the standard method would cause too many of their nutrients to be lost, so she had to slowly digest alive, meaning that they would all run out of air in minutes, while their skin was slowly melted off their bodies. She started towards the banquet table next,demolishing the three trays of pork, the six loafs of bread, and the thirty odd assorted fruits before she perused the dining tables, devouring any morsel that the guests had left on their plates before she started back towards her car. Ai belched as fifteen year old Alyssa Sanchez released her final breath on a mound of her friends and families. At most, all these twenty people would ever amount to now would be a befuddled thought and a stain on a stranger's underwear.
